name: 1 MOBILE STORE
description:
1 Mobile Store (also known as One Specialist Mobile) established since year 2007 with more than 15 years experience in the digital industry.
We are retail business which providing one stop mobile shopping experience in Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall. Products such as smart phones, smart home electronics, gadgets and accessories, as well as telco and mobile repair & service are all available in store.
Brands that we are carrying are such as Apple, Samsung, Xiaomi, ROG, Black Shark and etc. As long as you name it, we have it! In addition, our professional repair service is available for iOS and Android devices.
We are also having strong believes in our core values, which are be genuine, be at the leading edge of trend, listen to customers, have integrity and be fair. We ensure you will have a great shopping experience with us.

name: 1 Specialist Mobile

name: 108 Matcha Saro
description: 108 Matcha Saro celebrates the rich tradition of Japanese matcha with an exquisite menu that brings the authentic flavors of Uji, Kyoto. Specializing in matcha desserts like soft serve & parfaits, warabi mochi, and our signature Obanyaki, we invite you to indulge in the pure, intense, and vibrant world of matcha.

name: 30DEGREES
description: Retailing of ladies sports fashion, lingerie and other related accessories only.

name: 3CE
description: Introducing 3CE Stylenanda: The Color Expert from Seoul, Korea. Since its inception in 2009, 3CE has been on a transformative journey, pushing the boundaries of beauty with its motto of "creative makeup." The brand has become synonymous with Korean beauty trends, leading the way with its precisely curated palette of shades and textures. The 3CE Pink Space boutique isn't just a store; it's a journey—a voyage through the cosmos of beauty.

name: 3S Innovation
description: Retailing of gadget accessories and related products.

name: 4Fingers
description:
Originally from Singapore, 4Fingers is now available at Sunway Pyramid! 4Fingers started out as single store in ION Orchard Singapore in 2009 and people were intrigued by their flavours. This lead to a wild spread rebellion spread across the nation. The founders of this food establishment found the best Asian fried chicken, believe or not, in New York’s city on the subway scene. This is where it all began. Their original chicken recipe is more well-known have a fiery sensation which is as intense as their hot and spicy sauce. From there on, they spread their wings to other regions such as Malaysia, Indonesia and Australia to share what they believed.
How do they make their chicken taste so good? Their chicken is specially cooked to using their own house recipe which resulted in an awesome fried chicken that's packed with loads of flavour. They also use only fresh, locally sourced free-range chicken in kitchens which definitely speaks of quality of their own food. What makes their chicken recipe unique, spicy and crispy, it is cooked with natural herbs and spices, with zero artificial flavourings. In addition to that there is no MSG and instead they use naturally fermented soy sauces that packs a punch, offering their food in the most natural way possible.
Their signature Soy Garlic and Hot & Spicy sauces are made the good old fashioned way, fermented naturally using a traditional Asian method (soy beans, water, 5 months of Malaysian sun) and natural herbs and spices. Not only their chicken is great but they also offer a variety of things such as their delicious burgers and sandwiches, seafood and salad to appeal to many. Now that is available in our mall, this is a great addition for everyone to enjoy a chicken recipe originated from Singapore. Come and try it out!

name: 6IXTY8IGHT
description:
With its signature pastel pink exterior and interior you definitely won’t miss 6IXTY8IGHT as you’re walking along LG1. If you’re on a shopping spree, you won’t want to skip this super cute store that has so much to offer that it’s established itself as ‘a girl’s favourite shopping destination’. Hailing from its headquarters in Hong Kong, the brand started out as a youthful and energetic lingerie brand founded by Erik Ryd, a Swedish entrepreneur with a well-known lingerie manufacturing business in Asia. A few years later, the brand expanded its range of apparel from its adorable to sexy lingerie line, to include nightwear, active wear, denim, tops, dresses, pants, loungewear and accessories.
As this shopping haven expands to become one of the fastest-growing fashion brands in Asia, it now has more than 200 outlets and counting all over. Lion is proud to say that the brand’s first outlet on Malaysian shores opened right here at Sunway Pyramid in 2019! When they first opened their doors to all fashion-adoring shoppers, Lion was curious to find out what the intriguing name of their store meant. Turns out, the meaning behind 6IXTY8IGHT’s unique name has its roots in Chinese numerology. Since Cantonese is the main dialect spoken in Hong Kong, their pronunciation for the numbers 6 and 8 have phonetic similarities to a phrase resembling “Forever luck!”.
There’s definitely something for everyone here. With their wide range of lingerie that’s either cute and quirky, or sexy and alluring, it’s amazing how comfortable and affordable it is too - who ever said you can’t have the best of both worlds? Even their outerwear is nothing short of stylish chic, great to mix and match for every occasion – whether it’s that perfect date outfit, or for a day out with friends, or even to your office. With 4,500 square feet of retail outlet space, you can shop to your heart’s content for the latest fashion trends so get ready to shop till you drop!

name: 7 Dayz
description: Retailing as fashion apparels and related accessories

name: 7 Eleven
description:
As many knows that 7 Eleven Sunway Pyramid is a popular convenience store that people loved. They are the pioneer and the largest 24-hours convenience store operator in Malaysia. With more than 1,000 opened stores across Malaysia, 7-Eleven Malaysia opened its door to local entrepreneurs through its unique franchising program in 2009. They are the first franchisor in the local market to offer existing profit-making stores to franchisees.
Every 7-Eleven store carries over 2,200 products and services which includes their very own proprietary brands such as Slurpee frozen beverages and Big Gulp fountain soft drinks. They also provide an array variety of services available at 7-Eleven which includes bill payment service, sale of mobile phone reload cards, IDD/STD, Touch N Go reload, internet games' starter packs, reloads via MOL Point top-up, ink cartridge refill, photocopying, fax, automated teller machine (ATM), and bulletin board for neighbourhood community notices.
In the year of 2009, 7-Eleven introduced freshly brewed coffee and other hot beverages together with packaged fresh food and bakery for the convenience of customers looking for ready-to-eat hot food. This is due to the fact many customers want something fast and on the go hence this initiative. All food items sold in 7-Eleven are certified HALAL and undergo stringent quality control to ensure tastefulness and freshness.
Being the premier neighbourhood convenience store, community building is in the heart of 7-Eleven’s corporate social responsibility framework. 7-Eleven Community Care is a non-profit entity set up to implement 7-Eleven Malaysia’s corporate social responsibility and philanthropic initiatives. They believe in giving back to the society we operate in, with a commitment to support the underprivileged groups and to sustain environmental conservation effort at the local community level across all regions. With such passion they have, an outlet was opened in Sunway Pyramid to serve the conveniences to many.

name: A Cut Above Salon
description: A Cut Above is all about a drive to excel and to be the best. From a 428 square feet salon in Wisma MPI in 1979, both husband and wife team –Winnie Loo and Richard Teo had built A Cut Above into one of the best hair salons in Kuala Lumpur. Winnie Loo was trained by hair maestro Vidal Sassoon, developing her skills and professionalism, she had gained all manner of prestigious awards locally and internationally. As the forefront of the hair industry, her works had been showcased in many international magazines. The company had also grown into Malaysia’s more premier group of salons with an established hairdressing academy –A Cut Above Academy. At A Cut Above salon, you can enjoy a range of top quality hair products and exclusive treatments. Furthermore, you will be administered with the finesse trained stylist to provide you a relaxing and rejuvenating session. Carefully crafted over 30 years, the team will give their best to offer in professionalism, skills, products and equipment that set to high standards and even higher ideals! Visit A Cut Above Salon at Ground floor(blue zone) to relax and walk out with assured confidence in your new look!

name: A Decade
description: Preserving The Taste of Malaysian Cuisines

name: A&CO
description:
A&Co provides customers with everything they are looking for: golden exclusive value, professional and creative hair care, exceptional service, and welcoming environment.
Professional stylists with extensive knowledge and experience along with wide variety of professional hair care products that keep customers looking their best and returning to A&Co.

name: A&W
description: Good Food, Good Times

name: A-Saloon
description: With a commitment to providing the best service, our professional stylists offer personalized advice and home care solutions tailored to your individual needs. Trust in our expert stylists, who are trained in the latest techniques and trends, to deliver the ultimate hair treatment, scalp therapy, and hair styling services. We are providing a premium and relaxing atmosphere. We even cater to our Muslim clients with private areas for added convenience.

name: A-WOW-ME
description: Upon stepping into any A-WoW-ME Hair Saloon, you’ll see that it’s created with the client in mind. Not only it is luxurious and comfortable, but our outlets are also equipped with a private area for our Muslim clients. Every client is given professional advice and personalized home care by our professional stylists, according to the client’s needs.

name: AAPE *BY A BATHING AAPE
description: "AAPE is the bold sister brand to A Bathing Ape, the Tokyo-born streetwear label. The 90s fashion house is attracting a new generation of followers with its unexpected inspiration and spirited takes on original designs. AAPE represents an evolution from the very first creative influences and celebrates the iconic Japanese ape-head motif, which has given casualwear impact since 1993. In this collection, expect loose-fitting shapes, plenty of standout camouflage, and artistically branded tees."

name: ABC One Cafeteria
description:
Hidden in a little niche of the Sunway Pyramid parking, lies the elusive ABC One Cafeteria. While most people may not have heard or seen it, those who has gone there at least once will drop by again when they can. Unlike most other eateries in Sunway Pyramid, ABC One Cafeteria prides itself in providing a down-to-earth, affordable meal that is devoid of the usual drapperies of fancy eatings. Customers can look forward to a hearty meal of staple local delicacies such as fried beehoon, fried rice, mee goreng, nasi kandar, fried chicken and fish, cooked Malay dishes, and occasionally a variety of 'kuih-muihs' to wrap up your meal.
Each item are resonable priced and well seasoned to entice the appetite and still be wallet-friendly, with a slight variation in menu on a daily basis to encourage repeat customers to pop by during their lunch or tea breaks. ABC One Cafeteria is also capable of catering to events that has been pre-arranged with their cooks. Customers can provide a list of their requests and have a discussion with the team to know if their desired menu can be prepared for a very reasonable price.
Do drop by the ABC One Cafe one day for a simple meal, that is both satisfying and filling!

name: AED
description:
In case of cardiac emergencies, automated external defibrillator (AED) machines are available around the mall.

name: AGift with Care
description:
AGift With Care, a fragrance brand that originated in Penang and has expanded to Sunway Pyramid, is dedicated to creating captivating scents while also making a positive impact on society. Since its establishment in 2010, the brand has embraced a mission rooted in the philosophy of selfless generosity. Our commitment goes beyond crafting fragrances; it embodies a heartfelt desire to give back and spread kindness.
Our products of AGift With Care are meticulously designed with a focus on personal indulgence and well-being. Each creation is thoughtfully crafted to uplift spirits and infuse lives with positivity, promoting self-care. Whether used for personal enjoyment or given as thoughtful gifts, their scented offerings carry the essence of compassion and mindfulness, creating a meaningful experience for both the user and the recipient.
AGift With Care aims to forge meaningful connections and inspire individuals on their personal journeys. We understand that life unfolds in various stages, and as such, the brand continually adapts its products to meet the evolving needs and aspirations of its customers. By remaining attuned to the ever-changing lifestyles of their audience, we ensure that our offerings align with their desires and preferences.
While personal growth is significant, AGift With Care believes in the transformative power of emotional connections. Through our scents, we aspire to touch lives, spark joy, and foster a sense of unity within the community. As the brand flourishes, we actively contribute to society by dedicating ourselves to acts of giving, motivated solely by our desire to make a positive difference.
A Gift With Care extends an invitation to individuals to embark on a fragrant voyage where purpose meets passion. Together, we aspire to inspire, uplift, and create a ripple effect of kindness that resonates far and wide. By joining forces, we aim to spread their message of selfless generosity, leaving a lasting impact on individuals and communities alike.
#BeautyTreats

name: ALOHA KARAOKE & CAFÉ
description:
Let loose and sing with all your heart! Aloha Karaoke features a Hawaiian theme with a more green environment which makes it stand out from other karaoke places. Indulge in the entertainment while enjoying good food and drinks. Host your birthday parties, friend gatherings, reunions or company outings in this 'chill' karaoke outlet. Aloha also offers a buffet spread for corporate events such as Maybank's Western Fusion Event featuring a variety of western food and even caters to Halloween parties. With the friendly and cheerful crew members dressed in Hawaiian outfits eveready to go out of their way to make you feel welcome and even party with you, your karaoke expereince at Aloha is ensured to never be a dull one.
What other better place to go for karaoke than Aloha which is situated at Sunway Pyramid. Go to the mall to shop or have a nice meal before walking over to Aloha for your karaoke session. You could even have your daytime fun at Sunway Lagoon and plan your nightlife party at Aloha!
Awesome deals featuring student discounts with a complementary free drink await you. Feel like leveling up your entertainment experience? Aloha also offers a selection of quality cocktails from beers to whiskey and shisha, which are rare commodities to find in other karaoke places. Choose your poison from the liquor, beer and shisha packages so everyone in your group can enjoy. Aloha even has a Cocounut Bar where you can order drinks and relax outside of the karaoke rooms if you ever get overwhelmed by all the excitement and noise where the spacious and holiday-feel seating area would undoubtedly put your mind at ease. Coming with your family, fret not for Aloha also provides a selection of non-alcoholic cocktails for the children to enjoy in a uniquely crafted porcelain vessel. Awesome promotional rates are also commonly offered during festive seasons such as Chinese New Year, Chirstmas and even Valentines Day to give you an amazing experience at an affordable price.

name: ANTA Basketball
description: Discover the ultimate basketball destination at the first ANTA Basketball Concept Store in Malaysia. Featuring cutting-edge basketball gear and exclusive apparels. It is the perfect spot for basketball athletes and enthusiasts alike. Elevate your game and immerse yourself in the world of ANTA basketball today!

name: ANTA Sports
description: To Keep the World Moving through our passion for sports and community

name: APT
description:
We’re Malaysia’s No.1 Choice! APT Salon is the largest salon brand in the salon industry, serving more than 2 million customers. We are everywhere across the regions with more than 40 stores nationwide.
Over the years, we created many happy customers by offering them a complete range of hair care services including haircutting, coloring, styling and treatment at affordable prices. All of these are possible because of our passionate, dedicated, and professional hairstylist team.

name: AUNTEA JENNY
description: AUNTEA JENNY is a popular brand specializing in fresh fruit teas and fresh milk teas. Originally from Shanghai, we are expanding beyond China, bringing our unique blend of Eastern and Western flavors to locations around the world. With over 8,000 outlets globally, AUNTEA JENNY offers a wide variety of beverages, from tea-based drinks to coffee options, crafted to suit a wide range of tastes. At AUNTEA JENNY, we’re dedicated to delivering fresh, high-quality ingredients in every cup, creating a refreshing and enjoyable experience for tea lovers everywhere.

name: AVEDA
description:
The founder of Aveda, Horst Rechelbacher, had set the brand’s mission to care for the world we live in, from the products made to the ways in which the company strive to give back to the society. Aveda is also striving to set an example for environmental leadership and responsibility towards the world of beauty and the world in whole. What’s unique about Aveda? First, Aveda use 100% post-consumer recycled materials in their packaging. Apart from that, more than 83% of Aveda’s waste is re-used or recycled in the primary manufacturing facility. In manufacturing process, renewable energy such as wind power is fully used to manufactured all Aveda products. The company had invested much efforts in responsible packaging and manufacturing as it is their vision to set new beauty standards of leadership through their commitment to supply chain integrity with traceable, fair and sustainable ingredients. Second, Aveda’s products are also cruelty-free as animals are not used in any test. Being a cruelty-free brand is an important part of Aveda’s mission to care for the world. Third, Aveda uses ingredients derived from the nature such as plants, non-petroleum minerals, water and more. Aveda’s products are also formulated without parabens, phthalates and sodium lauryl sulfate which are harmful to us and the environment. What can you find at Aveda? They offer a range of hair care products for both women and men. For example, shampoo, conditioner, hair treatment, dry shampoo, hair aroma, brush and scalp oils to treat all hair problems. Visit Aveda at Ground floor (Orange zone) for more info and advice by the team!
#BeautyTreats

name: Adonis
description: Beauty is a state of mind. If you look different that doesn't mean you are different from others finally what matters is your character. A stranger can't judge you by your appearance. No matter your age or gender, your body’s largest organ is your skin. If you want your skin especially on the face to look its best and stay healthy, you need to take care of it. Healthy, good looking skin begins with skin care. Facials are an essential ingredient of your overall skin care program and you will love the benefits of facials. A facial is a spa therapy and massage that leaves your skin cleaner, softer, younger, and truly transformed. Facials can help clear clogged pores, quench parched skin and remove dead cells. Facials involve some massage which aids in blood circulation and lymphatic drainage. The facial massage also helps to relax facial muscles which can slow the onset of wrinkles on the face. Puffiness reduction, sagging in the face and skin cell renewal are additional benefits from these massage techniques. Facials help reduce the impact of sun exposure, smoking and other environmental factors as well as incorrect product use. During your facial, your licensed aesthetic, will recommend appropriate skin care for home use to help you continue the benefits of our facial and correct ongoing skin care issues. Adonis, with natural skin care, you don’t have to worry about the added chemicals you aren’t sure are safe. Natural ingredients can help protect against the sun and soothe irritated skin, so they are better for the skin overall as long as you choose the right products for your skin needs. Call Adonis, at Sunway Pyramid to schedule an appointment.

name: Aeroline
description: Aeroline@Sunway connects you with an executive coach for a city-to-city travel to Singapore and Penang in convenience, comfort & reliability!

name: Ah Cheng Laksa
description:
Despite all the fancy and high-class dining experiences that people can find in Sunway Pyramid today, people have always harbored a surprising fondness for the local tastes that they ate growing up. Traditional favorites have long ingrained itself into the taste bud of every person, regardless of which social class you are in, be it the rich man and his craving for the decadent roadside Ramly burger or a simple office worker looking forward to a hearty lunch of char koey teow.
Ah Cheng Laksa is one of those establishments that brings out the best in a local delicacy and transport the eater on a journey away from the stress of the day. Offering a varied menu of local mains and side dishes, the main item to stand out is the infamous laksa (it IS in the name after all, in case anyone is wondering)! With their secret inhouse blend of spices for the laksa soup base, they have elevated the aromatic taste of the dish to new levels of tastiness. For an added twist, customers are encouraged to add the pungent ‘otak udang’ sauce, which is a black paste made from prawn innards to give a special zest to the flavor. Adventurous customers can add some squeezed lime juice and fried onions to the soup, creating a memorable sensation that is hard to forget.
To bolster the delicious laksa, the menu also carries fried chicken meat rolls, more commonly known as the ‘lobak’, which compliments the laksa’s taste. The presence of a meaty dish gives the meal a hearty and filling feel, which may be lacking from just the laksa alone, as the sour-ish soup stimulates the appetite further as you enjoy your meal.
End your meal with a fine dessert, be it a ‘rojak’ or the infamous ABC, every day is a good day at Ah Cheng Laksa!

name: Ainz & Tulpe
description:
Ainz & Tulpe (A&T) is a Japanese beauty and lifestyle store that is home to 250 brands specializing mainly in skincare, healthcare, and cosmetics. It prides itself in housing quality Japanese cosmetics and stores exclusive brands that strive to bring consumers on a journey of self-discovery and timeless beauty.
#BeautyTreats

name: Akemi Home
description: Since 1992, AKEMI has been transforming homes across Southeast Asia and beyond with high-quality home furnishings and bedding accessories. Committed to exceptional craftsmanship, innovation, and sustainability, AKEMI aims to create special moments of togetherness in every family. As the number one bedding brand in Malaysia, AKEMI is proudly represented in eleven countries—Malaysia, Singapore, Brunei, Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, the Philippines, Laos, Fiji, and the Maldives—catering to customers who seek quality and comfort in their homes.

name: Al-Ikhsan Sport
description:
Growing from just a single outlet established in 1993, Al-Ikhsan Sports has quickly expanded to earn its status as Malaysia’s No.1 Sports retailer, carrying an impressive range of sports apparel, equipment and footwear. Starting off as a single store in Johor owned by a husband and wife team, the brand has now multiplied its store count to having more than 130 outlets around the country. The brand’s main purpose is ‘to keep Malaysia fit and active by making sports affordable for all’.
Staying true to their goal of providing affordable sportswear and equipment for their shoppers, Al-Ikhsan offers products from well-known brands at competitive prices. Attaining quality products directly from international brands such as Adidas, New Balance, Puma and many more, they have successfully differentiated themselves from competitors.
Carrying sports apparel for different target audiences such as football fanatics, children, or casual athletes, Al-Ikhsan is able to appeal to everyone’s personal preference! As the exclusive licensee for brand for Liverpool FC, Umbro and Lotto products, fans can make their way to their outlet on LG1 to shop for these. With their own in-house brand AL Sports, the company even launched a Muslimah sportswear range, whereby they introduced a sports hijab for Mulism women who were concerned about modest dressing while maintaining an active lifestyle.
Just recently in November 2019, they received the “Brand of the Year” Award for Malaysia, from World Branding Forum, UK.
Lion is proud to support home-grown brands and loves to watch them successfully become a top player in the industry!

name: Aldo
description:
ALDO is the worldwide destination for on-trend fashion footwear and accessories at accessible prices. Positive, authentic, and bursting with personality, ALDO is the lifestyle brand for people stepping up in the world.
ALDO specializes in the creation of high-quality fashion footwear, leather goods and accessories. The brand pays close attention to detail and to fine craftsmanship. ALDO is dedicated to bringing you both quality and cutting-edge trends at affordable prices, season after season. What’s more, ALDO’s dedicated team of buyers and stylists constantly travel the globe to keep you on the pulse of fashion. Whether the latest footwear trends are breaking in London, Milan, Paris, New York or Tokyo, ALDO will have them on your feet first!
ALDO aims to bring a total customer experience through its people, products and environments. Shopping should be memorable. They represent the company’s belief system and are the greatest articulators of what the ALDO GROUP is all about.

name: Anime Trend
description: The destination for anime lovers and collectors! Anime Trend at Sunway Pyramid puts on its shelves the latest collectible toys, key chains, gifts and figurines of various sizes. You would not miss this shop when walking through Marrakesh at LG2 as the attractive display of action figures facing the walkway would instantly catch your line of sight and make you pause to check it out. Anime Trend mostly specialises in Marvel, Transformers and popular Japanese Anime figures such as One Piece, Bleach and Dragonball. Some smaller sized figurines come in neat boxes which would make suitable gifts for your nephews or little brother or even your man who’s an enthusiast for these merchandises. Cute tsum tsum soft toys and pink girly toys also welcome little girls to check out the shop. Whether you are the one looking for another figurine to add to your collection or looking for quality toys for your loved ones, Anime Trend probably have what you need and more.

name: Animix
description: Retailing of comic books, novels, magazine and related products only

name: Arabian Oud
description: "In the bustling market of the old Alzal souk of Riyadh, a small fragrance boutique, stocking only the finest ingredients, opened its doors in 1982. This was the birthplace of Arabian Oud. Sheikh Abdul-Aziz Al Jasser founded the store with one mission – to source and expertly blend the best oils and scents in the world. This uncompromising dedication to quality still guides the brand today. Arabian Oud has grown from its origins in the Alzal souk to become the largest Arabian fragrance house in the world. We have taken our oriental perfumes and oils, sourced and blended from the finest ingredients, to international markets, gaining many loyal fans as we have expanded. Today we boast over 900 stores worldwide, and our unique, luxurious perfumes are worn by customers from more than 36 countries worldwide. The most highly-prized ingredient of a perfumer’s palette, oud is said to be the first pure incense found on earth. Derived from dark resin found in the trunk of centuries old Aquilaria trees, this unique perfume has a cultural and religious significance dating back to ancient civilisations. Oud has a deep woody scent that persists and evolves over the whole day. Our team of oud hunters practice unwritten rites handed down from generation to generation. Native to southeast Asia, the rare, resinous heartwood forms in the trunks and roots of trees infected with a parasitic mould. Our oud hunters work tirelessly to source and harvest the finest Agarwood, while respecting the delicate balance of nature to conserve this scarce prize for future generations. Our dedicated team of world renowned perfumers and bottle designers promise perfection in every blend. Using their wealth of experience, they sensitively combine exquisite ingredients in beautiful bottles to showcase the very finest in oriental perfumery. As well as our extensive range of retail perfumes, Arabian Oud has created unique blends for international celebrities and royalty."

name: Arokaya House (Thai Traditional Massage)
description: Thai Traditional Massage, Foot Reflexology, Aromatic Body massage, Best Place to unwind.

name: Art Toys Cafe
description: Art Toys Cafe is a colorful and creative space where art meets food. Enjoy artisanal coffee, pastries, and cakes in a whimsical environment filled with oversized and various art toys Join us for play, making it a perfect spot for families and friends to relax and create!

name: Asian Avenue
description:
Discover Asian Avenue, a diverse shopping escapade inspired by some of Asia's most energetic and colourful districts.
Wander through more than 100 outlets in Asian Avenue and express your raw attitude with the latest street styles while indulging in beauty and entertainment.
The fabulous mix of F&B in Asian Avenue also features the best of Asian street cuisine, too good to be missed!

name: Asics
description: Be comfortable while you walk! ASICS is the acronym for the Latin phrase “AnimaSana In Corpore Sano”, which means “Sound Mind In A Sound Body” –it is their echo of consistency, innovation, commitment to quality and authenticity. ASICS has been central to their key objective: Producing innovative sports products solutions and technologies to help athletes and active consumers achieve their goals. With more than 50 years of experience in developing sports footwear and apparel, ASICS's research and development center in Japan work closely with athletes to create innovative sports product solutions for their customers. The core GEL cushioning system and Flytefoam were both renown in enabling the most comfortable and performance-enhancing footwear and apparel for all people. Besides comfort, ASICS is also committed to innovation and sustainability products by using technologies and materials that could help preserve resources and reduce the environmental impact. You will also be amazed by the different features of ASICS footwear with distinctive technologies for maximum comfort. For example, the GLIDERIDE™ design was inspired by the effortless coasting of a bicycle and it will change the way you run! Designed by Hiroaki Nishimura, he got his inspiration by “KORON-KORON”, a Japanese expression for the sound something makes when it tips over and continues toroll on its own, similarly like a bicycle to give an effortless coasting. Moreover,the uniquely curved sole features GUIDESOLE™ TECHNOLOGY served as a shock-absorbing landing zone, which means less fatigue and more miles. Running had beenn made easy with ASICS –your partner for the long run! You can find ASICS store at First Foor.

name: AsterSpring
description: AsterSpring combine the expertise of our highly trained & certified professional skin care therapists with advanced technology & world-leading products to achieve effective, safe & personalised solutions for you. Treating more than 10 million faces since 1984, we are committed to your #GreatSkinHealth, promising optimal results one face at a time.

name: Atmos
description:
Founded by Hidefumi Hommyo in 2000, atmos is known as a prominent Japanese streetwear and sneaker boutique based in Tokyo, Japan. atmos always catch the eyes of sneaker lovers with its ability to follow up with the latest sneakers trends and collaboration with popular brands including Nike, adidas, Puma, Asics, and many more brands. Since atmos' first Kuala Lumpur store opening in 2020, the team has continuously strived to deliver their utmost best to Malaysia’s streetwear community and culture, and here is the opening for flagship store of atmos.
The team aims to build a bridge between Malaysian with Japanese culture, which the store focuses on minimalist aesthetics featuring neutral and monochromatic colors, clean dimensions, and spaces efficiently utilized for unique functionalities of the store. To incorporate the Japanese minimalist aesthetics, the materials used were strictly focused on timber and concrete to provide a memorable in-store experience. The bonsai display and moss wall are the unique elements and representation of the store which brings a meaning of life or living within the store. Besides that, the feature wall highlighting all the latest, in-trend and highly demanded footwear.
Complementing the store, atmos features a Cafe named “No Nonsense”. The “No Nonsense” cafe aesthetics feature a monochromatic, woody color scheme with hints of elements of subgenre Japanese pop culture which creates a cozy yet conducive area for visitors to dwell in their interests while having cultured conversations. To further complement the aesthetics, the cafe offers a curated menu of Japanese servings which emphasizes Japanese strengths in the culinary department.
From the outside, atmos is viewed as a Japanese streetwear shop & a cafe both at the same time portraying two different identities where sneaker culture is at its core, sneakerheads conversing about sneakers over a good cup of tea.

name: Auntie Anne's Pretzel
description:
Award winning US-based company, specialising in soft pretzels with 1314 stores in 45 states and 26 countries, Auntie Anne’s had become the global front runner in pretzel industry. When it landed its shores in Malaysia in 1996, Chrisna Jenio Sdn Bhd has embarked as one of the pioneer of modern snack operator in Malaysia. Being the master franchise holder that operates Auntie Anne's concept in Malaysia, Chrisna Jenio is the first to introduce and offer, fresh, hand rolled soft pretzels outside of United States of America.
Aunti Anne’s Sunway Pyramid uses an open kitchen concept and products being made in a full view of customers and had since serve millions of pretzels to Malaysian pretzel lovers. With 49 locations across Peninsular Malaysia in their belts and with around 250 employees, they are serving 9 million freshly baked pretzels yearly. With their proven track record in serving quality food in a sustainable environment, they are passionately involved in every aspect of the operations. All of their stores are company-owned, thus ensuring the commitment on delivering quality in every Auntie Anne’s store in Malaysia.
The company’s mission is to provide fresh, hot and golden brown soft pretzels, friendly and courteous service in a sparkling clean store. With this in mind, it will satisfy customers to keep them coming back as their aim is to turn Malaysia into a better tasting place tasty pretzels. Having pretzel perfect experience of 23 years, and blessed with the opportunity to be one of the pioneers in the modern food retail industry in Malaysia, they are prepared to expand and grow while the same time serving Malaysian pretzel lovers with more great and wholesome choices of product. Opening one at Sunway Pyramid is truly an honour to serve the best pretzels they can offer to customers from different backgrounds.

name: Auri
description:
AURI
Founded in 2020, AURI is a community-centric fashion brand with a mission to provide you with the most comfortable & versatile clothing that suits your everyday. Our ideology was clear from the inception: we wanted to build a community to inspire and uplift for a better self, to feel good from the inside.
So here we are, after 2 pandemic years, building our very first flagship store at Sunway Pyramid! At AURI, we believe that everyone deserves to experience comfort in its truest form. When did fashion and confidence become synonymous with discomfort and accepted as the norm? We’re here to help women like you find the comfort you deserve.
Pop in for a visit at G1.79 & 1.80 for matching mummy & mini outfits too. We welcome you to our community, a place to inspire, to share & to shop. Created with YOU in mind because "Actually, you are the inspiration".

name: Ayam Penyet Express
description:
Penyet Express is your passport to authentic Indonesian and Malaysian flavors. We specialize in the art of "penyet," smashing fresh ingredients to release their full potential. Our dishes are a bold, flavorful journey to Southeast Asia.
From the fiery sambal to our signature ayam penyet, every bite transports you to the heart of these culinary traditions. We source the finest local ingredients and prepare them with care to ensure quality in every dish.
Whether you're grabbing a quick lunch, sharing a meal with family, or indulging with friends, Penyet Express promises an unforgettable taste adventure. Our food isn't just a meal; it's an experience.
Join us and savor the vibrant, aromatic, and authentic tastes of Southeast Asia. Penyet Express is where flavor meets tradition, and every bite is a taste of our passion for great food.

name: BOBO STATION
description: Bobo name was inspired by one of the Japan anime which is very cute and brings lots of happiness to people around her. On the other hand, Bobo is a word that’s easy to be remembered so we added “Station” on the back to let everyone remember us as BoboStation. “A station that is everywhere for you 24hour”. In this stress world of ours, we human beings are lack of a lot of joy & entertainments. Which is why the concept of BoboStation arcades & vending machines can bring so much ease to them. Besides entertainment machines, Bobo Station will also establish Food & Beverages by using latest technologies of Vending Machines, Eat , Drink and be merry by using machines.

name: BRILLIANT
description:
Incepted in 2000 as Brilliant Time Enterprise, rebranded as Brilliant Watch Sdn. Bhd. in 2018. We started with selling low-cost and low-end watches in the morning and night market. Our transformation began with setting up counters at local supermarkets.
We have since grown to be one of the leading brands in the timepiece industry, with a total of 13 shops and kiosk across Penang, Perak and Selangor. Through the expansion and recognitions, we have upgraded our products from low-end to low-middle-end and high-end categories.

name: BUNGKUS KAW KAW
description:
Bungkus Kaw Kaw is famous for strong, full-flavoured traditional foods & beverages made
from our own secret family recipes. Our name comes from the Malay word “bungkus” (take
away) and the Hokkien word “kaw” (thick).
Just say “bungkus kaw kaw” and you’ll get an authentic, full-bodied Malaysian drink to go,
packed in a plastic bag and secured with a red plastic cord that also serves as a carrier sling.
Quench your thirst with authentic, traditional drinks like Teh Tarik, Kopi or Cham. We aim to
be in every town and city in Malaysia, so everybody can say “Bungkus Kaw Kaw!”
With the influx of foreign coffee franchises, it has become difficult to buy authentic
traditional beverages, especially in shopping malls and offices. Bungkus Kaw Kaw’s mission is
to make these familiar favourites widely available again, made fresh-to-order in the original,
full-flavoured way, at an affordable price. And like all self-respecting mamaks, kopitiams and
warungs, we have our own home-made secret recipes and pride ourselves on pulling no
punches in giving you the strongest, perfect traditional brew.
Our signature drinks, Kopi Kaw Kaw, Teh Tarik Kaw Kaw and Cham Kaw Kaw are made the
good old-fashioned way to ensure the taste of authenticity and traditional. Not only our
lokal drinks are great, we also offer a variety of foods such as Nasi Lemak, Chee Cheong Fun,
Loh Mai Kai, Bihun Siam, Kuih Muih, Roti Bakar, etc. That shape our Malaysian culture today!
Now we are available in Sunway Pyramid, this is a great addition for everyone to enjoy a
lokal authentic drink or food from its taste of Malaysia. To satisfy your lokal cravings, do give
Bungkus Kaw Kaw a try!

name: Baby Stroller
description:
Shopping can be a tiring activity!
Let your children have a break with baby strollers, tandem, child wheelchair or toddler cart.
Visit our Concierges located on G Floor & LG2 Marrakesh to rent. Reservation is available via phone call at 03-7494 3100 or 03-7494 3102 OR via online booking on our Sunway Malls Super App. The reservation will be hold within 20 - 30 minutes of the reservation.
*Terms & Conditions:
• Children using the baby stroller must be below 100 cm & weights not more than 15 kg.
• RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
• 4 hours of usage.
• Do not leave child unattended.
• Do not leave your handbag/shopping bags on stroller/hanging on the handle unattended.
• Use the lift to access different floors.
• Fasten seatbelts at all times.

name: Babyshop
description:
Babyshop - Malaysia’s Most Loved Mother & Baby Store
Babyshop is a one-stop destination for all your child’s needs and is a pioneer in the omni-channel retail space. The brand offers a comprehensive range of merchandise and services for kids up to 10 years old, through its own private label Juniors, Giggles, Eligo, and through partnerships with some of the world’s leading brands such as Philips Avent, Tommee Tippee, Dr. Brown’s, Graco, Joie, Disney, Barbie, Hello Kitty, Lee Cooper etc.
‘My Baby Expert’, a personalized service comprising of experienced shopping assistants was introduced in 2018 and is designed to help pregnant & new mums navigate the sometimes-overwhelming task of stocking up on all the essentials in preparation for the birth of a new child. By providing the largest collection of children’s apparels, toys, furniture, travel systems and baby basics, the brand is trusted by millions of parents across the Middle East, Africa and Southeast Asia, to provide exceptional quality, at the best value combined with great customer service.
Shop for your favourite Babyshop products anytime, anywhere now at - https://bit.ly/babyshopwebsite . Alternatively, you can also chat & buy with us at - https://bit.ly/bbysunwaychatnow

name: BananaBro
description:
Bananabro is your new favourite banana leaf restaurant that’s modern, authentic and best of all, perfect for get-togethers with your friends and family over fresh and hot meals with flavours that pack a punch!
The age old culture of serving rice on banana leaf takes on a new direction at Bananabro without forgetting the very essence of the tradition. While we primarily focus on serving banana leaf meals, we pride ourselves in serving only fresh ingredients with intense flavours in generous amounts to satisfy your banana leaf needs. We use the freshest ingredients and do not cut corners. If it isn’t good enough to serve to our own families, we won’t serve it to our customers.
Taking inspiration from India’s streets, arts and cultures, Bananabro elevates your dining experience giving you a taste of its authentic southern region through modern and contemporary touches in our decor, dishes and drinks.
We are here to cater to the those who love food, and as Malaysians we all love food!

name: Barry Smith
description: As you’re busy planning your next vacation or business trip, make sure not to overlook the importance of a good-quality luggage. If you don’t have one or hand, or you ‘re in need of a new one, stop by Barry Smith at Sunway Pyramid to shop for that faithful travel companion! Originating from the United Kingdom and setting foot in over 15 countries to date, the brand offers an array of products including luggage, brief bags, backpacks, wallets, and more. Each piece of luggage is designed to fit any travel scenario be it formal or casual, business or leisure, and are ideal for those who prefer a touch of class without forsaking functionality and practicality. Hardside luggage are available for travellers who like a solid and sturdier feel to protect fragile items in their suitcase. The brand also carries a line of softside luggage with multiple compartments on the inside and outside for you neatly organise your belongings, while giving you the option to expand the luggage if needed. Besides deciding on hard or soft luggage, they also take other aspects into consideration, such as the number of wheels, the size of the luggage and the colour range. Barry Smith also offers a range of pilotcases that are the portable with multi-compartments to sort your items. Easy to manoeuvre, durable and secure – Barry Smith luggage are truly a reliable travel companion. The brand also has a collection of laptop backpacks for the traveller who needs to use their laptop on-the-go, with some even being equipped with USB charging ports so you won’t have to worry about your laptop battery running out if you’re away from a power socket. Another essential for travelling is a well-organised wallet to keep all your cash and cards secure and organised. Shop their selection of genuine calf leather unisex wallets available with RFID blocking feature to keep the content of your wallet secure. Get a genuine leather car key holder wallet with card slots and an ID card window that’s easy for you to arrange your things in order for a smooth journey ahead!

name: Baskin Robbins
description:
From sweet celebrations during good times, to cherished memories with close ones, ice cream has long held a special place in each taster’s heart. Founded in 1945 in Glendale, California, Baskin-Robbins has grown to become one of the world’s largest chain of ice cream specialty shops while keeping true to its neighborhood ice cream parlor values. Baskin-Robbins was co-founded by brothers-in-law and ice cream enthusiasts Irvine “Irv” Robbins and Burton “Burt” Baskin. Robbins worked in his father’s ice cream shops as a teen, while Baskin produced ice cream for his fellow U.S. Navy troops while serving in World War II. Upon Burt’s return from war, the entrepreneurs made their vision of creating a family-friendly ice cream shop a reality.
In its early days, Baskin-Robbins 31® began with a selection of 31 flavors – a different one for each day of the month. Today, Baskin-Robbins’ menu has grown to over a thousand delightful ice cream flavors and an ever expanding assortment of delicious treats – often creating new delicacies to fit local tastes as well! From blended drinks, ice cream, frozen yoghurt, ice cream cakes, sundaes and even to milkshakes, Baskin-Robbins is sure to have something for everyone! Having received halal certification by IFANCA as well, Baskin-Robbins strive to uphold the standards and quality of their offerings at all times. There are many forms of enjoyment in life: there’s spontaneous pleasure, anticipated pleasure, there is long-term happiness and there are spur-of-the-moment joys. For people everywhere, ice cream has probably generated each of those types of pleasure. Sweeten your life with a trip to Baskin-Robbins today!

name: Baskin-Robbins

The Signature collection includes body wash, body lotions, body creams, fragrance mists and body scrubs, with items that are tailored to both men and women. C.O. The Travel Body Care items are 3-ounce bottles of body lotion, shower gel, fine fragrance mists and body creams. The Aromatherapy collection also has a limited selection of products in the Travel Body Care collection. We just want you to love it! Return anything, any time and any reason. name: Batter Bing 不二卷煎饼果子

name: Bee Cheng Hiang
description:
Being a well-known name for Chinese delicacies, Bee Cheng Hiang takes its root in Singapore in 1933, where an enterprising street hawker peddled the streets of Chinatown selling freshly barbequed meat. Business was especially brisk during festive seasons for this high-quality traditional delicacy, which Mr Teo Swee Ee introduced as ‘bakkwa’. Through his passion for calligraphy and divination, he created the Bee Cheng Hiang brand name, 美珍香. Each character is composed with nine calligraphic strokes, signifying brand longevity and a representation of the Bee Cheng Hiang experience. Today, the brand has spread across many parts of the world, including our very own Sunway Pyramid!
Visitors to their shops are treated to the sight, smell and taste of our products. Unchanged since 1933, their recipe retains the traditional taste, and is uncompromising in quality. Each bakkwa are still hand crafted, over traditional bamboo sieves. That’s why no two pieces are the same. The meat is smoked for hours over the slow burning flames of charcoal.
Bee Cheng Hiang is more than just a ‘bakkwa’ company. Their Vision is to be Asia’s leading food company: providing quality products and services to the global market. In a world where food safety is of utmost importance, customers can enjoy their products with a peace of mind. Each bakkwa are made with 100% natural ingredients, without added meat tenderizer, preservatives, artificial flavouring or colouring and MSG.
This has remained true since their inception in 1933 and remains true today. Today, with more than 370 outlets in 12 territories, Bee Cheng Hiang is still committed to their core mission to be the best at helping people to experience and share enjoyable moments in everyday life.

name: Bega
description: Retailing of fashion apparel and related accessories.

name: Ben'S Cookies
description: Ben's Cookies bakes the magic into every bite. Originating from the heart of England, our cookies are crafted from original recipes with only the finest ingredients, including chunks of delicious chocolate, nuts, etc. Fresh, comforting, and utterly satisfying, each cookie promises a taste of homemade goodness. Perfect for those who appreciate the finer, richer, and more indulgent side of life.

name: Benjamin Barker
description: A modern-day gentlemen’s outfitter. Weaving the art of living into the fabric of life. Experience the #BenjaminBarker lifestyle today.

name: Beryl's
description: Beryl’s Chocolate & Confectionery is one of Malaysia’s leading chocolate manufacturers with the finest selection of premium chocolates. Established in 1995, Beryl’s Chocolate is driven by the continuous goal of creating the best quality chocolates using premium ingredients sourced from all over the world. With over 200 varieties of premium chocolates and other confectionery goods, Beryl’s Chocolates always has the perfect treat for any occasion whether it’s for a light snack or a gift for someone special. With its recent opening of a new outlet at Sunway Pyramid, Beryl’s Chocolates is now more available than ever before with more than 16 outlets nationwide.

name: Beutea
description:
Beutea - a modern tea beverage brand using "Freshly Brewed Chinese Tea"
(a combination of ancient Chinese and modern tea beverage). Beutea practices the four ancient tea ceremony skills “moisten”, “soak”, “boil”, and “brew” using extract from the finest hand-picked tea leaves originating from tea mountains of Yunnan and Wuyi in China as the base of their beverages. It is then blended with modern flavours such as fresh milk and fresh fruits to brew unique, exquisite, aromatic and delicious fresh tea beverages.
“A sip of tea lingers, two sips come with a long aftertaste” serves as the purpose of founding the brand as we aspire to be the top unique and delicious fresh tea beverage brand. Beutea has always adhered to and maintained the high-quality requirements for tea beverages.
Beutea originated from the love and pursuit of the perfect cup of tea in life. We pour our hearts and souls into crafting each store, integrating elements of “ancient tea culture”, “modern” and “aesthetics” into the store’s interior design, creating a space with rich textures and bringing tea drinkers a multi-dimensional sensory experience! Order a cup of fine tea, savour the aroma and have great conversations while sipping the perfect cup in a relaxed and beautiful environment at Beutea!

name: Birkenstock
description:
Discover the timeless comfort and style of BIRKENSTOCK iconic footwear brand. With a rich history since 1774, Birkenstock has been synonymous with quality and wellness for generations. Birkenstock's commitment to craftsmanship and innovation propelled them to become a global leader in orthopedic footwear. Their signature contoured footbed, made from natural materials, offers unparalleled support and comfort, ensuring happy feet all day long.
At BIRKENSTOCK Sunway Pyramid, renowned for its vibrant atmosphere and diverse range of offerings, making it a hub for fashion and lifestyle enthusiasts, you'll find a wide range of BIRKENSTOCK products that cater to diverse lifestyles. From their classic Arizona sandals, featuring adjustable straps and a cork-latex footbed and sneakers, there's a perfect pair for everyone. Step into a world of wellness and style with Birkenstock at Sunway Pyramid Mall.

name: Black Tap Craft Burgers & Shakes
description:
Black Tap Craft Burgers & Shakes is an award-winning restaurant brand that specializes in mouth-watering craft burgers and its world-famous CrazyShake® milkshakes.
The first-ever Black Tap venture into Malaysia, this edgy, urban concept restaurant offers a casual vibe reminiscent of a classic American luncheonette with a distinctly New York feel, complete with 80s and 90s hip-hop and pop music and art covered walls. Sit back and savour an amazing array of all-American dishes, elevated to the highest level of whimsicality and originality, featuring a delectable menu of American comfort food, including burgers, sandwiches and salads! Diners can also enjoy some of the best craft beers from around the globe!

name: Boardriders
description:
We are pleased to announce the opening of the first Boardriders store at Lot F1 60 & 61 in Sunway Pyramid, Subang Jaya. Come visit us today as we weill be housing a range of leading brands such as Quiksilver, Roxy, Billabong, DC Shoes and RVCA!
Boardriders is a leading action sports and lifestyle company that designs, produces and distributes branded apparel, footwear and accessories for Boardriders around the world. Our apparel and footwear brands represent a casual lifestyle for young-minded people who are inspired by a passion for outdoor action sports.
#WeAreBoardriders #BoardridersMY

name: Boat Noodle
description: Boat Noodle provides authenticity in taste, impactful flavour and an overall ambience that caters to your every celebration. Our noodles are served hot with a flavorful soup and in a small bowl. We bring the atmosphere of the streets of Bangkok, so our décor is decked with wooden chairs and tables to evoke the Thai street food vibe
