name: Bonia
description: A lifestyle brand founded in 1974 that creates both timeless and reimagined classics, BONIA curates a seasonal collection of bags, accessories, footwear, watches, eyewear and more – each piece crafted to be loved and stand the test of time as a companion for life. With a vision rooted in craftsmanship and individuality, BONIA aims to fuel your sense of self-expression and exploration.

name: Boost Juice Bars
description:
Boost Juice - the nation’s favourite makers of fresh smoothies and juices! We serve millions of Malaysians our iconic green cups, filled with fruits and veggies deliciousness.
Here at Boost we’ve made it our pledge to get more fruits and veggies into every customers day and make healthy living easy! So naturally, nutrition is a key component in developing our range of smoothies and juices that sees us blending through millions of tonnes of fruits and veggies every year.
Deliciousness that comes from simple, natural goodness, served to you with a love life attitude that will make you so happy!
Don’t believe us? Come and see us at any Boost Juice store in Malaysia and try it for yourself.

name: Borneo Pearl
description:
Elegant and feminine, pearls are the perfect addition for achieving that classy appearance for any special occasion – and Borneo Pearls at Sunway Pyramid is where you’ll find a collection of pearls that you’ll fall in love with. Having been in the industry for more than 20 years, Borneo Pearls has made its mark in the industry by offering high quality jewellery that is carefully handcrafted by trained artisans. These exquisite pieces come in various sizes, colours and styles to choose from - there's a pearl for every girl! They offer both freshwater and seawater pearls in the form of necklaces, rings, bracelets and earrings. Interesting fact about their products, freshwater pearls are formed in mussels, whereas saltwater pearls are formed in oysters! These exclusive pearls from Borneo will enhance any outfit whether it’s with their classic or contemporary design.
They even offer Golden South Sea pearls, originating from the largest pearl-producing oyster, hence generally larger than most saltwater pearl varieties and take a longer time grow, estimated to grow between 2-4 years. So how are these prized South Sea beauties valued? It typically depends mostly on the colour of the pearl! Rare and highly desired, they range from beautiful shades of creamy white to deep gold, with shades of yellow and champagne falling in between. Pearls that have a deeper golden colour are considered more valuable, such as how the deepest golden colour, being referred to as 24 karat, is said to be the most valuable colour for South Sea pearls. However, these pearls may not be perfectly spherical as they have very thick nacre. When pearls are harvested, there is usually a large amount of drop pearls, baroque pearls, circle pearls and button pearls. With Borneo Pearl’s wide offerings of designs, you’ll find something to suit your taste whether it’s a minimalistic or sophisticated design you’re looking for.

name: Brands Outlet
description:
Having been around in the fashion industry for more than 10 years, Brand’s Outlet prides itself in offering the hottest fashion at amazing prices. Drop by their huge outlet in Sunway Pyramid to check out he brand that has become synonymous with stylish and high-quality clothing that are priced affordably. Terming themselves as an ‘all-in-one’ store, they have consolidated numerous brands to offer a wide range of essentials for men, women and children. In this one store, enjoy endless shopping as they cater to your every need, from casual wear to formal wear, sleepwear to innerwear, shoes to accessories – the choices seem almost unlimited! Feel free to unleash your inner fashionista and mix and match different pieces, all under one roof. Every time you step in, it’s like fashion wonderland - with new designs from various brands coming in frequently, plus a good deal to help keep your shopping spree at an affordable price.
Families will love shopping here as parents pick out great outfits not only for themselves but for their littles ones as well. Super adorable and yet highly functional to cater to a child’s many movements while they go about having fun, you won’t need to worry about them feeling uncomfortable. For the little one you’ve just welcomed into this world, you’ll find uber cute romper sets that come with matching mittens, beanies, bibs and booties. If you’re looking to dress up your little toddler, check out the gorgeous party frocks for special occasions, or casual wear that they’ll love to play in.
For the teens and young adults, especially those who love to experiment with fashion, the combinations are endless with Brand’s Outlet’s offerings of t-shirts, jeans, khakis, shorts, miniskirts, leggings, midi skirts, blouses, shirts, maxi skirts, dresses and more! Whatever pattern or style you prefer, they’ll have it. Don’t forget to top off that stylish look with an accessory – browse through their range of belts, hats, hair clips, and hair bands for that finishing touch!

name: Braun Büffel
description: Leatherwear

name: Bread History
description:
Bread History originally is from Penang, Malaysia, now baking to serve at Sunway Pyramid. Bread History is an ongoing bakery organization specializing in developing quality bakery experiences throughout the Northern Region of Malaysia with additional diversified businesses associated with the industry.
Founded and driven by company entrepreneur, Mr. Simon Au Yong, the company was established in 2003, at Prangin Mall, Georgetown, and now operates more than 20 high driven quality bakery chains with exciting projects under development, in addition to the portfolio-associated businesses within the portfolio.
Bread History Sdn Bhd owns and operates our chains by partnering with international pastry/bakery chefs to facilitate the development of our brands in the Northern Region of Malaysia as we have built a strong platform in this industry. As a well-known brand in that region, we are aiming to expand our brand so everyone in Malaysia can experience Bread History.
To date, we are a multi-award-winning bakery chain with (15) boutique bakeries, (2) European bread bakery (Savour Bakery), (3) cafes under (1) central kitchen, with up to (320) employees and serving more than (100) types of buns, loaves, dry cakes and signature cakes every day and excite cake lovers with customized cake. Bread History Sdn Bhd are expanding our business by establishing (3) more outlets with 24 Xpress (mart) since year 2018 along with (3) Bread History Mart outlet.

name: Brooks
description: Regardless of whether you enjoy running as a past-time, or as a form of achieving that ideal body, as a competitive sport, you’ll need a pair of running shoes that’ll help you to go the distance, and that’s just what you’ll find here at Brooks in Sunway Pyramid! Founded in 1914, the American brand now focuses its energy on producing top-quality shoes for running, and concentrates on bringing the best performance technology to both men and women that’ll enable you to step up your game in the world of running. Encouraging you to follow your body and find your style of running, Brooks Run Signature lets you dial in how you want each run to feel so that you get more out of each stride, allowing you to choose from five different run experiences. Their Cushion line ensures that its soft and protective to cushion your every step. The Connect series is lightweight and flexible, enabling you to naturally feel your run. The Energize collection is responsive and springy, providing an extra lift to you stride. The Speed series is designed to be fast and streamlined so you can propel through your run. The Trail selection is created for you to venture out and trek the outdoor world. Brooks recognises that no two runners are the same, they offer various shoes that are suited for either roads, tracks, hiking trails or even cross-country runs. Using varying performance technology for the midsole, outsole, upper and the overall support of the shoe, you’ll find the most comfortable fit that helps you perform at your peak on your next run. Their shoes also cater to different feet arches, whether you need a medium, high or flat arch. Available in different sizes and also widths, these shoes come in a multitude of eye-catching colours that are bound to match your style preference. Brooks also offers apparel, manufacturing top-quality sports bras, shorts, and tights that are suitable for women when they run, be it short or long distance. Men can also shop for tights and runners’ jackets here to match their pair of shoes.

name: Buggy Kiddy Car Service
description: Kidde ride services available!

name: Buggy Rides
description:
For those with special needs, take a free ride and we will stop you at the nearest destination to the mall.
Available at B1 near Sunway Pyramid Hotel.
Pick up point from Clio Hotel CP2, CP3 and CP4 car park lift lobby
Drop off point at CP3 orange entrance

name: Burger King
description:
Every day, more than 11 million guests visit their local BURGER KING restaurants all around the world. And they do so because Burger King restaurants are known for serving high-quality, great tasting, and affordable food. Founded in 1954, BURGER KING® is the second largest fast food hamburger chain in the world.
BURGER KING commenced its earliest operations in Malaysia in 1997 with the opening of its first restaurant at the Sungai Buloh Overhead Bridge. Today, Cosmo Restaurants Sdn Bhd operates more than 50 BURGER KING restaurants all across Malaysia, where customers across the country can enjoy the great and healthy flame-grilled taste of Burger King products. Beyond just burgers, Burger King's menu has expanded from a basic offering of burgers, French fries, sodas, and milkshakes to a larger and more diverse set of products. In 1957, the "Whopper" became the first major addition to the menu, and it has become Burger King's signature product since. Burger King has also tailored its menu for regional tastes. With a local twist of variations to their burgers and menu, Burger King has introduced many interesting menus such as the infamous limited edition Nasi Lemak Burger and Satay Burgers, as well as the Nasi King combo to cater to their Asian customers. Even their drinks and side orders are varied from time to time, especially during festive periods such as Raya!
The original HOME OF THE WHOPPER, their commitment to premium ingredients, signature recipes, and family-friendly dining experiences is what has defined Burger King for over 50 successful years. First off a hot broiler in 1957, the WHOPPER, boasting a quarter pound of flame-grilled beef, ripe tomatoes, crisp lettuce, creamy mayo, ketchup, onions and crunchy pickles on a toasted sesame seed bun, has become the iconic burger for the ages and boasts generations of fans worldwide.

name: C Culture
description: Retailing of fashion apparel and related accessories.

name: CHAGEE
description: CHAGEE is a modern and innovative premium tea house brand with rich cultural roots in Yunnan. As one of the earliest regional teahouse chains, CHAGEE remains dedicated to authentic tea culture. The Fresh Milk Tea series is beloved by tea enthusiasts and milk tea lovers worldwide, especially in Malaysia, positioning CHAGEE as a leading global premium tea house.

name: CHARLES & KEITH
description:
CHARLES & KEITH is the go-to fashion label for stylish urbanites, recognized for its curated collections of relevant designs. Founded in 1996 by entrepreneurs Charles Wong and Keith Wong with the purpose to spark joy and confidence in fashion-forward women by providing footwear designs that are versatile and appeal to on-trend sensibilities, the brand has evolved to offer a full-fledged line of footwear, bags, eyewear, accessories and costume jewelry.
Anchored by its four brand values – Experimental, Desirable, Curated and Modern – CHARLES & KEITH aims to celebrate and inspire women every day. With over 600 brick-and-mortar stores in its global network, CHARLESKEITH.COM extends the brand’s reach through the United States of America, Asia Pacific and Europe.

name: CHATEAU DE C.A.F.F.E.I.N.E.E.S
description:
Operation Hour: 10AM - 11PM
Founded and fueled by passion for good food and hospitality, Chateau de C.A.F.F.E.I.N.E.E.S has grown from a humble coffee joint in 2006 to a unique cafe restaurant with a colorful mix of diners from young professionals to families and students.

Chateau de C.A.F.F.E.I.N.E.E.S is renowned for its fine coffees and offers a wide selection of international wines, beers and cocktails. Our menu offers an east meets west concept deisgned to satiate the palates of diners from breakfast to supper.
location: Eight Gourmets Gala (EGG), Suite G-01, The Pinnacle Annexe (Ground Floor)

name: CHATERAISE
description:
Founded at 20 December 1954 in Kofu, Yamanashi. Ever since our foundation, we at Châteraisé cherish the idea of pleasing our customers by placing great importance on ingredients, and through improving the efficiency of our production. In the end, it’s all about delivering natural and tasty products for a reasonable price. It’s all because we want to please our customers.
With our products, we want our customers to become sound in both mind and body.
We want to make them happy and to be a sweets store which is loved by all.
That, is our wish. Châteraisé will keep challenging itself, because we want to see lots of smiles.

name: CHIC STUDIO
description: Retailing of ladies fashion and other related accessories.

name: CK Dental Surgery
description:
General practice dental clinic; for normal dental treatment, Cosmetic Dentistry, Endodontic, Periodontic, Prosthetics, Oral Surgery, Intra-oral X-Ray and more.
(Tues close. Wed-Monday 10am-8pm)

name: CMY
description: Retailing of HiFi, Audio & Visual, Home Theatre and others related product and accessories.

name: COMPASIA Trade-In
description:
CompAsia is one of the biggest names in tech recommerce across Southeast Asia. The CompAsia Sunway Pyramid store is the brand’s first major retail establishment. After garnering major success through online transactions, patrons of the store can now experience the efficiency and reliability of CompAsia’s trade-in services in a tangible way. With over 10 years in dealing with preloved tech, the business has expanded, providing high quality products and services in over 10 countries. A strong 4.8 star rating on Google is testament to the outstanding customer experiences provided. Every device that goes through us is thoroughly checked to ensure functionality and security, inside and out. Our data wipe process adheres to global standards, making us one of only a handful of tech companies able to make this claim.
The recommerce of tech in other words, is the buying and selling of devices, prolonging its usability. Not only is this more cost effective to consumers, it is undeniably better for the planet. The manufacturing of smart devices consumes vast amounts of resources including power, water (during the mining process), precious metals and more. Some of the materials found in smart devices can also be toxic when disposed of irresponsibly. The mission of CompAsia is to extend the usability of devices, reducing the need to mass manufacture. According to Statista, around 1.5 billion brand new smart devices are sold each year, taking a massive toll on our planet and its natural resources. By properly ensuring the quality of the preowned devices that go through us, we are able to help consumers adopt a sustainable lifestyle that is also going to save them money.
Aside from trade-ins, CompAsia also sells, finances and provides care for smart devices. Additionally, CompAsia works with many well-known brands across telcos, tech manufacturers, retailers and more. Our strong partnerships, along with tried and tested solutions are in line with our mission to maximise affordability, while minimising e-waste.

name: COTTON ON BODY
description: Get in shape with Cotton On Body’s range of products at Sunway Pyramid, designed to help you live out a healthy and active lifestyle! Launched in 2007 by the famous Cotton On Group, the brand presents women with an assortment of products catering to every female’s body type. For that next workout session, you’re going to need activewear that doesn’t just make you feel empowered because it looks amazing, but it also needs to be comfortable and stretchable enough. Comfy and stylish, their line of yoga pants and tights are available in full length or capris, in fun prints and bright colours. Pair this with their range of workout tank tops and sporty singlets which are sure to become not only your workout essential at the gym, but also a necessity for your athleisure-look on a casual day. Their sports bras and active crop tops have you covered with its support and comfortable fabrics, suitable for every sport you play. Shop their selection of innerwear today! You’ll find matching lingerie sets, and an extensive range of bras including cotton bras, lace panties, bralettes, contour bras, bandeaus, push-up bras, strapless bras, wireless bras, and more. Browse their range of g-strings, bikinis panties, briefs, boyleg underwear and seamless panties that are comfy enough for everyday wear to keep you feeling confident. Your sleep session will never be the same with Cotton On Body’s assortment of pajamas, nighties, sleeping gowns, loungewear and robes. Pampering yourself has never been easier as you slip into their comfortable sleepwear, perfect for a good night’s rest. With your beach body ready, it’s important to get swimwear that flatters your figure, check out the brand’s bikini tops and bottoms, one-pieces, and also beach cover-ups. For the mum-to-be or new mommies, who says you can’t get in shape with a bump? Cotton On Body even has a range of maternity active wear just for you, to stay fit and healthy for you and your baby!

name: Cactus Paradise
description: Retailing of mini-cactus in plastic/ceramic pots, ceramic pots and dish, potted cactus accessories/miniature figures, fertilizers and sprays and small gardening tools only.

name: Calistee Accessories
description:
Calistee Accessories is now available at Sunway Pyramid! Calistee Accessories was founded in 2019, started out by selling accessories with small booths at various venues. The purpose of doing this is mainly to find and observe fashion senses from different people at different places. This would help in to understand and improve on our line of accessories.
Calistee Accessories are heavily inspired by South Korean's style. All the earrings that sold consist of 925 silver needles which are all hypoallergenic making them safe for everyone to wear. Besides that, there are also necklaces, sunglasses, socks, and various hair accessories. All the goods are carefully selected by us which ensures quality. The aim of this is to make customers enjoy browsing and shopping for accessories with us.
Sunway Pyramid is chosen to establish our first branch is because Sunway City is known as a strategic location compose of shopping malls, hospitals, hotels, tourist attractions, and other facilities which deliver people or tourists from a different region or nationality who visits. Calistee Accessories strongly believes that this will be a good opportunity to reach out to more customers to visit the store. Other than that, Sunway Pyramid is popularly known as Malaysia’s first themed shopping and mall full of entertainment. This landmark has attracted millions of visitors.

name: Calvin Klein
description:
Calvin Klein is a fashion lifestyle brand with bold, progressive ideals and a sensual aesthetic that is recognized worldwide. Our modern and minimalist approach to design, provocative imagery and authentic connection to culture has resonated with customers for over 50 years.

Founded in 1968 by Calvin Klein and his business partner Barry Schwartz, we have built our reputation as a leader in American fashion through the distinct Calvin Klein brand lines and a licensed range of products. We were acquired by PVH Corp. in 2003. For more information, please visit http://www.calvinkl

name: Car Park Help Desk
description:
Having issues in the Car Park? Visit the Car Park Help Desk!
Car Park Help Desk Operating Hours:
8am - 4am
CP3 / B1
Need urgent help? Contact the Help Desk via the number below.

name: Caring Pharmacy
description:
CARiNG Pharmacy was established in September 1994, starting off as a humble pharmacy located in Taman Muda, Cheras. The pharmacy was the result of 5 pharmacist course-mates coming together with a shared vision to provide quality and affordable healthcare solutions to the rakyat. At the time, the awareness of community pharmacy services was still low. The founders took these important steps to instill the value of pharmacists in the healthcare profession:
-Providing 12 hours a day, 7 days a week, full time pharmacist service.
-Providing easily accessible pharmacist counseling service, free blood pressure checks and other health checks at a minimum fee.
-Designing the store with a modern, open concept to maximize interaction with customers and merchandise.

name: Cars International
description: In the car beauty care industry since 1973, CARs International is well-known for its ability to deliver good-value service packages and long-term car beauty care for all customers. Offering a variety ranges of professional car restoration services, each carried out to the utmost level of care and quality according to the ISO:9001 tenets. You may pamper your car with vacuuming, interior and engine cleaning, washing, polishing, waxing and many more here! Furthermore, deodorizing or sterilization treatment for your car can also be done here! Adhering to their own professional services and premium quality policies, CARs have expanded more than 70 centres in Malaysia and over 200 centres in Asia-Pacific. Throughout the years, the brand had earned several accolades such as the Enterprise 50 Award (2001), Golden Bull Award (2003), the Largest Chain of Car Beauty Care Centres in the Malaysia Book of Records 2003, and the Superbrands Award (2005).

name: Caudalie
description:
"THE ART OF THE GRAPEVINE
It all began in Bordeaux, in the heart of the vines at Château Smith Haut Lafitte, the estate belonging to Mathilde’s parents. Caudalie is a unique story of love, nature, passion, chance encounters and a sense of adventure!"

name: Celebrity Fitness
description: Celebrity Fitness pioneers a unique lifestyle concept by blending health & fitness within an entertainment ambience, ensuring workouts are high energy, motivational and entertaining. Our Sunway Pyramid club offers over 100 classes per week covering dance, aerobics, functional training, mixed martial arts, yoga and cycling. We run popular Les Mills programs plus our own truly unique classes like StrikeTM, BootcampTM and PelotonTM. Celebrity Fitness Sunway Pyramid has among the largest free-weight areas, cycling studios and private ladies only gym facilities in all of Malaysia. Discounted student and family monthly membership available.

name: Cerruti 1881
description: The founder of Cerruti is Nino Cerruti, whom was an Italian stylist and fashion designer. He took over his family business when he was only 20 years old. From then, he was filled with vision and an expert in production procedures. By that, he began to modernise the textile manufacture to incorporate clothing production. Cerruti focus in producing luxury goods such as ready-to-wear, jeans, fragrances, watches and accessories. Nino and his team had launched a men’s ready-to-wear collection in 1957 that received widespread coverage in the press and the public hailed it as a revolution in the fashion industry. By that, the House of Cerruti was known to be a Parisian Fashion House with Italian roots. In 1967, he established Cerruti 1881 which will be the luxury ready-to-wear line for men.

name: ChaPanda
description:
"ChaPanda reimagines Chinese tea for a new generation.
We journey to misty mountain slopes to source exceptional tea leaves, transforming traditional flavors into innovative beverages. Our commitment goes beyond sourcing—we meticulously craft each drink, perfecting recipes with unwavering passion to create something truly extraordinary.
Every sip represents our dedication to delivering healthy, delicious tea experiences that connect people with centuries of tea culture."

name: Chagee
description: CHAGEE prides itself as a trendsetter, leading the rise of the new generation of tea beverages in 2017. Its organic tea farm is located 1,588 metres above sea level in Lincang, Yunnan, where its tea leaves are still processed with the traditional 12-step method. CHAGEE’s organic tea is recognised and certified by authorities in China, Japan, Europe, and USA.

name: Chanel
description: The CHANEL BEAUTÉ Boutique is where you will meet the world of culture and creations of the House. Step inside a constantly evolving boutique and find a comprehensive range of CHANEL Fragrance, Makeup and Skincare.

name: Chevy Original
description: Bags aren't only an accessory, they've evolved into a wardrobe essential, and if you're looking for a specific style especially in shades of navy green, army patterns, or neutral colours, drop by Chevy Original at Asian Avenue in Sunway Pyramid! Most of the products offered at this outlet are made from either canvas material or leather, making them more durable and lasting, and giving it a more masculine appeal. You can decide on getting either the leather or canvas products depending on where you’re planning to use the bag. Going on a short hike with friends or for a family camping trip? You’ll definitely need baggage space to carry all your essentials, not to worry with their range of big canvas backpacks that have plenty of room and have multiple compartments to organise your stuff. These sturdy bags are ideal for these kind of trips, and the canvas material will help protect your items from any rainfall. Their leather bags look sophisticated and sharp, easily becoming your go-to bag for any casual day out. With a backpack you can keep your hands free and easy, convenient for carrying other things simultaneously. At Chevy Original you’ll even find satchels also available in leather and canvas, that look cool and are completely functional, and it’ll keep your belongings secure. One of the benefits of having the satchel is that you can easily reach inside and grab what you need without having to take off the bag unlike with a backpack. Otherwise, you could opt for a waist pouch, with the conveniences of both a satchel and backpack combined by keeping your hands-free and allowing you to retrieve your necessities easily. They also carry a range of card holders and wallets that’ll help you keep your cash and cards neatly organised so you don’t misplace them.

name: Chicken Claypot House
description:
“Chicken Claypot House” is a contemporary, chicken-oriented claypot restaurant, serving delectable cuisines prepared with the finest ingredients in traditional Sichuan style. Our signature dishes which are best known for their pleasant aroma that greets our nostrils from miles away. They are prepared based on a certain secret recipe inherited from generation to generation, until it was discovered and auspiciously came to us today.
鸡煲之家（又名Chicken Claypot House）主打招牌是以鲜嫩鸡肉为主的四川传统风味鸡煲火锅，以最独特的食材烹调出醇香浓烈味道，汤汁浓郁，滋补入味，让人回味悠长，久久难忘。我们第一家位于槟城乔治市市中心，深受当地食客与外国游客的喜爱，是槟城第一家主打鸡煲火锅的餐厅，让食客享有结合正统四川风味精华的美味鸡煲。我们将中国初始传入的麻辣食谱结合改良后，更能迎合本地味蕾，深受当地老饕们的喜爱。直到今天，我们仍然收到无数社交媒体与在线食品家的积极反馈。

name: Child Wheelchair
description:
Shopping can be a tiring activity. If your child is tired, not feeling well, or is injured, our child wheelchair is ready for rent. Available at any Concierges.
*T&C Apply.
• Child using the child wheelchair must be either below 15 years old or weigh not more than 40kg.
• RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
• 4 hours of usage.
• Do not leave the child unattended.
• Do not leave your handbag/shopping bags on the wheelchair/hanging on the handle unattended.
• Use a lift to access different floors.

name: Child Wristband
description:
For parents and guardians who are concerned with children getting lost in the mall, this wristband can be placed on your child's wrist with your contact information in case of emergencies.
Child wristbands are available at any Concierges.

name: Child Wristlink
description:
For parents and guardians who are concerned with children getting lost in the mall, the wristlink can be easily strapped onto the child’s belt or wrist to keep them close to you.
Child wristlinks are available at any Concierges.
Visit our Concierges located on G Floor & LG2 Marrakesh!
*T&C Apply.
• 4 hours of usage.
• RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
• Adjust the wrist link to fit the child’s wrist/ not to overtighten.
• Children are not encouraged to manage to the wrist link when attach to another child.
• Keep an eye not to curl the wrist link around the child. This could result to choking.

name: Childhood
description:
Snackeez Enterprise was originally conceived as a trading company for snacks and confectionaries in 2015. In 2016, a new business concept was formed when interest in childhood themed items was observed and the company repositioned itself to fulfil the niche demand.
The first Childhood concept store came in the form of a humble push-cart in IOI City Mall, Putrajaya. Its financial success led to the subsequent opening of a kiosk in Mytown Shopping Centre, Cheras in 2017 which proved to be an even bigger success. Since then, the business has continued to flourish and was featured in articles and interviews by respectable local publications such as Berita Harian, Kosmos, Harian Metro, Sin Chew Daily and BFM to name but a few.

name: Chili's
description: Together We Chili's

name: Christy Ng
description: Creating a haven of gorgeous handbags and footwear for ladies, Christy Ng is truly a Shoe Heaven when it comes to fulfilling your wardrobe wishlist. Local shoe designer Christina Ng made a name for herself when she ventured into creating this Shoe Heaven to help every girl achieve having a closet full of fabulous shoes without breaking the bank. As she aimed to turn every girl’s shoe fantasies into reality by crafting unique footwear made of exceptional quality and offered at decent price tags, she began creating a line of stylish yet affordable handbags, because of course every beautiful pair of shoes needs a gorgeous bag to match! Choose from ever-expanding selection of ready-to-made shoes, including flats, heels, lower heels, peep toes, pumps, mules, wedges, sliders and sandals, and even wedding shoes! Available in a multitude of colours, you can opt for various shades such as beige, puce, cobalt blue, butterscotch, olive, pink, maroon, red, silver and many more. Try on different styles to see what you’re most comfortable with, whether it’s strappy shoes, slingbacks, slip ins or more. The brand also uses a variety of materials to suit your taste, be it leather, suede, lace, microfiber, PU, or synthetic materials. You’ll definitely desire to have one of their handbags once you lay your eyes on them, as each design comes in so many different vibrant colours, you may even want more than of the same design because it’s so hard to choose between them! From top handle bags, saddle bags, clutch bags, bucket bags, cylinder bags, shoulder bags, satchels and more, the brand constantly brings in fresh designs so there’s always something for you to look forward to every time you enter their outlet. Match their bag with a super cute wristlet or accordion wallet to keep your necessities well-organised. With the perfect pair of heels and bag to go with it, you’re all set to conquer the world girl!

name: Cinnabon
description: Cinnabon is more than just a bakery; it’s your sweet escape into a world of irresistible aroma and exquisite flavors. Famous for our classic cinnamon rolls, baked fresh and drizzled with our rich, creamy frosting. Whether it’s a treat for a quick pick-me-up or a dozen to share with friends, our rolls are the perfect at any moment.

name: Citizen
description:
CITIZEN is a manufacture, a watch company that does all its manufacturing in-house, from crafting individual watch components to final assembly. A truly global watch brand, CITIZEN does business in over 130 countries worldwide.
Since 1918, our “Better Starts Now” philosophy has inspired us to take the watch in all sorts of new directions, whether that means developing advanced satellite-synchronised watches or pioneering light-power Eco-Drive technology. In 2018, CITIZEN celebrated 100 years of innovation—and we remain committed to expanding the possibilities of the watch in the years ahead.

name: City Chain
description: City Chain is a favourite among KL men and women for its wide range of well-known watch labels and its friendly, helpful staff. Whatever you're looking for in the wrist candy department, you're sure to find it here and the accessories to go with it, as well!

name: City Milk
description: We are the Papaya Milk Specialist. City Milk committed to do only hand-made fresh fruit beverages. We are implement a good concept with combination of fresh fruits and milk which is revolutionizing the drinking culture in Malaysia. We are offering natural, healthy and incredible taste.

name: Claire Organics
description:
ClaireOrganics creates a gorgeous variety of all-natural handcrafted skin and body delicacies using only pure and fresh skin-loving goodness. Not only is it packed with nourishing and healing skin benefits, but it is great for sensitive skin (eczema, psoriasis, acne), and most importantly, it’s safe and gentle for babies and pregnant mommies.
The founder, Louise, also named the brand after her daughter for her love and passion towards pure and natural remedies, as well as to inspire a kind society and a green community, because, in French, Claire means clear and pure.
#BeautyTreats

name: Clarins
description:
The French skin expert since 1954 and the #1 prestige brand in Europe*.
Once upon a time in Paris, a visionary man named Jacques Courtin-Clarins opened a beauty institute. Guided by his instinct for beauty, respect for women and immense love for nature, he created plant-powered formulas that changed the world of skin care forever. Today his legacy lives on in our proudly family-run company, iconic products and innovative, sustainable approach.
Clarins is skin care, make-up and all things beauty, at every moment of your life.
* Prestige face care product sales value in 2011 / Sources: France, UK, Italy & Spain (NPD), Germany (IRI), Switzerland & Netherlands (Nielsen).
#BeautyTreats

name: Clarks
description:
Renowned for its unparalleled comfort, British-based international footwear retailer Clarks has made its mark globally with its 1000 stores and counting, and we’re proud to say they have an outlet here in Sunway Pyramid.
The brand became synonymous with its famous Desert Boots, a pair of distinctive ankle-high boots made from calf suede leather, with a crepe rubber sole. Catering to both the needs and desire of men and women, their footwear comes in vast range of styles and collections. Men and women who seek comfortable footwear that makes them look sophisticated and classy should stop by Clarks and try on these different collections: Clarks Originals, boots, sandals, shoes, CloudSteppers, trigenic and unstructured. Or if you’re more inclined to a specific design, you can always opt to shop based on the various styles they offer.
For the men, if you’re looking for something that’s easy to wear, try on their range of slips ons. Need something that you can move around quickly in? Check out their practical yet still fashionable pairs of sneakers. Loafers, lace ups, casual and smart styles are also available to cater to everyone’s preference.
Women can either don on a pair of heels or wedges to add on extra height while looking effortlessly chic. If you’re required to walk around for hours and don’t think heels are the most practical option, not to worry, Clarks has got you covered with their flats, loafers, slips on, lace up, sneakers, smart and casual styles as well.
Now Lion has an idea for those of you shopping at Clarks, why not both you and your significant other get a matching style or collection? It’ll look super cute and what better way to experiment with fashion together! With shoes from Clarks you won’t have to worry about buying shoes to fit different occasions, these pairs of footwear are in a class of their own and will look good just about anywhere.

name: Cleanruum
description:
Operating Hour: 11AM - 9PM
Retailing and operating of laundry services, shoes cleaning services, leather care and color restoration.

name: Clinique
description:
Clinique was a trailblazer when we launched the first-ever line of dermatologist-developed skin care in 1968.
Our approach to ingredients is the same now as it was then: We avoid using allergens, irritants and ingredients in ways that could potentially harm skin. And as ingredient research evolves, so do our products.
Today, all Clinique products are free from parabens, phthalates and fragrance. They are thoroughly vetted through a full suite of tests to help ensure your skin’s safety.
No parabens. No phthalates. No fragrance. Just happy skin.
#BeautyTreats

name: Coach
description: Synonymous with projecting that effortless New York style, COACH is a design house leader in revolutionizing modern luxury accessories and lifestyle collections. With its long-standing reputation since 1941 and having worked with countless celebrity brand ambassadors, you’ll find only the finest creations at COACH in Sunway Pyramid. The brand presents collections of bags, shoes, apparel and accessories that embody all of life’s greatest luxuries for both men and women. Depending where you’re headed, they have a bag to fit your every occasion, ranging from satchels, crossbody bags, shoulder bags, totes, carryalls, small bags and even backpacks. With a handbag as elegant as the ones at COACH, you need a wallet that’s just as classy to complement it. Fall in love with their range of wallets, available in an assortment of colours, sizes and types. From wristlets, or small to large wallets, they come in single colours, colour blocks, unique patterns and prints, and various styles such as trifold, accordion zip, double snap and more. Personalize your bag and wallets with their line of adorable bag charms. Ever-stylish yet always comfortable are the range of shoes at COACH, including flats, heels and even sneakers to suit you fashion needs. Their collection of ready-to-wear apparel is to-die-for, consisting of elegant dresses, trousers, skirts, shorts, blouses, hoodies, sweaters, t-shirts, jackets, vests and coats that’ll make you look like you just got off the fashion runway. Be the envy of everyone as you top off the look with their accessories such as their watches, sunglasses, necklaces, bracelets, earrings and rings. COACH empowers men to look their best while keeping them organised with their collection of bags, including briefcases, totes, messenger and belt bags and backpacks, large and medium wallets along with card case. For the men who have exceptional taste in fashion, their collection of ready-to-wear apparel such as jackets, trainers, sweaters, hoodies, t-shirts, trousers, shirts, sweatpants and caps will make every man look effortlessly sharp. Pairing these with their line of belts, watches and sunglasses, top off the allure factor by spraying on the fragrance for men by COACH.

name: Coffea Coffee
description:
Coffea Coffee is a comprehensive coffee company that truly takes care of everything when it comes to coffee. They are a multi-award winning establishment specialising in Specialty Coffee bean from top quality coffee farms in South & Central America and Africa. They import high quality green beans from partnership farms by way of direct trade for our own roasting purposes. In addition to that, they are a member of Cup Of Excellence and official bidder since 2010 that is able to handle most exquisite bean of current coffee market. They have also achieved many barista championships and have represented Korea to compete in World Barista Championships since 2004 which makes them the choice for many people.
Coffea Coffee imports 500 tonnes of quality green bean every year from direct trade partnership farms that are located in South & Central America and Africa to serve specialty coffee at a much price that is consistently stable. Their green beans stocks are reserved and kept with professional humidity and temperature control to maintain its freshness and quality. The beans are roasted with perfect techniques and machinery, our monthly capacity to produce roasted beans is more than 50 tonnes per month based on our own collected data and analysis for decades.
They have 4 different kinds of coffee beans used by them which are Maestro, Madonna, Quartet and Quartet S. Maestro provides a sweet dark chocolate coffee taste while Madonna has a more traditional European blend that offers a sweet, fruity aroma and fresh acidity. The Quartet is a blend of Arabica beans from Central and South America but offers a distinct taste of the sweet, nutty and fruity, and hints of spices and chocolate body. The Quartet S is similar to the previous one but with adds Ethiopian beans creating a fresh, fruity taste and exquisite aroma. Opening at Sunway Pyramid has allowed them to share their coffee expertise and artistry for everyone to enjoy.

name: Corroco
description: Every fashion-forward lady needs a stylish handbag to hold and keep her essential organised as she powers through a busy day ahead, and here at Corroco in Sunway Pyramid you’ll find exactly that! Specializing in quality handbags and luggage that originate from Italy, the brand offers an extensive range of bags with durable bags with timeless and classic designs. Manufacturing their handbags with mainly Monogram fabric material with leather trimming, you can be assured that these bags are designed to last and remain ever-stylish. Corroco handbags are designed with multiple compartments for you to neatly organise your items, with pockets and slots for your smartphone, cosmetics, wallet, mirror and more. Crafted from genuine leather, these handbags come in a variety of shapes and designs to cater to each individual’s personal style. Their handbags are versatile enough allowing you to alternate between holding it as a top handle bag, or choosing to wear it as a sling bag with detachable plus adjustable shoulder straps for your convenience. The concept of most of their handbags are minimalistic using single colours that are easy to mix and match with different attires in your wardrobe. They also offer trendy backpacks for women who prefer to carry backpacks instead. Browse their selection of wallets and purses to find one that ideally complements your handbag. Their elegant wallets are available in different styles, whether you prefer those with zip top closures, with button fastenings or bi-fold types. With numerous slots for you to neatly separate your ID, notes, coins, receipts and more you won’t have to worry about misplacing any of these important items. Available in multiple colours, some have optional wrist straps and hand carry straps for you depending on your needs. Whether you’re travelling for a business or leisure trip, a convenient and stylish luggage from Corroco will help you get your belongings sorted and transported safely. With a range of luggage varying in size and colour, whether you opt for hard side or softs side luggage, rest assured you’ll have plenty of room and even extra room for your shopping haul!

name: Cotton On
description: Fashion giant Cotton On has a huge retail outlet in Sunway Pyramid, the perfect shopping haven to cater to all your fashion desires and wardrobe necessities! As one of the eight brands under the Cotton On Group, the largest global retailer from Australia, the brand has currently expanded over a span of roughly 30 years to set up over 600 stores worldwide. Cotton On is synonymous with its trendy selections of womenswear, menswear and accessories, and also its proactive initiatives in sustainability. The brand is said to deliver the hottest trends always with their own twist on it, and to inspire the community to have fun with it. The brand carries such a wide array of products you’ll be there for hours. For bottom pieces, ladies can choose from short to maxi dresses and skirts, shorts, leggings, denim skirts, chinos or jeans (in different styles: skinny, wide, high-rise, mom, straight, cropped). Tops offered at their outlet included shirts and blouses, graphic T-shirts, long sleeve tops, T-shirts, basic tops, coats, jackets, sweaters and cardigans. Other apparel available includes active wear, sleepwear, lingerie, maternity wear and swimwear. Check out the shoe section for an assortment of sneakers, sandals, sliders and flats, and the accessory section where you’ll find pretty necklaces, bracelets, earrings and hair accessories. Men also have a variety of apparel to choose from. Their choices of top pieces include basic tees, tank tops, t-shirts, polo shirts, long sleeve tops, graphic T-shirts, hoodies, sweaters, long sleeve shirts, short sleeve shirts, jackets and coats. Match that top with any of their pants (joggers, chinos, sweatpants), shorts (denim, chinos, swim), or jeans (skinny, straight, jogger, slim). Don’t forget to grab a pair of shoes at the outlet too! The kids wear at Cotton On has a collection for babies including new-born essentials, bibs, tops, bottoms, overalls, playsuits, dresses, all in ones and bodysuits, swimwear and even knitwear. For the little ones that are slightly older, the brand has a selection of tops, bottoms, dresses, overalls, costumes, swimwear, socks, underwear, pyjamas and shoes for those between the ages of 1 – 10 years old.

name: Crossover
description:
Humble beginnings are often paired with the greatest dreams. The year was 2005. Crossover started as a small sneaker store in the capital of Johor to breathe and bridge a culture of fashion, music and lifestyle. The man accountable? None other than the self-proclaimed sneaker freak himself - a visionary and a believer of self-expression and the power of individualism.
In no time at all, Crossover was making the rounds across the local scene, criss-crossing for a local takeover like tic-tac-toe. And over a decade later, Crossover has established itself as the pinnacle exclusive sneaker and streetwear house
brand in Malaysia, owing to its adamant obsession and passion as the top playa and of course, the love and support from the local scene.
Its rising popularity has placed it on the radar as one of the leaders of the best-In-class streetwear retailers, delivering only the most authentic experiences in the industry.

name: Cruz
description: With that next event coming up right around the corner and you haven’t found the perfect dress yet, put all your worries aside and head on over to Cruz at Sunway Pyramid! This fashion retailer has such a wide array of dresses and gowns, you won’t just the find that one perfect dress, you’ll probably end up finding several perfect dresses for you! What’s your preference? A short mini dress that’s easy to move around in? Or perhaps a maxi gown to fulfil your childhood dreams of wanting to be a princess for the night? Your eyes will have a feast as you browse through their racks of gowns, and what’s more, they’re all reasonably priced. You can even find apparel for as low as below three digits, now that is a steal! Who ever said that it cost a bomb to look gorgeous definitely has yet to step into Cruz. With different fabrics for their apparel, you can opt for gowns and dresses available in velvet, chiffon, tulle, lace and more. Try on different dresses to find out what suits you best, whether it’s something minimalistic, super flowy and airy, or body-hugging, with a lot of sequins and glitter, you name it, they’ve got it!

name: D'NATUREL
description:
D’NATUREL is a brand, which offers Freshly Handmade cosmetic, skin care and personal care products, which are Vegetarian and Natural. D’NATUREL as a brand focuses on Better Living. KBI Direct owns the brand. The Journey of D’NATUREL started with the idea of bringing Natural, Handmade and Vegetarian cosmetic and personal care products manufactured in Europe to Malaysia and other ASEAN countries. Experienced producers using high quality ingredients manufacture D’NATUREL products in Europe. Organic products are deemed to be more beneficial for the skin as it is presumed there are little to no harsh chemical ingredients, and are marketed thus. It ensures the skin is not exposed to foreign ingredients such as parabens (preservatives) which could cause adverse effects, such as subjecting skin to allergies and possibly stimulating cancer cell growth, in a study that was revealed late last year. D’NATUREL business model of directly selling to consumers along with lower margins enable us to offer these quality products to all our consumers at affordable prices. Europe is one of the biggest and matured market for organic and natural products. Organic and Natural products come with a whole range of skin benefits and therefore it offers a healthy and better lifestyle. No harmful chemicals are used in them as compared to regular products. D’NATUREL ranges of products are natural, handmade and 100% vegetarian hence suitable for everybody. We offer organic products as well. The synthetics used in some of our products are 100% safe synthetics. D’NATUREL products range covers multiple categories and our aim is to keep expanding into other categories and make natural products affordable for everyone. All D’NATUREL products are approved by the National Pharmaceutical Authority of Malaysia and are SAFE to USE.

name: DR KO DERMACEUTICAL
description:
Brought to you by DR KO Skin Specialist, Malaysia’s largest skin specialist, laser and medical aesthetic center, DR KO Dermaceutical is now at Sunway Pyramid. DR KO Dermaceutical at Sunway Pyramid is the first skincare retail store by DR.KO, specializing in providing high-quality professional skincare catering to various skin conditions and problems.

Founded in 1997 by Dr. Ko Chung Beng, a renowned consultant dermatologist, Dr Ko Skin Specialist began as a small skin clinic in Klang, specializing in dermatology, lasers, medical aesthetic and cosmetic surgery. Realizing a lack of quality professional skincare products tailoring to our local skin conditions, Dr. Ko decided to embark on the mission to mend the gap. Together with a team of professional skin care experts, Dr. Ko formulated a professional skincare range to help solve everyday skin problems. With more than 23 years of clinical use track record, DR.KO’s products are clinically tested, safe, and proven to deliver results.
DR KO Dermaceutical skincare products utilize only the highest quality, medical-grade skincare ingredients. Dr. Ko believes that with consistent use of skin care products tailored for your skin, a smooth, radiant complexion will not be just a dream. To date, DR.KO Dermaceutical has 4 ranges of skincare products, namely, Dermax Clinicare, Ko Dermacare, Three Series, and Ko Perfect. They are particularly famous for their acne and pigmentation range. Over the years of clinical use, these products change the lives of many who suffer from acne and pigmentation problems, helping them to regain their self-confidence and restore their naturally beautiful skin.
For our fellow Muslim friends, DR.KO Dermaceutical also has a Wudhu-friendly range of products, allowing you to use them confidently & conveniently.
If you are still searching for the perfect skincare products that suit your skin or looking for the right products to tackle your skin problems, look no further. Visit DR.KO Dermaceutical at 1.86, ground floor to discover their clinically proven, trusted by dermatologist, professional skincare.

Dzi Kingdom with 17 years of experience, collects and exhibits truly unique and one-of-its-kind DZI in each retail outlet. The company also provides private consultation service by our highly trained advisors which combines a deep analysis of a customer’s personal situation, metaphysic calculation and a unique 8DZI combination founded by Master Dato’ Martin Lui. Collaborated with knowledge of the extraordinary powers of owning DZI. They are the creator of DZI combination with ‘Personal Bazi Feng Shui’ to fulfill each customer’s needs for their whole lifetime.
DZI – originated from Tibet and parts of Himalaya, are the most mystical and effective life changing lucky gemstones in the world. They are known to bring an abundance of wealth, protection, health and good fortune etc. to those who wears them. These special pieces of DZI are personally handpicked by Master Dato’ himself ensuring the best and highest collector’s value, supreme quality and extra high positive energy. Experience it now with Dzi Kingdom at Sunway Pyramid!

name: Dandy
description: Dandy is your favorite everyday Mediterranean restaurant that serves wholesome dishes to an array of irresistible pastries and desserts. Unwind in our cozy ambience with impeccable hospitality from the Dandy crew. Watch our talented chefs, whip up hearty, made-to-order dishes in our open kitchen, using 100% halal-certified ingredients. Whether you're here for a lunch or dinner gathering, a quick bite, a coffee break, or planning an event, Dandy’s the perfect place to be. description:
The first and leading Middle Eastern Restaurant in Malaysia. Our dedication to using only the freshest and finest ingredients and incessant passion of a man's love for authentic and fine Middle Eastern cuisine has undoubtedly rendered TARBUSH's incredible success and growth for all these years.
Business Hours: 10 am - 12 am

name: DermaDarahPPUM
description:
DermaDarahPPUM is a static blood donation centre of University Malaya Medical Centre (UMMC). We are open daily from 1000 to 1630 at CP2-02. We welcome all whole blood donors to come forward to donate blood. All donations will be transported back to the Department of Transfusion Medicine for further testing and processing. Successful donation will be used for clinical transfusion for patients in University Malaya Medical Centre. You don’t have to be a doctor to save lives. You can donate blood and save lives! Your donation is valuable to help our patients in need. If you have not donated blood before, don’t be afraid. Drop by our static blood donation centre and our blood procurement team will be happy to assist you.
This static blood donation centre is made possible with support from Sunway Pyramid Mall, ROCHE diagnostics, Biomed Global, Terumo Malaysia, Story Frontier and MRT Corporation.

name: Diamond & Platinum
description:
The age-old phrase 'diamonds are a girl’s best friend' still holds true, especially when you walk into Diamond & Platinum at Sunway Pyramid and your take in the sight of all their dazzling jewellery! For the past two decades, the brand has helped millions of girls celebrate precious moments and made them feel all the more special and memorable. From a humble beginning, this locally-started brand now operates over 10 outlets all across Malaysia and Brunei, and has proven themselves to be a brand that customers can always resonate with.
Diamond & Platinum has several renowned collections, such as Avant Garde, featuring the enchantment of floral beauty in each of its design, that can be worn as a ring or pendant, or in 3 different styles of earrings. Their Liberte collection features feminine yet bold pieces that are said to be a tribute to beautiful and strong women around the world, with its sophisticated pieces capturing a woman’s curved journey to success.
Be in awe of the Fiore collection, featuring 6 brilliantly cut diamonds surrounding one larger and stunning diamond on an invisible setting, fashioned to portray a flower. They even have their pearl collection as well as their precious gems collections consisting of dazzling sapphires, rubies and more. For those of you looking to tie the knot soon, check out their bridal range, showcasing 950 platinum wedding bands in their Pure Love collection, white gold wedding bands in their Promise collection, platinum and gold wedding bands from their Unity collection and palladium wedding bands from the Earnest collection. Besides rings for that special occasion, Diamond & Platinum encourages you to share these precious jewellery with your loved ones as a gift for anniversaries, graduations, birthdays or simply to commemorate a special occasion!
Priding itself in its alluring and distinctive designs by the finest craftsmanship, the brand is determined to deliver exceptional experiences to every single customer that walks through its doors.

name: Din Tai Fung
description:
Din Tai Fung was originally founded as a cooking oil retail shop in 1958. As the consumption patterns of cooking oil started to change in the early 1970’s threatening the survival of the business, Din Tai Fung was transformed to a restaurant in 1972 serving Xiao Long Bao (Steamed Dumpling).
The Hong Kong branch was awarded one star by the prestigious Michelin guide, Din Tai Fung is also ranked as one of the World’s Top Ten Best Restaurants by The New York Times and is the only Asian restaurant on the list. Additionally, it was voted the Second Best Franchise for Travellers by CNN and ranked sixth in the list of “101 Best restaurants in Asia” released by US-based food website, The Daily Meal. Locally, the Pavilion branch has been voted as the top Chinese restaurant in Kuala Lumpur by TripAdvisor and as one of the top rated Chinese Restaurants in the Chinese “Dazhong Dianping”. Din Tai Fung Malaysia was most recently awarded the Innovative Restaurant Award at the prestigious Malaysia Tourism Awards 2014/2015 and Best Chinese Restaurant at the Time Out Food & Drink Awards 2017.
Headquartered in Taiwan, Din Tai Fung now has more than 170 branches in Australia, China, Dubai, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, South Korea, Thailand, UK and United States. Din Tai Fung is inviting the world to this exquisite cuisine from Taiwan.

name: Dressingpaula
description:
With every step you take in your new outfit from Dressing Paula at Sunway Pyramid, you’re bound to turn heads! Shop for unique and sophisticated apparel that’s perfect for the modern fashionista. With clothing and accessories that suit either work wear, formalwear, parties, eveningwear, or casual wear, this is the place to shop for your next new look. Be the center of attention at your upcoming event with their range of gorgeous dresses. Whether you have a preference for mini or midi or maxi dresses, you’ll discover stunning summer dresses, party dresses, evening dresses, body con dresses and even work dresses.
If you prefer pants but still like the convenience of a one-piece that saves you time from trying to pair top and bottom pieces together, then browse through their selection of eye-catching playsuits, jumpsuits and rompers. For the girl who loves to experiment with mixing and matching clothes together, get a classy top piece from Dressing Paula, including blouses, shirts, and sleeveless tops that and ever-stylish and elegant. Pair it with their selection of pants, such as their wide-leg pants, straight pants, tapered pants, culottes, palazzo pants, leggings, and you’ll look super confident in your outfit. If jeans are more your style, try on their comfortable cropped flare jeans, skinny jeans, straight jeans, cropped jeans, available in high-rise or mid-rise variations. With such hot weather, you can opt for their casual shorts, tailored shorts or even a skort.
If you’re heading to a cold place (or just for the sake of showing off great style!) match your outfit with an outerwear piece, whether it’s a cardigan, sweater, blazer, coat, vest, trench coat or bomber jacket. Or you could opt to bring along one of the many pretty and convenient scarves from Dressing Paula! They also offer a collection of accessories including belts, sunglasses, bracelets, necklaces and earrings to help you take your ensemble to the next level.

name: Drum
description: Express your individual style with the extensive selection of fashionable apparel offered at DRUM in Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid! This local fashion retailer has successfully expanded to open more than ten outlets across Malaysia to date. So why is this brand names after a drum that plays beats? At Drum, their products are their beats, the fashion beats, and they believe that just like how a beat is the core of music, fashion is the core of one’s personality. Offering the latest trends at amazing prices without forsaking good quality, the fashion selection here is varied to accommodate different tastes so you can shop the finest streetwear fashion for men here! T-shirts are a man’s best friend, that’s why Drum brings you a selection of graphic tees, statement tees, print tees, striped tees, basic short sleeve tees, pocket detail tees, embroidered logo tees and more. Besides short sleeve T-shirts, they offer those designs in long sleeve variation with additional selection of raglan tees and button detailed tees. In need of a top that looks less laidback? Try on their button-down shirts that come in long sleeve and short sleeve versions, available in prints, stripes, pocket details, plain colours, denim and more. If you’re not a fan of button-down shirts but still want something smart casual, opt for their collared polo tees. Throw on a piece of stylish outerwear too from their selection of cargo vests, bomber jackets, hoodie jackets, faux leather jackets, denim jackets, jumpers, hoodies and sweatshirts. Browse the range of comfortable short pants available at Drum, such as their chino pants and sweatpants available in colours that easily match your top piece, such as khaki, dark grey, maroon, army green, black and brown. If you’re a fan of denim, try on their short or long denim jeans, whether you prefer ripped jeans, slim fit, washed denim colours or other variations. You can even shop for essentials such as underwear and boxes here. Besides that, enhance your style with their accessories including belts, suspenders, ties and bowties.

description: ÉLÉVATIONE, a leading international boutique brand, was born from the idea that beauty goes beyond the depths of the skin and radiates more than just an aura.

name: EICHITOO
description:
What is travel? Walking back and forth between extraordinary and daily, between city and nature. EICHITOO offers new choices for ladies who travel for vacation, daily life, and business trips. EICHITOO brings energetic and comfortable designs that can make you feel the warmth of your trip so, when you return and listen back to the voice of a heart filled with memories, you will feel more loved.
Originally from China, EICHITOO is now available at Sunway Pyramid! Founded in 2010, EICHITOO is a fashion-forward collection that is geared towards fashion and casual wear with design, purchase and sales segments tightly linked. By the end of 2016, it already has 625 stores in China. EICHITOO has an enormous impact on the fashion industry by infusing cultural aesthetic elements into modern fashion to create a distinctive fashion trend. The products are divided into three series: urban life, urban office and urban fashion. EICHITOO mainly focuses on fashion and style for modern women in cities. This helps them to redecorate their closets with fashion pieces from daily wear in casual or chic style to elegant and timeless office wear. EICHITOO is stylish yet subtle, simple yet refined, chic yet infused with a classical touch. Under the value price quality and service, EICHITOO with its urban elegance, popular colour and unique design has won the favour and pursuit of the majority of modern lady.
The target customer base of EICHITOO are females aged 18-35. The products mainly include sweaters, dresses, skirts, T-shirts, casual pants, etc. Every piece comes with a streamlined design that pays great attention to the smallest detail. The designer blends exquisite style with design that is inspired by urban life and fashion trends, and proposes the aesthetic concept of “Let design return to the
origin of life”. Its urban elegance and clean design capture the beauty of each lady's body, making them more confident and elegant. EICHITOO also offers accessories to compliment stylish outfits. Its high quality and modern design can fully meet a woman’s demands when it comes to fashion.

name: Elle
description:
At ELLE, style is about everything. From the way a woman lives, to where she travels, to her taste in music, art, food, cars and technology. A Parisienne is inventive. Capable of adoring this, that and everything, she considers France’s love of a paradox her best friend, her favorite contradiction, her middle name…
No need to live in Paris to get the Parisian style! Be Chic & Effortless with ELLE & ELLE Active ready-to-wear collection available now at Sunway Pyramid.
