name: Estee Lauder
description:
Original from American, Estée Lauder is now available at Sunway Pyramid. Estée Lauder is an American multinational manufacturer and marketer of prestige skincare, makeup, fragrance and hair care products, based in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. The company owns a diverse portfolio of brands, distributed internationally through both digital commerce and retail channels. The company began in 1946 when Estée Lauder and her husband Joseph Lauder began producing cosmetics in New York City. They first carried only four products: Cleansing Oil, Skin Lotion, Super Rich All-purpose Creme, and Creme Pack. Estée Lauder's Clinique brand became the first women's cosmetic company to introduce a second line for men when, in 1976, they began a separate line called "Skin Supplies for Men", which continues to be sold at Clinique counters worldwide. In 1981, the company's products became available in the Soviet Union. The Estée Lauder brand has had sometimes high-profile spokesmodels, sometimes referred to simply as 'faces'. Past 'faces' for Estée Lauder include Karen Graham, Bruce Boxleitner, Shaun Casey, Willow Bay, Paulina Porizkova, Elizabeth Hurley, Carolyn Murphy, supermodel Liya Kebede was the first African American 'face' of Estee Lauder, Anja Rubik, and actress Gwyneth Paltrow. As of 2008 the main spokesmodel for Estée Lauder was supermodel Hilary Rhoda. In 2010, the company added three more faces to the roster, Chinese model Liu Wen, Puerto Rican model Joan Smalls, and French model Constance Jablonski. Check out the best deals on Estée Lauder in Sunway Pyramid.
#BeautyTreats

name: Eu Yan Sang
description:
Are you having difficulties in finding the right gift for your loved ones? Why not giving them a gift that can boost their health? Eu Yan Sang will be the ideal place for you to shop for health-care products!
Founded by Eu Kong, a China citizen from Foshand in Guangdong who came to Malaya for work. During the 1870’s to 1880’s in Malaya, tine mine coolies were suffering from opium addiction, which prompted the founder to open a Chinese medicine and herb shop in Gopeng, Perak. The shop was named ‘Yan Sang’, which literally means ‘caring for mankind’ in Chinese. His son, Eu Tong, continued his father’s business and expanded the business to Singapore too. After on, he decided to brand the medical business more firmly with the attachment of his family name –Eu Yan Sang.
The brand’s value is to care for mankind, which will remain constant and unchanging. With their ever-growing product range, you can get health products for women, men, and even infant. One of their best-selling products by are Bottled Bird’s Nest (to promote general health) and Essence of Chicken (to replenish energy and nourish blood). Besides Chinese herb and medicine, other products that you can get are dietary supplements, health foods, and personal care products.
Remember, taking care of your health is vital for a happy life! Give them a visit at Level Lower Ground 2 (Blue Zone) now!

name: FILA
description:
The Beginning of Fila
In 1911, in Biella, a small Italian town near the Alps, the FILA brothers, who were interested in the textile industry, established a knitwear and underwear company, leveraging the town's abundant resources.
Over time, the business expanded by incorporating the artistic color sense unique to Italians into their clothing, laying the foundation for what Fila is today.
Globally known
FILA gained global attention for its instantly recognisable tennis apparel in the 1970s, and has since expanded their design portfolio to include sporting apparel across a wide range of codes including golf, training, running and compression wear.
While their technical processes are at the forefront of sporting design, the brand remains true to its time-honoured European aesthetic and outfits professional artists and athletes from around the world.
A century after its inception, FILA has become synonymous with both sport and sophistication, worn by world-renowned professional athletes as well as fashion-conscious individuals.
Collaborations with luxury fashion houses and influential designers have captured the attention of the fashion world, and the premium lifestyle sports brand continues to make its mark to this day.
FILA Tennis
By introducing colorful and modern designs to tennis courts, where players were traditionally required to wear mostly white attire, it brought a breath of fresh air to tennis fashion

name: FOCUS POINT
description: Focus Point is officially recognized by the Malaysia Book of Records as the largest optical retail chain store in Malaysia and also the first and only optical retail chain store to be listed in Bursa Malaysia. With more than 180 outlets nationwide and more than 230 eye care professionals ready to serve you. Customers have a wide range of fashionable eyewear to choose from.

name: FROST N BITES
description:
Where frozen delights meet comfort and happiness! Frost n Bites is a local artisanal gelato brand that inspires to make the best classic gelatos for every day’s simple pleasure.
Using the finest imported ingredients and gelato making techniques from Italy, they have developed a wide variety of delicious classic Italian flavours of gelatos and sorbets such as Mint-Choc-Chip and Pistachio. But they don't stop at extraordinary flavours. Come try their delectable crunchy croffles too! Any day is a good day for gelato.

name: Faber-Castell
description:
Faber-Castell has long held a strong position when it comes to premium stationery. Founded in Stein, Germany, Faber-Castell offers children and adults a wide array of quality-branded stationery products with true points of difference through its “Companion for Life” Portfolio. From child-grip friendly color pencils and crayons, to engraved fountain pens and top-tier paints, Faber-Castell provides a comprehensive list of tools for all your artistic needs.
Today Faber-Castell operates 14 production sites in 10 countries, markets its products through 25 sales/distribution organizations and is represented in 120 different countries including Malaysia. In addition, Creativity for Kids is represented in 50 countries around the world. The Creativity for Kids brand continues its well-deserved reputation as a consistent provider of quality, innovative, and thoughtful products for children that consist of both classic and trendy creative activities. Today, many Creativity for Kids products include Faber-Castell art supplies as components that enrich the creative experience. Creativity for Kids craft kits have received many awards from organizations such as Oppenheim Toy Portfolio, Dr. Toy, The National Parenting Center, ASTRA (American Specialty Toy Retailing Association) and the TIA (Toy Industry Association), plus recognition in national publications such as Parents Magazine and Good Housekeeping.
Faber-Castell is proud of its longevity and what it represents – consistent delivery of a quality experience in all areas of business. More than 150 years after the company’s first appearance in the United States, Lothar von Faber’s legacy is nicely summed up in his own statement, “From the start I was determined to raise myself to the highest rank by making the best that can be made in the world.” Faber-Castell is committed to staying true to this vision of quality, tradition, and innovation now and in the future.

name: Fabiano Ricco
description: Pamper your feet with a pair (or more) of gorgeous shoes from Fabianno Ricco, a treasure trove of pretty footwear at Asian Avenue in Sunway Pyramid! Offering more than just a galore of stylish shoes, they even retail bags that are equally appealing, so you’ll cover both your shoe and handbags need in just one spot! Demure and ever elegant, shop their covered flats available in numerous colours and styles, from embellishments to oversized buckles to pleated fabrics. You can opt for a version that hover more to ballerina flats style, or a sandal type with ankle straps to hold your feet securely at the back. For the ladies who love a bit of heels to make you look tall and lean, try their covered heels available in different materials, whether you prefer velvet, suede, or even leather. With its array of pretty colours, these covered heels come in block heels or stilettos heels depending on what you’re more comfortable in. If you love wearing mules or pumps, you can check out their range of pointed toe or square toe mules, asymmetrical slip on sandals, or strappy stiletto pumps. Sandal flats are the perfect companion for your feet, and it comes in different designs to suit various occasions, with some having ruffles, embellished straps, lace detailing, pearls and more! You’ll love browsing through their range of super classy sandal heels, such as their open toe block heels, knotted detail sandal heels, asymmetric strap block heels, strappy slingbacks and more! For a firmer grip you can opt for their wedges, some with transparent straps, sequins, pleated fabrics and many more designs. Complete the look with a bag from their gorgeous selection! Try on their crossbody bags such as their sling bags or satchels available in multiple colours. Check out their classic handbags that have various handle styles, whether you want double handles, circular top handles, chain straps. Functional and stylish, their shoulder bags and tote bags help you look great while giving you enough room to keep your essentials.

name: Family Parking
description:
For families with strollers and young children, a well-lit family parking area is available!
The family parking area is in close proximity to the mall entrances and lifts which will help ease convenience for mummies, daddies or guardians who are travelling alone with young children.

name: FamilyMart
description: Retailing and operating of a convenience store only.

name: Famous Amos
description: Retailing of cookies, muffins, cookies, gifts and sweets.

name: Felancy
description: Your lingerie can either be cute and adorable, or alluring and sexy, but either way you’re assured that any piece of lingerie you buy from Felancy in Sunway Pyramid is made of pure comfort. Local-based lingerie brand Felancy is your one stop female shopping paradise, retailing pieces from intimate wear to fashionable apparel made from great quality, and all at affordable prices. Sexy is the new confident, and Felancy lets you achieve that without having to break your budget. Shop for your wardrobe essentials here, whether you’re in need of a bra, sports bra, panties or shapewear. Their bras are available in several options depending on your fashion needs. You’ll never have to worry again about finding the right bra for that cute OOTD you’ve planned out. Their range includes half cups, padded bras, wired bras or wireless bras. Need to wear an alluring off-shoulder top or dress? Felancy has just the solution for you with their comfy strapless bras and bras with removable straps that are designed to be a perfect fit. Your next workout session won’t be complete without the perfect sports bra, try on their range which includes low to high impact sports bras, wireless sports brads, and those with removable pads. Their sports bras are uber stylish too, coming in different styles such as cross-backs, strappy back or race-back styles. Colourful and super sweat absorbent, you’ll never leave to the gym without it again! Comfortable panties are essential to helping you get on with your day confidently, browse through their selection of mini, midi, and maxi panties, all available in different colours and designs to suit your preference! Look fit with their range of shapewear, with their options of high waist shapewear, medium waist shapewear, and long legs shapewear. With their offerings being super comfortable, stylish and affordable, you’ll find yourself buying just more than on garment from Felancy!

name: Fipper, Feel The Rubber
description:
Inspired by colors, culture & the people who surrounded them, Fipper's objective is to convey their trendy lifestyle through unique products. Created in 2008, the timeless and colorful design of the Fipper collection comes in a variety of styles that appeal to the individual in a modern and colorful way yet conventional. Each pair is designed with the commitment to bring the customers the highest of quality, comfort and affordability. Now, Fipper is available at Sunway Pyramid and this will be Fipper's flagship store! In addition to a complete range of Fipper footwear and merchandise, we also provide a warm environment for Fipper's lovers, and set up a kids zone, where your child can play and select the footwear that suit your child.
Fipper is aimed at connecting sandal lover’s feet to Mother Nature. At Fipper, our vision is to enrich the rubber experience to all our Fipper Lovers. We specialized in the team design of our very own brand of footwear.
At Fipper, we employed a dedicated team of professional designers that keep track of the latest design of slippers that suits the requirements and comfort footwear lovers, bring it indoors or outdoors. These designs shall then be delivered over to our carefully selected factories in Thailand for careful production. Whether it is the Fipper Basic series in a single color, or the Fipper Slim, Walker and Wide in a multi-color combination, they will provide you with the most comfortable walking experience. In addition, our newly designed Refitt, Trekker and Slip On will bring you a brand-new experience.
Fipper’s success largely comes from the concept of combining our innovative design and combination of color for all footwear lovers. Having said that, our Fipper enjoys a good reputation for producing high quality, stylish design and comfortable footwear.

name: First Aid Kit
description:
Need an emergency plaster, antiseptic cream or basic first aid?
Drop by to our Concierge at G Floor !

name: Fitness Concept
description: Fitness Concept is the Largest 1 Stop Fitness Specialist Chain Store in Malaysia. We carry the widest range of health and fitness equipment from USA, Europe and Asia Pacific.

name: Fleurs
description: Retailing of flowers and related products.

name: Focus Point
description: Focus Point is officially recognized by the Malaysia Book of Records as the largest optical retail chain store in Malaysia and also the first and only optical retail chain store to be listed in Bursa Malaysia. With more than 180 outlets nationwide and more than 230 eye care professionals ready to serve you. Customers have a wide range of fashionable eyewear to choose from.

name: Formosa
description: Retailing in Taiwan street snacks.

name: Fossil
description:
"We believe the greatest adventure of all is the road to self discovery. And we’ve made it our mission to create distinctive, beautifully crafted accessories that are right there with you every step of your journey.
Today, we continue to focus on what makes us, us: optimism, authenticity and, of course, our creative spirit. Everything we make complements every style and fits every lifestyle—for all the moments that make you, you."

name: Fresh
description:
The most inspiring skincare brand, fresh harnesses nature's potency from around the world to awaken senses and transform skin. Placing sensoriality at the heart of performance, fresh creates multi-sensorial indulgences that feel as good as they work. The brand was founded as a shop in 1991 by Lev Glazman and Alina Roytberg, creative visionaries driven by their curiosity about natural time-honored remedies and extraordinary experiences for the skin. An LVMH Maison since 2000, fresh is a global company based in New York offering skincare, lip care, bodycare, and fragrance in over 25 countries. Because nature is our destination for innovation, the brand is committed to protecting biodiversity where it sources ingredients -nurturing the skin of the earth for a thriving, harmonious world that is forever fresh.
#BeautyTreats

name: Fresh Fruits
description: Retailing of fresh fruits.

name: Fresh Line
description: Since 1992, Fresh Line blends Greek herbal wisdom with science to create natural face, body, and hair care products. Enjoy luxurious textures and beautiful scents to elevate your senses and nurture your skin!

name: Furla
description: Hailing from one of the most iconic countries in the world of fashion, Furla was birthed as an Italian luxury goods company in 1927. With it expansion of exporting to over 70 countries, they have landed here in Sunway Pyramid to bring in Italian-designed products ranging from handbags to shoes to accessories. The right handbag is the perfect companion that’ll keep your belongings and help make you look effortlessly stylish, and that’s exactly what you’ll find at Furla. Ladies will fall in love instantly at the sight of their handbags, offered in an extensive selection of colours, from bright reds to pastel blues and neutral shades. Unique designs and details on the bag make it distinct, you’ll be the envy of everyone around you. From cross-body bags, to shoulder bags, tote bags, candy bags, top handle bags, satchels, pochette bags, dome bags, and more, you’ll find these bags available in different sizes and in such a wide array of eye-catching colours and prints - choosing just one hardly seems like enough! Once you’ve set your heart on one (or more!) of their gorgeous bags, you’ll definitely need to shop for a pair of shoes that are equally as fashionable. Put on their heels, sandals, or pumps and hold on to that bag, trust us you’ll feel like you can conquer the world! Browse through their line of wallets that are not only practical and spacious, but super classy. Match this combination with one of their classic watches and you’re more than ready to be the centre of attention wherever you’re headed to! Expect nothing short of perfectly crafted genuine bags, with unique designs, practical compartments and exquisite colours when you step into Furla.

name: Future Land
description:
A haven for VR fans, Future Land at Sunway Pyramid promises lots of fun and entertainment for the whole family with attractions and Virtual Reality experiences in all shapes and sizes! Using modern-day technology and sophisticated equipment, some of the notable attractions include the 360 Flight and ExoJet simulators, Mirror Maze, VR Hero, 6D Cinema, VR Car simulator. Future Land is perfect for a fun-filled weekend with the family or when you wish to add more thrill to your children's school holiday.
The 6 seater VR Family takes you on an adventure with special sound effects and movements suited for all ages. Select your VR movie with a choice of "adventure, horror or explore" where family with kids as young as 3 years old may opt for the explore story while adults may try out the horror mode. The VR Car Simulator gives you the experience of driving round a racing track where any accidents or impacts would be transmitted physically to the driver within a controlled system. Wish to take driving on-ground up into the air? The Flight Simulator 360 fits you right into a pilot's cabin where you will be manoeuvring a fighter jet. This ride is however suitable for kids above 9 years old as it rotates 360 degrees. On the other hand, the EXO Jet Simulator has 2 seats whereby one person may act as the pilot and the other the shooter. A perfect father and son or couple bonding time wouldn't you say? Another must to check-out is the VR Skateboard where there are 200 stunts to master as you skate, surf and swing from tall buildings. Tired or need a break before resuming the fun? Future Land also has a zone where you could enjoy snacks and drinks while relaxing on bean bags.
What other better place than Future Land at Sunway Pyramid to bring your kid for their birthday outing or host a team-building activity for your company.

name: G2000
description: G2000 was founded in 1980 with its headquarters in Hong Kong. The G2000 collection embodies the spirit of "New Adventures..." by offering a brand-new workwear experience. Taking our customers on a new adventure to rediscover the joy of dressing up for work by versatile cuts, functional materials, and vibrant colors, we strive to ensure that they feel comfortable to embark on a new chapter in their professional lives.

name: GEM STUDIO
description: Retailing of salon, grooming, make-up, facials, nail services, beauty services and related products & accessories.

name: GIFTOPRECIOUS
description: Retailing of preserved flower gift / boutique and accessories.

name: GIGI Coffee
description: Your inspiration to achieve greatness in life, starting with Everyday Great Coffee.

name: GODIVA
description:
GODIVA is the world’s most iconic premium chocolate company, dedicated to opening people’s eyes to a more wonderful world. What started in a humble home workshop in Brussels 95 years ago, is now available in Malaysia and at Sunway Pyramid!
Every piece of GODIVA is bursting with quality, Belgian craftsmanship, and the world’s finest ingredients. The underpinning of our incredible chocolate has, and always will be, an authenticity that flows from our proud Belgian heritage. Our Belgium 1926 logo reflects this spirit, paying homage to the time and place where our story first began.

name: GORDON RAMSAY BAR & GRILL
description:
Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Sunway City Kuala Lumpur is located at Sunway Resort. This is the iconic British chef’s inaugural restaurant in Malaysia and the first Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill outside the United Kingdom.
The restaurant blends Gordon Ramsay’s British heritage with the grace and grandeur of Sunway Resort. A series of luxurious and intimate spaces include a trio of private dining rooms – 8 Mayfair, 10 Soho and 12 Chelsea, a grand dining room with semi-private seating booths and a glittering cocktail bar with floor-to-ceiling windows, seating up to a total of 150 guests at a time.
The interior design features robust furnishings with a rich red and forest green colour scheme accentuated by polished walnut hardwood flooring, brass finishes, 24 karat gold leaf hand-placed ceiling and more. Monochrome portraits of British style icons by celebrated photographers Terry O’Neill and Arthur Steel feature The Rolling Stones frontman Sir Mick Jagger, the original 007 Sir Sean Connery, supermodels Jean Shrimpton and Twiggy, line the walls of the main dining room.
Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill features an exquisite menu inspired by one of London’s most iconic restaurants, Savoy Grill, showcasing only the finest ingredients presented with culinary flair from the highly skilled, Gordon Ramsay-trained team. Diners can look forward to savouring prime cuts of meat dry-aged in-house and Chef Ramsay’s most desirable dishes, such as his ‘Classic Beef Wellington’, served tableside, the ‘Spiced Beef Tartare with Egg Yolk Confit’, his must-try ‘Arnold Bennett Twice-baked Cheese Soufflé with Mornay Sauce’, the ‘Dover Sole with Grenobloise capers sauce’ and more. For guests looking to wind down in the evenings, take a seat at our bar and sip on concoctions from a masterly crafted menu of classic favourites, cocktails with Malaysian-inspired flavours and a host of premium wines and spirits. Adjacent to the cocktail bar, a dedicated wine cellar showcases an extensive global wine list for wine enthusiasts and a private room welcomes intimate evenings for tastings, social gatherings and more.

name: GRAND IMPERIAL RESTAURANT
description:
Established since 2008, we are Malaysia’s leading company in the food & beverage industry and wedding services. We showcase a fleet of outstanding restaurants offering various culinary experiences, from Chinese delicacies to Chinese Dim Sum, BBQ, Seafood Steamboat, Hong Kong noodles, and tangy fresh seafood.
Also, Grand Imperial Restaurant Royale Ballroom Sunway is definitely the perfect location for an intimate wedding without compromising on perfect settings with luxurious detailing.
Step into the finest ballroom, designed to cater your guests with utmost importance. Featuring high ceiling, warm lighting and many more From the floor to the smallest interior details it is a revitalized piece of living celebration. No doubt, your wedding ceremony will be a memorable one.
location: Suite 101, First Floor, The Pinnacle Annex (Ground Floor)

name: GadgetHub
description:
GadgetHub has always been a pioneer and at the forefront in retail by bringing in trending products and upkeeping emerging market trends. Over thirteen (13) years in the retail business, we are specializing in manufacturing, distributing and retailing high quality gadget accessories and lifestyle products. Our product selection is well monitored and not in the act of making or selling lookalike goods and products that carries fake trademark.
Aiming to unlock the potential of both qualities yet affordable gadget markets, we practice strict quality control and assurance as we trust this is the way to ensure the quality of customer experience. Come by to one of our largest outlets in Malaysia at Sunway Pyramid for the enjoyable experience!

name: Galaxy Gift
description: Retailing of customized plate, accessories, souvenir and gift.

name: Garrett Popcorn Shops®
description:
Garrett Popcorn Shops® - A Chicago Tradition from the USA since 1949
For over seven decades, Garrett Popcorn Shops has served gourmet popcorn using wholesome ingredients in their secret family recipes, passed down for generations. Custom grown, non-GMO butterfly and mushroom kernels are first hot-air popped in their kitchens, then enriched with flavor in seasoned, old-fashioned Copper Kettles. Because good things take time, Garrett Popcorn is handcrafted in small batches throughout the day.
Signature recipes include the fan-invented, original Chicago-style popcorn, Chicago Mix™, which blends the sweetness of CaramelCrisp™ with the savory goodness of CheeseCorn; plus Buttery (a vegan treat!), Plain, CheeseCorn, CaramelCrisp, Almond CaramelCrisp and Macadamia CaramelCrisp.
Like no other™, Garrett Popcorn enchants adoring fans around the world

name: Geb
description: Retailing of fashion apparel and related accessories.

name: Genius Games
description: Remember your childhood days when it was so easy to find a store selling cheap PS2 or computer games and there are folders after folders of them for you to browse through while you need not feel the pressure of purchasing a game you love because of the high pricing? Genius Games brings this moment back as kids these days still crowd around the store to buy or simply have the thrill of flipping through the files to get updated with other games they may not know of and might be interested in buying. This is the exact store back then where many teens stop by to play the console attached to a TV up front at the counter when they did not have one at home. Your old-school game shop still exists here at Sunway Pyramid F floor outside of Asian Avenue so come on over to relive those nostalgic moments and check out the good deals on not only games, but also gaming hardware.

name: Genki Sushi
description: Genki Sushi is a halal certified Japanese sushi chain brand that offers value-for-money dining experiences for those who desire a variety of authentic yet affordable Japanese sushi experience. It first began in 1968 when a 24-year-old Japanese sushi chef, Fumio Saito, created the concept of “Kaiten Sushi” and pioneered the use of a revolving conveyor belt to serve sushi. Through a Kousoku Express system, Genki Sushi brilliantly delivers dishes to tables, providing a quick and exciting dining experience. Genki Sushi seeks to serve the most professional and authentic experience and are dedicated to providing a variety of affordable sushi while never compromising their quality. Genki Sushi’s menu ranges from Gunkan, handrolls to rice and noodles as well as desserts.

name: Geox
description: Find your perfect fit of classy and comfortable shoes at Geox in Sunway Pyramid! The Italian footwear brand was founded in1995 by Mario Moretti Polegato, and since then has been creating high-quality shoes that are functional without forgetting to make them oh-so-stylish. The special Geox technology incorporated into the timeless and well-preserved traditions of Italian shoe manufacturers make the brand stand out from all its competitors. Hailing from a country that’s renowned as one of the leaders of fashion globally, it’s not doubt these shoes are designed in a way that makes you look classy and sophisticated instantly. Another unique feature about Geox shoes is that it makes your feet breather, thanks to the patented perforation in the outer soles that help to create natural air in the shoe, and the special waterproof and breathable membrane that ensures your feet are dry. This unique and innovative feature guarantees you a comfortable fit and air-conditioned feet no matter how many hours you wear their shoes. Available in numerous styles and designs, there’s a comfortable and stylish pair to suit everyone’s preference. For the man aiming to achieve a formal look, opt for their breathable and trendy Chelsea boots, durable and flexible desert boots, or the classic and versatile formal leather shoes, perfect for the man who wants to look refined yet have the comfort of a good old pair of sneakers. Classy loafers are super comfortable, breathable and light, and are available in leather and suede variations. Sneakers at Geox are no ordinary sneakers, with its technology allowing for air-circulation around the foot, activated by movement and enhanced by the materials used. Casual shoes are also available in contemporary versatile designs that offer a refined on-trend look. In this hot tropical weather, you may opt for open-toe sandals, for optimal breathability, total comfort and functionality combined into one trendy pair of footwear.

name: Getha
description: Retailing of mattress, topper, pillows, bolsters and related accessories under Getha.

name: Giordano
description: A familiar name that’s been around in the fashion industry for several decades, Giordano has expanded from its origins in Hong Kong to open over 2000 stores across more than 30 countries, including the one right here in Sunway Pyramid. The brand offers a broad range of apparel for men, women, and children. For men, to create an easy-going look that still achieves a smart casual appearance, Giordano’s polos are available in various colours, and you can opt for embroidery or plain polos. Look sharp with their range of shirts, including long or short sleeved Oxford shirts, wrinkle-free shirts, linen-cotton shirts and more. Look stylish and casual with their selection of plain tees, pocket tees, stripe tees, printed tees, or long sleeved tees. Try on their sweaters, hoodie, sweatshirts and cardigans, or check out their range of light, heavy and down jackets for the perfect outerwear. Match these tops with a bottom piece from their assortment of joggers, jeans, khakis, pants bermudas, and shorts. Ladies can shop for classy and easy-to-wear poloss or look professional with the brand’s options of long-sleeve Oxford shirts, half placket shirts, short sleeve shirts, and linen-cotton shirts. Achieve that feminine appeal with Giordano’s selection of skirts and dresses like their knitted dress, shirt dress, polo dress, Oxford dress, elastic waistband skirts, and more. If you’re more comfortable with wearing pants, try on their range of joggers, jeans, khakis, long pants and shorts. On colder days, grab one of their sweatshirts, hoodies, cardigans, sweaters or jackets (heavy, light, down) to keep you feeling warm while ensuring you look ever-fashionable. Giordano even has you covered from head to toe with their line of essentials such as boxers, briefs, and undershirts for men, panties for the ladies, as well as unisex socks including ankle socks, invisible socks and crew socks. Giordano Junior caters to kids with its adorable collection of polos, printed tees, shirts, pants, skirts and shorts. For families, get the whole fam ready for an exciting day out wearing matching polos from Giordano that’ll make for a fun photo shoot!

name: Glo Laser Centres
description: High-tech beauty in less than 30 mins. There's a new way to get cleaner, brighter, tighter skin - and it's right here.

name: Glomade Art
description: Retailing of painting art and stand, frame and accessories only.

name: Go Noodle House
description: Retailing of Chinese noodle.

name: Going Shop
description: Retailing of phone accessories

name: Gold Boutique
description:
Recognized as Malaysia's largest jewellery retail chain, Poh Kong is renowned for its impeccable craftsmanship in curating stunning pieces from gold, diamonds, jade, and colored gems. Catering to various preferences and budgets, the collection offers something for everyone with its personalized creations and wide appeal.
Among the brand lineup, Tranz stands for self-expression and modern style, while Happy Love features oriental gold jewellery symbolizing destined love's journey, the Auspicious incorporates 'Fengshui' elements, and Anggun showcases cultural beauty. Disney and Ms. Petite collections cater to the young.
Turning to diamonds, Hemera boasts the most brilliant diamonds with 101 facets, and D'first offers affordable luxury and the joy of a first diamond.

name: Golden Seven Mobile
description: Retailing in Smartphones and related accessories

name: Goldheart
description: Since 1994, GOLDHEART creations have weaved its romance through beautifully crafted designs.

name: Gong Cha
description: Retailing of Bubble Tea under the brand of GONG CHA only

name: Green Pasture
description: Welcome to Green Pasture, where our 20 years of experience in portrait and caricature drawing blend artistry with imagination. Our talented artists craft unique, timeless pieces that capture the essence of individuals and moments. Join us in celebrating creativity and personal expression through our exceptional artworks. Explore the world of art at Green Pasture.

name: Greenology
description: GREENOLOGY was launched in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia in 2012, with a range of naturally-inspired hair and body care. Formulations with finest quality ingredients from around the world at an affordable price. A sincere interest in modern simplicity design, we believe that good design makes it possible to improve our quality of life. Our research lab emphasis the practicability of products, simplifies application procedures, and aims at multiple functionalities of products. The product experience comes from satisfaction through pleasant sensory design: Smell, Touch and Visual appeal. GREENOLOGY product packaging design is driven by minimalist idea instead of a fancy packaging. Argan Oil from MOROCCO is the first key ingredient for GREENOLOGY hair and body care. This wonder oil extracted from the kernels of argan tree contains of high Vitamin E and Fatty Acid, ability to nourish, hydrate and moisturize our skin. It absorbs easily and is non-greasy and non-irritating, which makes it a great natural moisturizer.

name: Guardian
description:
Guardian Malaysia is to provide customers with a wide range of health, beauty, and personal care products while delivering excellent customer service.
Helping our customers to afford a healthy and beautiful life everyday

name: H&M
description: Presenting to you the latest trends hot off the runway, Swedish multi-national fashion retailer H&M at Sunway Pyramid is a wonderland for all trendsetters. Believe us when we say that everything you’re looking for is right here! The brand has gained a reputation for its fast-fashion apparel for men, women, and children. For women who like to keep their attire simple and minimalistic, opt for the brands range of Basic wear for a line of tops, bottoms, dresses, and outerwear that’s minimalistic and easily complements anything you have in your wardrobe. You’ll look like that emoji with heart eyes as you scan through their endless aisles of clothes. Shop for a new top as the brand features various t-shirts, graphic Tees, sleeveless tops, blouses, shirts, long sleeve and short sleeve tops, cropped tops and more! Now that you’ve found your top, search through their range of bottoms, with several styles available for their shorts (denim, cotton, etc), mini to maxi skirts, trousers (chinos, joggers, flared pants), leggings and jeans (skinny, slim, straight, flare, etc). If you don’t have time to match pieces of apparel together, opt for their range of dresses, jumpsuits or rompers! Mix up your ensemble with one of their outerwear by putting on their jackets, coats, cardigans, sweaters or blazers. Wondering how much better can the shopping get here? Check this out, they even have sections dedicated to swimwear and beachwear, lingerie, sportswear, accessories, shoes, and beauty products! Talk about housing all your needs under one roof. H&M is the perfect place for men who want to look good, with its range of shirts, T-shirts and tanks, hoodies and sweatshirts, cardigans and sweaters, jackets and coats, blazers and suits. A line of shorts, trousers and jeans, as well as wardrobes necessities such as underwear and socks are also available. Parents can delight in the fact that H&M caters to all their young ones’ needs, as they offer a selection of clothing and accessories for children ranging from newborn to teenagers! Turn your next shopping trip at H&M into a fun family affair!

name: HAIR DO
description: Retailing of hair care & beauty products

name: HAIRDIRECT
description: Retailing of hair products

name: HAPPY FISH
description: THE LEADING SWIM SCHOOL IN SINGAPORE & MALAYSIA, ESTABLISHED SINCE 2007!

name: HEYTEA
description: The Originator of New-Style Tea. The Originator of Cheezo Foam Tea. Real Ingredients. Real Quality. TASTE JOY.

name: HLA
description:
Explore the world of HLA, where style meets substance, and every piece tells a story of quality, life, and accessibility.
Your destination for menswear that defines High Quality, Living, and Affordable fashion.
Originally from China in 2002, HLA is now available in Sunway Pyramid. Holding the value of tolerance, innovation and mutual benefit. Wave of the industry’s evolution surges up and HLA write a new chapter for men’s wear. The products have good quality and favorable price. The large scale enables diverse self-choices for men’s wear. HLA reformed the development mode for clothing industry.
Since establishment, HLA has started to lift the brand value through the branding business mode. As a lifestyle brand, what HLA selling to the global males is the relaxed, fashionable and decent personal image. This is where our high value comes in.
HLA. H stand for High Quality, H comes from “High quality” high value brand. L originate from “Live”. It symbolizes youth, vitality, sense of fashion and continual updating. Stylish, fashionable and comfortable. HLA is brave enough for innovation and try to bring the customers with more “trendy” product. A comes from “affordable”. Our products are with excellent quality and reasonable price and can be easily bought at one stop. The various products of HLA can meet almost all the demands of men in wearing.
HLA is the excellent-quality and reasonable-price fashion clothes show independent attitude for fashion. We put craftsman’s heart into making fashion clothes which is the most suitable for men’s wear. HLA clothes with high quality and cost performance to uplifted the industrial standards and leaded the men’s wear fashion.

name: HOTPOT KITCHEN
description: Hotpot Kitchen popping a fresh eating trend! The flexibility of selecting your favourite ingredients and level of spiciness has become one of the iconic trendy menus for the youngsters today! Have you try? Originate from Sichuan, the hotpot ingredients are about a variety of flavours: Spicy Flowery (Sichuan peppercorns), salty, sour, sweet & smoky. Frequently all those flavours are combined in one dish. The result is a cuisine with an incredible depth and complexity of flavour, hitting all sense receptors in your mouth, nose and gastrointestinal system at the same time. The flexibility of selecting your favourite ingredients and level of spiciness has become one of the iconic trendy menus for the youngsters today! Variety of our foodstuffs & ingredients are selected for its finest quality and freshness, thru high-tech sterilization, served in exhilarating platter filled with organic flavours and healthy cravings. Hotpot Kitchen always served non Pesticides, non-antibiotics and non-Hormones ingredients and food. Hotpot Kitchen proudly presents a series of value set lunch menus which serves to promote a balanced and healthy meal at the lowest price possible! These value packages available on weekdays during lunch hours on 12 to 4 pm. Do visit Hotpot Kitchen Sunway Pyramid now and don’t miss it!

name: HP
description: Retailing of computers, laptops and related accessories.

name: HUUK
description: Retailing of Men's Hair Cut & Salon.

name: HYPE
description:
HYPEClothing was founded in 2012, owning its name to the evergreen American subcultures as well as to the ambitious people who envisioned great success for the brand. Since the opening of its first store, it became too apparent that HYPE was living up to its name, and the clothing brand’s authentic vision to stay true to its American subculture roots has garnered an impressive following.
With the launch of its latest store in Sunway Pyramid, HYPE continues to push its influence for authentic American subcultures across Klang Valley, while bolstering a remarkable wealth of experience under its belt in the industry, pivotal in establishing long-lasting relationships with customers in the region. The label has not forgotten its long-term sale strategies and operates to serve its customers as it encourages growth and success within and outside of its bubble. While HYPE produces quality streetwear apparels for its customers, the brand doesn’t shy away from encouraging new ideas for its products through established R&D and collabs. Through collabs alone.
HYPE has been able to instill its brand principles and philosophy to reach an even wider set of audience across the nation. Today, HYPE continues to show a competitive brand presence within its community of classic-modern apparel hunters with a knack for something truly timeless.

name: Haagen-Dazs
description: Pamper yourself with Haagen Dazs Ice Cream at Sunway Pyramid. Haagen Dazs make the best ice cream in the world using high quality, carefully selected ingredients. Haagen Dazs founder, Reuben believed that if you were going to indulge in ice cream, it should be a real and fulfilling experience rather than the 'cold and sweet stuff' of his time. Häagen-Dazs ice cream comes in several traditional flavors as well as several esoteric flavors that are specific to the brand, such as Vanilla Swiss Almond and Bananas Foster. It is marketed as a "super-premium" brand: it is quite dense means it is very little air is mixed in during manufacture, uses no emulsifiers or stabilizers other than egg yolks, and has a high butterfat content. It is sold both in grocery stores and in dedicated retail outlets serving ice cream cones, sundaes, and so on. Häagen-Dazs ice cream starts with real cream and milk, which we then blend with carefully selected ingredients, to create an ice cream with a unique velvety texture and unforgettable taste. Every mouthful of Häagen-Dazs is an absorbing, intensely pleasurable experience, so good that you can't help but share it with those you love. Always check out the best delas on Haagen Dazs Sunway Pyramid.

name: Haidilao Hotpot
description: There are personalized services in Haidilao Hot Pot, including free nail art on working days and hand care on holiday for female customers while they are waiting in the line. Customers can also have free leather shoe cleaning service, as well as free photo printing. The restaurant offers massage chairs for customers. Also, some stores have children’s play rooms and are accompanied by special personnel. While eating at Haidilao Hot Pot, customers can view Sichuan's characteristic face-changing performance as well as a fusion of Chinese martial arts. The restaurant also provides customers with a variety of snacks, fruits, and games at their seats. Haidilao Hot Pot has won more than ten titles and honors such as “advanced enterprise”, “consumer satisfaction unit” and “famous hot pot” in Sichuan, Shanxi, Henan and other provinces in China. From 2008 to 2012, it won the “Top 10 Hot Pot Restaurant” by the public comment website for 5 consecutive years in China. At the same time, it won the honorary title of “Top 100 Chinese Catering Enterprises” for 5 consecutive years. On May 27, 2011, “Haidilao” trademark was awarded “China Famous Brand”.

name: Halolo Park
description: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure at Halolo Park, the largest claw machine park in Malaysia! Step into a vibrant world filled with exciting claw machines offering plush toys, snacks, and trendy blind boxes. Perfect for families, friends, and claw machine enthusiasts, Halolo Park promises a fun-filled experience for all ages. Whether you're aiming to win your favorite plush, uncovering surprises in blind boxes, or simply enjoying the thrill of the game, Halolo Park is the ultimate destination for fun and entertainment.

name: Hana Dining + Sake Bar
description:
Hana Dining Sake Bar is introduced to Malaysia from Taiwan in 2015, setting a stardard to deliver a whole new modern Japanese dining experience. Nether fast food nor slow food: it's all about Fresh Food, because we prepare healthy food using fresh, quality products.
All of our dishes are prepared upon order using the finest imported ingredients as well as fresh sourced from the local market. At HDG, you choose what you want and how you want it, and we’ll cook it there and then, so you can enjoy the best cuisine embodying our culture “Sexy Ambience . Great Food . Good People . Chill Music”.
Be part of us today, as there is certainly something for everyone “Itadakimasu!”

name: Harvey Norman
description: Harvey Norman, from Australia, provides a wide range of Electrical, Computers, Furniture and Bedding products. Harvey Norman has predominant international presence with 264 stores in Australia, New Zealand, Ireland, Slovenia, Singapore and Malaysia. Harvey Norman stresses on 4-in-1 concept and carries a huge range from the latest home entertainment systems and computing technology, to most stylish and innovative home appliances as well as comprehensive range of Furniture and Bedding products. There are a total of 13 Harvey Norman Stores in Malaysia.

name: Havaianas
description: Everyday can feel like a holiday when you’ve got your pair of Havaianas on! Looking for flit flops and sandals but worried that it screams overly plan or laid-back? Trust us when we say that at Havaianas at Sunway Pyramid, you’ll find only the trendiest and comfortable pairs that look so great you’ll want to wear it everywhere. What was previously worn as an essential beachwear, has now become an icon of fun, fashion and casualness that will accompany you no matter how far your feet take you. With over 50 years of history in the footwear retailer industry, this Brazilian brand’s first pair was actually based on the traditional Japanese Zori sandals which use rice straw to create the soles. How the brand makes its flit flops and sandals iconic is by it trademark design, creating the texture of their rubber soles to appear like rice grains. Even before crossing international borders, the brand first gained recognition from foreign countries when tourists would love to them home as gifts, or even to sell in their home country. Havaianas’ footwear isn’t just iconic, it gives you top quality to match its reputation, claiming that their flit flops and sandals don’t lose their shape, don’t smell and their straps don’t come loose. Over the years, the brand has evolved and adapted with trends, which led to the birth of new footwear from them, including sneakers and espadrilles to cater to fans who live in countries with climates that require something warmer than flit flops. Translating the rubber flit flops into the soles of the sneaker showcases how the brand retains its symbolic feature into its latest creations. Havaianas constantly brings you fresh designs featuring eye-catching colours, fun prints, and even special collections (like their Frozen 2 range!). Priding themselves on footwear that is designed with comfort in mind, wearing their products will bring joy to your feet! The brand is also known for its sustainability efforts, donating part of its revenue to help preserve Brazilians forests, oceans, flora and fauna.

name: HeLo Moo!
description:
We’re not just about froyo; we’re about 100% Dairy Froyo, As It Was Always Meant to Be. 🍦❤️ Indulge in the creamy, dreamy goodness that’s real, fresh, and oh-so-delicious. 🌟
At HeLo Moo, we’re proud to serve The Realest Froyo Around!

name: Herschel
description: If you’ve ever hear someone say that backpacks aren’t in style, they’ve obviously never been to Herschel in Sunway Pyramid. Manufacturing hipster retro backpacks and accessories since 2009, Canadian brand Herschel quickly became renowned for its status as a hipster bag brand. Its range of products consists of backpacks, duffel bags, luggage, hats and other accessories. Targeted at the age group of 18 – 35 years old, the brand’s products are designed to evoke a sense of American nostalgia, with its iconic logo that gives off a vintage feeling, synthetic leather straps and even its brand name which is named after a small Canadian frontier village. The design of the bags is iconic and easily recognisable, available in different collections, such as the Classics collection designed for the everyday traveller, the Studio Collection which expresses a unique creativity in each design, the BWH collection made up of experimental designs, and the Kids collection which is down-sized for children and youths. Men and women can opt for different types of bags depending on their occasion and style preference, such as backpacks, duffles, messenger bags, hip packs, totes and crossbodies. Their range of apparel includes rainwear, windbreakers, fleeced, insulated attire, jackets, tees, long sleeves, crewnecks, hoodies, shorts and pants. Complete your look with their line of accessories, comprising of headwear, wallets, laptop sleeves, travel accessories, and pouches. If you’re ready for an adventure, a durable and fashionable luggage is an absolute must-have! Check out their selection of hard-shell and soft-shell luggage, carry-on luggage and check-in luggage, to find that perfect travel companion that’ll keep your belongings, plus have extra room to store your purchases! The brand even has a range of travel accessories such as passport holders, umbrellas, luggage belt, luggage scale, travel organisers and adapters laundry bags, toiletry bag, and shoe bag. Travelling with a little one? Worry not, Herschel even supplies products you need for your baby on a trip, such as beanies and changing mats! They’ve got you covered for the entire trip!

name: Himalaya
description:
The Himalaya Drug Company was founded in 1930 by Mr. M.Manal with a clear vision to bring Ayurveda to society in a contemporary form and to unravel the mystery behind the 5,000-year-old system of medicine. In the years that followed, the brand has introduced many other iconic brands which have become household names.
Today, Himalaya's portfolios include Pharmaceuticals, Personal Care, Baby Care, Wellness, and Animal Health. Himalaya brand is synonymous with safe and efficacious herbal products. We operate in over 100countries, our products are prescribed by 400,000 doctors worldwide, and millions of customers trust us for their health and personal care needs.
Here in Malaysia, Himalaya is owned and operated by Embun Elit Sdn Bhd. With more than 200 products available in the local market. Always remember Himalaya with our tagline "Wellness in Every Household, Happiness in Every Heart".
For more information on Himalaya Malaysia, visit: www.shophimalaya.my

name: Hokkaido Baked Cheese Tart
description: Hokkaido Baked Cheese Tart has been immensely popular since its launched in 2016, with legions of fans stand in line to get their hands on the cheesylicious tarts. The soft and creamy centre is made with a blend of three high-quality specialty cheeses; piped into a crunchy short-crust pastry base. It tastes best when it's piping hot and fresh from the oven, it can also be eaten chilled, frozen, or at room temperature for a smooth and creamy experience.

name: Hush Puppies
description:
With its memorable and iconic adorable basset hound logo, Hush Puppies Footwear & Accessories in Sunway Pyramid is where you’ll find soft and breathable footwear of unparalleled comfort. Regardless of age, gender, lifestyle, or style preference, you’ll want to embrace the everyday comfort that their shoes provide. Since 1958, this global brand has expanded to over 165 countries around the world, turning its beloved basset hound trademark into a cultural icon featured on footwear and apparel for men, ladies, and children.
For the ladies, treat your feet to comfy sandals and flip-flips that are lightweight, flexible and well-cushioned, designed to encourage natural alignment of the body to reduce fatigue. If you prefer footwear that keep your toes covered, try their slip-ons, espadrilles, boat shoes, loafers or ballet flats with soft and bouncy insoles to cushion your feet every step of the way. A selection of heels is available in different styles, with options for closed-toe or peep-toe variations, wedges heels, medium heels or kitten heels, rest assured this range are heels that you’ll feel comfortable to walk in the whole day. For casual shoes, try their sporty and fun sneakers! Its breathable material allows for maximum ventilation, while its outer sole is built with lightweight material to ease your stride and the foot bed is comfortably cushioned so you’ll feel as though you’re walking on clouds.
For the men, versatile, comfortable sandals and flip-flops are available in different designs and materials such as leather, rubber, and suede, to suit wherever you’re headed. If you’re going to be walking a lot and need extra protection covering your feet, opt for their range of sneakers or smart casual slip-ons. Emphasizing a casual cool design, their sneakers are lightweight and have comfortable and bouncy foot beds to prevent your feet from getting tired out easily, and to provide flexibility and energy return with each step. The breathability of their shoes will also help you keep your feet dry and avoid any odour.

name: Itsu
description: ITSU is a Japanese phrase with the meaning of “the royal touch”, reflecting their professional commitment in providing customers the best products and services in the reflexology industry. By having more than 20 years of experience in reflexology industry, they are determined to learn and retain age-old techniques and practices used by massage therapists. By that, ITSU products uses technology to recreate hand-massage techniques, as to let everyone enjoy the traditional and precise massage for years to come. ITSU’s culture: UCHI KINSHIP, which UCHI means ‘home’. The ideal home includes security and stability of family, nation, and many other factors. ITSU welcome everyone to be part of their UCHI, and as part of their family, your health and wellness is the top priority. Check out ITSU at Lower Ground floor (orange zone) for that "royal touch".

name: JC CONCEPT
description:
Hello~ We are JC CONCEPT in Sunway Pyramid which transformed from JC My Closet Diary. It was founded in 2008 by Christine Lim together with her husband Joseph Pang.
JC Concept is now providing alternative of Fashion Clothing & Evening gowns from XS to 7XL~ Of course, alteration service (if needed) is still provided. Numerous unique Designs & cutting of Fashion clothing & evening gowns provided. Some of the fashion clothing are designed by our In-house designer. The Fashion clothing is included tops, blouses, shorts, trousers, denim, jeans & inner wears. Therefore, you no need to worry that you might wear either identical outfits or similar ones with others. For those who like unique designs clothing, please do not wait anymore, come & grab your favourite clothing~
Alright~ all outer wears are provided, how about inner wears? Well~ what you guess is right! We are providing inner wears as well. We are having shaping bra (from A to I cup) but not the normal bra. So, what is shaping bra? What is the function of shaping bra? Shaping bra is a bra which can help women to “re-shape” the breast. It contains negative-ions which could help to purify the blood in our body. We women understand women. Especially for the sisters who gave birth. Although we gave birth, we must always make sure our body is still “in control”.
Our dream is to provide love & care to the sisters who are not confident with their appearances through changing their outfits.No matter what size you are, you MUST believe that you are much beautiful than you think. So, be confident to be the beauty in this world.
If you have any enquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Contact No. :
03-5613 2551
016-219 0723 (Christine)
011-1634 6342 (Jia Hui)

name: JD Sports

name: JOHNNY’S RESTAURANT
description:
Come on over to Johnny’s Restaurants for a hearty meal. Newly opened in Sunway Pyramid, Johnny’s is well known for its Thai steamboat and many other Thai favourites – loved by both children & adults alike!
Here in Johnny’s, we truly believe freshness is key to delicious meals. Our chicken soup is prepared daily every morning. This yummy broth truly brings out the freshness in the steamboat ingredients. Choose from an array of seafood, meat and vegetables of your liking, or steamboat sets for 2 pax and 4 pax for your convenience. Our house speciality items are not to be missed! Paired with ‘Suki Sauce’ – our unique Thai dip sauce that constantly leaves you longing for more.
Our Thai favourites – a range of rice, noodles & ala carte dishes are perfect for a wholesome meal any time of the day. BBQ Chicken Wings and Pineapple Fried Rice are kids all-time favourite while Tom Yam lovers can’t get enough of our spicy & flavourful Tom Yam soup prepared fresh daily. Whether you are in the mood for something spicy or not, we have a variety of dishes to satisfy your cravings!
Come on over to Johnny’s for a great meal today!

name: JOHOR MINI STEAMBOAT & VILLAGECIOUS

name: JOLLIBEE
description:
Jollibee, home of world-famous crispy and juicy Chickenjoy, has finally opened in Sunway Pyramid!
Jollibee is the flagship brand of Jollibee Group, and it is one of the fastest growing South-East Asian QSR with branches worldwide, including the United States of America, Canada, United Kingdom, Italy, Spain, Vietnam, Singapore, Brunei, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Qatar, Oman, Kuwait, Bahrain, Malaysia, and the special territories of Hong Kong and Macau.
Enjoy Jollibee's bestsellers such as the world-famous Chickenjoy - delicately hand-breaded for a crispy exterior, cooked with precision for maximum juiciness, and marinated to the bone for next-level flavour. For those who love a hot kick to their fried chicken, Jollibee offers Spicy Chickenjoy which is coated with fiery breading and infused with a signature spicy marinade. Some of the other crowd pleasers includes the Jolly Spaghetti, prepared with its signature sweet-style sauce, loaded with chunky slices of beef sausage and generously topped with cheese, and the Yumburger is Jollibee’s version of the hamburger and a favourite that can be ordered with or without cheese.

name: JYNNS x Lo Hong Ka
description: In this fast-paced lifestyle, many of us had disregard our health. We only seek for treatments or remedies when we experienced with health problems. No matter the age, we should take care of our overall health. This had brought to Lo Hong Ka’s motto, “prevention is better than cure”. Over the years, Lo Hong Ka had received numerous prestigious awards and recognitions such as Hong Kong Superbrands Award, Hong Kong Top Brand Award, TVB Weekly The Most Popular Brand Award and The 1999 Taiwan Consumer Association’s Excellent Award. Lo Hong Ka’s products are natural as there are no additives, no preservatives and no bleach. Staying true to its natural health content of each products and giving maximum healthy value. Hence, Lo Hong Ka’s philosophy is to contribute towards society’s well-being by developing affordable natural health foods. What’s the best product? Try the variety ranges of bird’s nest that contain different nutrient and health benefits. Besides that, Lo Hong Ka’s fresh and natural Aloe Vera Cube comes in 5 different flavours are good in enhancing overall health and promote detoxification. Moreover, it is good in cooling your body, prevent constipation and relive hangovers . Lo Hong Ka also offers several range of herbal and nourishing soups, that are good for both women and men! Lastly, you may find the perfect (and healthy) gift for your precious one here! Visit Lo Hong Ka at Lower Ground 2 floor (blue zone) for more health goods now!

name: Jardin Coffee & Tea
description:
Jardin Coffee & Tea is a quaint cafe serving premium coffee, hot food, delightful cakes, and pastries. We believe in a world where every cup of coffee is to be served holistically with highest quality product, inviting spaces, and exceptional service.
Currently, Jardin Coffee & Tea has expanded over 4 business outlets and will soon be the leading, fastest growing local coffee brand in Malaysia!

They provide a wide range of footwear, bags and accessories in unique design and scents. Products for kids, young girls and ladies are well designed in stylish and comfortable at a reasonable price which aim for delivering both lifestyle and desire for all.
The brand's iconic, high-quality PVC shoes under ‘All the Way’ collection which comes in Earth tone palette for every day. name: Jipinhe Scones
description:
Jipinhe Scones is a Food & Beverages franchise brand founded in Shanghai, China since 2008 and currently has more than 400 outlets operating in China nation-wide.

We are specialized in selling traditional china cuisine such as China style scones, hand-made classic noodles, and traditional China dessert. Our company vision is to bring the authentic flavors of China by using the freshest ingredients and finest traditional recipes to Malaysian.

name: Jo Malone
description:
Jo Malone London is a British perfume and scented candle brand, founded by Jo Malone in 1983. It has been owned since 1999 by Estée Lauder. The brand is known for its expensive perfumes, luxury candles, bath products, and room scents. Jo Malone is a quintessentially British fragrance brand that has created some of the most celebrated perfumes in the industry. The brand became popular in the United States following Malone's appearance on The Oprah Winfrey Show. In 1999, Jo Malone sold the company to Estée Lauder Companies for "undisclosed millions". Malone continued to work for the brand as creative director until 2006, and was barred from creating a new fragrance or skincare line for 5 years due to a non-compete agreement. The brand is represented by English model and musician Karen Elson and model and actress Poppy Delevingne who have served as spokespersons for the brand. Check out the best deal on Jo Malone in Sunway Pyramid.

name: Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant
description:
佐敦冰室创立于2020年, 是一家不只做正宗传统的港式美食, 同时也致力于把传统和创新揉合起来的港式餐厅。 我们以弘揚传统的港式 餐厅文化為基础,开发特色菜着为目标。 而这一切都由拥有25年经验的港式餐厅师 傅以专业脫俗的廚艺去打造出各类不同 形式且独具匠心的港式美食带给大家。
佐敦冰室秉承「优质食品和服务」的原则, 由选料过程到烹饪方法都极尽心思, 配合热诚体贴的服務, 处处「以客为本,精益求精」, 势必时刻让顾客享受优质创新的饮食体验。
Founded in 2020, Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant is a Hong Kong-style restaurant that not only serves authentic traditional Hong Kong-style cuisine, but is also committed to combining tradition and innovation. We aim to develop special dishes based on the traditional Hong Kong restaurant culture and basis. And all of this is brought to you by the Hong Kong-style restaurant chefs with 25 years of experience who use professional and custom culinary art to create various types of unique Hong Kong style cuisine of personal ingenuity. Jordan Hong Kong Restaurant adheres to the principle of "quality food and service". Full of dedication from the selection process to the cooking method, coupled with enthusiasm and considerate service.
Always be "customer-oriented, and excellence", it is bound to allow customers enjoy high-quality and innovative dining experience at 
all times.

description: Juice Works Malaysia is committed to creating and hand crafting fresh fruit juices and healthy smoothies using only the freshest and most natural ingredients we can lay our hands only. name: KWAN KEE STORE
description:
"Kwan Kee Store is renowned for its dedication to delivering authentic flavors and traditional craftsmanship. Specializing in Hong Kong ancient stone dessert such as 3 flavor type of Rice Bowl, Steam Cakes, Sticky Rice Roll and Baked Item, the store has earned a reputation for quality, consistency, and attention to detail.
Our commitment to culinary excellence has been recognized by the prestigious Michelin Guide, with Kwan Kee Store proudly receiving the Michelin Guide Recommendation for six consecutive years and known as Hong Kong number one pastry in Malaysia. This accolade highlights our passion for bringing time-honored recipes to life and delivering an exceptional dining experience to every guest.
At Kwan Kee Store, every dish is a testament to our pursuit of tradition, taste, and authenticity. We invite you to savor the flavors that have earned us this esteemed recognition year after year."

name: Kaison
description: Retailing of home furnishing, home decorations, household goods, gifts and other related products

name: KakatooGo
description: At Kakatoo, we believe that food is the bridge to harmony. Our mission is to present Nyonya delicacies that everyone can enjoy. That’s why we’ve secured Halal certifications for our kuih and food, bringing you an authentic local delight that people of all backgrounds can sit together and savor with peace of mind.

name: Kamelah Tobacco House
description: Retailing of cigars, pipes, tobacco and related products.

name: Karafu
description: A trendy, fun and colourful gift shop where you can find cute and quality cartoon characters’s products for your own collection or your loved ones.

name: Kate Spade New York
description:
Ssince our launch in 1993 with six essential handbags, we've always stood for optimistic feminity
today we're global life and style house filled with handbags, of course. also clothes,
shoes, jewelry, home decor, tech accessories and so many other things that you use every day.
we value thoughtful details. we think a layer of polished ease looks (and feels) so chic.
and to us, modern, sophisticated colors make a personal style statement all their own.
it’s these founding principles that define our unique style. we like that our style is synonymous with joy.
kate spade new york is part of the tapestry house of brands.

name: Kebab King
description: Retailing of chicken, beef and lamb kebab.

name: Kenangan Coffee
description:
Kenangan Coffee is the fastest growing grab-and-go coffee chain from Indonesia, founded in 2017. It has over 800 stores in Indonesia, and now available in Malaysia. Kenangan Coffee is known for its Kenangan Blend coffee beans and signature Kenangan Latte. It also offers coffee, tea, and food.
Download the Kenangan Coffee app to pre-order or find us at LG1.118A Orange Atrium

name: Kiehl's Since 1851
description:
Kiehl's LLC is an American cosmetics brand retailer that specializes in skin, hair, and body care products. It started as a single pharmacy in Manhattan at Third Avenue and East 13th Street in 1851. Kiehl's was purchased by the L'Oréal Group in 2000 and currently has more than 250 retail stores worldwide, and over 1,000 points of sale supplemented by sales in high-end department stores, select airport locations, as well as independent stockists. In contrast to its market competitors, Kiehl's is distinguished for its unorthodox marketing approach, exceptionally large male clientele base, and its products' simple and straightforward packaging. Find healthier skin with a personalised skincare routine tailored to your needs at Kiehl's Sunway Pyramid! Powered by science and nature since 1851, find out more about our all-time customer favourite skin care beauty products.
#BeautyTreats

name: King Koil
description:
King Koil Malaysia was incorporated in 1983 and since its inception has been the leading manufacturer and supplier of high quality sleep related products in Malaysia.
KKM developes and manufactures a wide range of sleep products such as Inner Spring mattress, Latex mattress, Fibre Coir mattress, HR Foam mattress, Memory Foam mattress, Divan Foundations, BED Frame, Rollaway Spare Bed, Pillow, Bolster, Bedsheet, Duvet and bedding products etc.King Koil's goal is to offer only the highest quality, selection and service to meet the demands of today's changing markets.

name: Kipling
description: Kipling's story is one of great passion, creative and entrepreneurial spirit. It all started in 1987 in a small flat in Antwerp, the city of fashion. Three keen enthusiasts decided to make their entrance into the fashion world with a trendy yet affordable collection of bags. Armed with a strong brand, a powerful image, and an extensive range of fashionable, practical and high quality bags, KIPLING has been busy conquering the world over the last 30 years. Every bag has its own mascot monkey dangling from it. Today, KIPLING plays a part in the everyday life of millions of women in 67 countries throughout the world. Their KIPLING accompanies them on their way to work, on their shopping trips, whilst playing sports, at work, and on their evenings out. No wonder because KIPLING bags are simply unique, they are not only super trendy but they are also of high quality, practical and affordable.

name: Koi The
description: The story begins 29 years ago when the first 50 Lan store was established in Taiwan and grown into a market leader in delivering premium tea beverage. In 2006, from the same parentage as 50 Lan, KOI was founded to bring the success onto international platform with first overseas store in Singapore. Today KOI direct manages over 600 outlets in 12 countries, making tea-tasting a pleasant experience for everyone.

name: Koong Woh Tong
description: Koong Woh Tong has been the household name to sought for traditional Chinese herbal teas and their famous ‘Guiling Gao’. Their first shop was opened in 1990 at Kuala Lumpur, and now there are over 50 outlets in Peninsula Malaysia. Throughout the years, the brand continued to conduct researches on authentic herbs formula with a will to keep in tune with the modern dietary habits of the customers. When the body is overworked and immune system is weak, the risk of getting sick is higher too. So, we need to take care of our overall health! Are you having indigestion or constipation? Sleepless nights? Take Koong Woh Tong Herbal Jelly! There are many healing properties of this jelly such as promotes balanced body metabolism, detoxifies the body, eliminates body heat, eliminates pimples and acne, restores body wellness. Caught under the weather with flu/cough/sore throat/cold/fever? Wants to detox and relieves body heat? Take Ya Sei Mei herbal tea! This tea has been traditionally labelled as a healthy beverage due to its remarkable medical properties. Brewed from more than 20 types of Chinese herbs, this tea could boost your health! Want to boost your body energy? Try the Five Flower Herbal Tea! The healing effects of this tea are cooling and soothing, whilst nourishing the spiritual energy. Besides that, drinking this tea can moisturise the eyes and improves sight energy, clears body heat and expel dampness. Our liver is one of the most important organ in our body. This is because the liver removes toxins and harmful substances from your body. The ‘Ji Gu Cao’ or Abrum Cantonese Plant Tea is sweet and slightly sour, good in protecting and soothing the liver. Moreover, this tea is effective in alleviate body heat and dissipate blood stasis. Apart from that, the ‘Xia Gu Cao’ or Spica Prunellae Tea is good for up-flaming of liver heat. Symptoms of liver heat are dizziness, swollen eyes, headache, constipation, insomnia and dry mouth. Last but not least, for those who feel anxious from heavy workloads, smokes and drinks should drink the Ling Zi Momordica herbal tea. This tea specialise in healing throat discomfort from smoking and drinking, and improve blood circulation. Visit Koong Who Tong at Lower Ground floor (blue zone) to get your health in check!

name: Kyochon
description: Retailing of QSR fried chicken & beverages.

name: LAC Nutrition for Life
description:
LAC, short for Leader in Anti-oxidative Control, is a leading health and wellness supplement brand with a global presence.
In 1997, the world began realising how critical antioxidants are for good health. LAC was then born to fill that market’s need for the most powerful antioxidant.
Since its founding, LAC has embarked on a pioneering journey to develop scientifically based formulas, harnessing the best of eastern wisdom and western technology to neutralise free radicals, combat ageing brought forth by oxidative stress, and support you daily in looking, feeling, and functioning at your best.
Today, LAC has over 100 nutraceutical products focusing on the 5 fundamentals – Beauty, Anti-ageing, Immunity, Energy, and Weight Management – bringing consumers unparalleled solutions for their everyday health and wellness.

name: LAMY
description: Retailing of Writing Instrument, Refills of Writing Instrument and Notebook only

name: LANCÔME
description:
Lancôme is the quintessence of beauty, with over 80 years of experience in luxury skincare, makeup and fragrance. The world of Lancôme is one where women can enjoy the spoils of scientific expertise and targeted innovations, all in highly effective products! Above all, the brand strives to deliver a product range that makes every woman happy and beautiful, so come on in and discover it all today.
#BeautyTreats

name: LANEIGE
description: LANEIGE, derived from the French word “snow”, is a South Korean beauty brand launched in 1994 by Amorepacific, the largest beauty empire in South Korea. LANEIGE believes hydration is the fundamental key to luminous skin for beauty that radiates from within. With 29 years of dedication and expertise in moisture and skin research, LANEIGE developed its exclusive Water Recipe that transforms the water, the source of life, into dynamic moisture energy for clear and supple skin. LANEIGE was launched as the first brand under Amorepacific Malaysia in 2006. Its star products include the Water Bank Line, Water Sleeping Mask, Perfect R new Line, Radian-C Line and NEO Cushion.

name: LAVENDER
LEATHER AVENUE
description: Here to help you fulfil all your wanderlust desires, Leather Avenue at Sunway Pyramid is a top-quality leather goods, bags, and leather luggage retailer that has all you need so that you’ll be able to pack all your necessities for that next trip, and still leave room for your trip haul! Poised to be a leader in the industry, Leather Avenue carries several prominent brands including, Lushberry, Esfolar, Mendoza, Charles Berkeley, Valentino Creations, and more. Their assortment of products includes trendy and durable luggage bags and leather goods, including wallets and bags for men and women, which are crafted to be both fashionable yet functional. The Lushberry luggage, ranging from various sizes of 19” to 29” to cater to your travel needs, is the ideal travel partner. Each piece is designed to maximize style while minimizing hassles through its beautiful design and the premium and durable materials used to create outer shells that are tough enough to absorb impact, and flexible enough under stress. The travel experience wouldn’t be complete without the perfect bag to accompany your every step. Leather bags from Brazilian brand Esfolar has a broad selection of bags, from totes to satchels and handbags to cross-body bags, available in numerous colours and designs, to suit each individual’s style and taste. Crafted from the finest leather, their superior-quality and intricate designs, their bags are designed to last. High-quality and durable, Mendoza luggage and travel bags from Hong Kong has a wide array of youthful and vibrant products that make it the perfect travel companion. With it motto of quality, flexibility and versatility, the brand’s luggage bags are unique and fashionable without foregoing quality and practicality. Synonymous with high-quality leather bags, wallets, and accessories for both men and women, Charles Berkeley products are crafted using specially treated leather to grant it impeccable durability and give it a fine finishing touch. Designed to be lightweight and functional, it’s the perfect match for any occasion.

name: LEGEND EIGHT MOBILE
description: Retailing of mobile phones and related accessories, and phone repairs

location: LG1 Ice Rink Railing (Lower Ground 1 Floor)
