name: LIMAPULO
description:
Limapulo, a Michelin Select restaurant at 50, Jalan Doraisamy.
Limapulo by Baba Can Cook, was founded by the late John Tan Kim Chye (affectionately
known as Uncle John) and Alan Yun in 2014. Uncle John, a Baba, was the eldest son and
guardian of his family recipes. This is unusual as the kitchen was the domain of the
Nyonyas.
Alan and Uncle John both believe that the best way to preserve Peranakan heritage recipes
is by sharing them with the world.
Peranakan cuisine is a marriage of Hokkien flavours of soy and bean paste with the Malay
flavours of spice, coconut and tamarind. Dishes are labour intensive and elaborate, an
indicator of the wealth of the Peranakans.

name: LOVE, BONITO
description: Crafted to empower women all over to believe in themselves, Love, Bonito at Sunway Pyramid brings you not just any ordinary clothing, but fashion that will shape your lifestyle, enabling you to confidently express your unique self. This Singaporean brand believes that when you look good, you’ll feel good too, hence using fashion as a tool to empower ladies to shine a little brighter as they grow into the women they desire to be! Designed to ensure you look your best wherever you go, they offer a range of mini, knee length, midi and maxi skirts to suit your mood and occasion. Classy and alluring, mini to maxi jumpsuits that never go out of style are available. For the fashionista who prefer to create an ensemble by mixing and matching their favourite pieces of clothing together, shop through their range of tops, comprising of blouses, camisoles, T-shirts, sleeveless tops and shirts. Style it your way by opting for either pants, shorts, skirts, skorts or jeans to complement the top you’ve chosen. Finish off your perfect ensemble with their range of outwear, shoes, bags, and even accessories to inspire confidence as you strut along your day. With clothing ranging from different fabrics such as denim to knitwear, rest assured the brand’s range is designed to cover every season and stage of each woman’s life. All of their attire is created in-house, to cater to every size, shape and style. Love, Bonito doesn’t practice fitting clothes on static mannequins, instead they fit them on real ladies just like you, and even re-enact real-life situations that every woman will face in a day (whether it’s tying your hair, needing a place to grab a tissue fast, running after a bus). Crafting real clothes for real women, Love, Bonito is one fashion retailer where you’ll find almost everything you need to express your amazing self unabashedly.

name: La Senza
description: Empowering women worldwide to feel confident and sexy every day, La Senza in Sunway Pyramid is the ultimate destination for you to shop the hottest lingerie. As a global brand with more than 300 stores around the world, La Senza prides itself in creating bras, panties and lingerie that every woman will feel bold in. You won’t have to sacrifice comfort with their sexy line of bras, available in different style and sizes to cater to every woman’s individual body type, coverage and style preference. Give you bust a lift with their highly effective push up bras for when you need that extra boost. Contrary to popular belief, push up bras aren’t limited to those with a smaller chest, so for ladies with fuller busts, feel free to get one for yourself too! Strapless and multi-way bras are available to accommodate your tube dress or spaghetti strap top. Or if you’re wearing a bareback top or dress, opt for their backless bras! Bringing you popular bra variations such as bralettes, demi bras, balconette bras, you can try on different style for every day! For the females who love to work up a sweat at the gym, satisfy your fitness needs with La Senza’s range of sports bras. The ultimate comfort is also available through their range of wireless bras! You’ll love shopping for panties at La Senza with their galore of alluring yet snug panties. Never though that thongs and g-strings could be so comfy? Think again, La Senza’s sexy pieces aren’t short on the comfort level either, allowing you to breeze through from morning till night without feeling any discomfort. Spice up your collection of innerwear necessities and shop their range of bikinis, brazillians, chekies, hipster, hiphuggers, boyshorts, high waist and high leg panties. For next level hot-ness, shop their line of super sexy lingerie, including bodysuits, babydolls, merrywidows, cami sets, hosiery, kimonos and robes, chemises, bustiers and sexy bras, and open back, crotchless and garters.

name: Lacoste
description:
LACOSTE, Life is a Beautiful Sport!
Since the very first polo was created in 1933, LACOSTE relies on its authentic sportive roots to spring optimism and elegance on the world thanks to a unique and original lifestyle for women, men and children.

name: Laem Charoen Thai Seafood
description:
Laem Charoen Thai Seafood’s unique signature dish is a deep-fried seabass cooked with fish sauce until crisp and golden. It is a simple dish, full of flavour and cooked from the heart using only the freshest ingredients available with Thai-style flavour and delicate cooking techniques.
Laem Charoen Thai Seafood has grown to become one of the most loved seafood restaurants in Thailand with many branches across the country, attracting both foreigners and Thai customers alike.

name: Lash Bar
description: Latest trends in the style of false eyelashes, make up brushes & accessories

name: Lazo Diamond
description: Owning a diamond is no longer just a dream with Lazo Diamond at Sunway Pyramid. This premier manufacturer and retailer of diamond and white gold jewellery has expanded to have 55 retail stores across the country since it was founded in 2003. The brand is determined to make these exquisite diamond products accessible to all people, without sacrificing on its modern and eye-catching designs, and top-level quality. You’ll certainly be impressed by their selection of bracelets, bangles, necklaces, rings, pendants, and earrings. Adorn your wrist with their range of graceful and delicate bracelets made from white gold, perfect for giving you that timeless and classic look. With their bracelets hovering to the minimalistic and elegant design, this is ideal for women who like to subtly catch the attention of those around her. Besides bracelets, opt to beautify your wrist with their gorgeous and shimmery white gold bangles. No matter what dress or top you’re wearing, it’s important to have a necklace that complements the neckline and enhances your ensemble. A white gold diamond necklace from Lazo Diamond is the ideal choice for accessorizing your neck. Choose from their carefully crafted necklaces with pendants, or if you prefer to personalize and necklace with symbols that are close to your heart, choose from their range of exquisite and distinctive pendants to complete your chain necklace. With white gold diamond pendants, mix gold pendants, some embellished with precious gemstones such as beautiful blue sapphires, your necklace will make you the belle of the ball. Various shapes and designs of pendants are available to satisfy everyone’s style preference. As for their earring collection, an array of stunning white gold and mix gold pieces are crafted into varying designs. Draw attention to your dainty fingers with their line of lovely white gold diamond rings, designed to fit you perfectly. Find your perfect diamond jewellery at Lazo Diamond today!

name: Legend of Tea
description: Quality life begins with tea.

name: Lego
description:
Experience endless fun creatively with the ultimate LEGO® play experience for fans of all ages at LEGO® Certified Store Box Of Bricks.
"Set to Rebuild The World with #SuperpowerOfPlay, LEGO® offers the ultimate play experience for fans of all ages. Come over to LEGO® Certified Store Box of Bricks for all things LEGO®. Build and rebuild anything you can imagine, or get yourself the scale models and collector's playsets with intricate details!
"

name: Leo's Junior Kids Toilet & Baby Room
description:
Introducing... Leo's Junior Kids Toilet & Baby Room!
Welcome to our kid-sized washroom and baby room located at LG1 (Near to Yole, Faber Castell and Juicy) with colourful sanitary wares, sensory taps, air purifiers and more.. Just for kids!
Our rooms are cleaned frequently and sanitised every 4 hours during business hours!
To increase the cleanliness of our rooms, they have been misted with a Nano Coating Technology treatment by SmartCoat for virus disinfection purposes.
Built with you and your child's needs in mind, our baby rooms are equipped with kid-friendly toilets, diaper changing stations, private nursing rooms, hand sanitizer, baby lotion, baby soap, air purifier and hot/cold water dispensers.
For those who require to loan a nursing scarf or milk bottle warmer, kindly proceed to the nearest Concierge Counter, either at Ground Floor (near Main Entrance) or Level LG2 Marrakesh.
Partners: Rentokil Initial, Rigel, SmartCoat, Cuckoo, Pigeon, and Kimberly-Clark

name: Levi's
description: The Levi’s ® brand epitomizes classic American style and effortless cool. Since inventing blue jeans in 1873, we’ve been the authority on denim, becoming the most recognizable and imitated clothing in the world. Our clothes celebrate rugged individuality and self-expression. Rooted in utility, the Levi’s ® brand began as the unofficial uniform of hardworking Californians, and have since been worn by rebels and maverick of all stripes, everywhere. Today, the Levi’s ® brand continues to evolve through a relentless pioneering and innovative spirit that is unparalleled.

name: Li-Ning
description: Li-Ning Malaysia is a leading sportswear brand known for its innovative products and stylish designs. The brand offers a wide range of athletic footwear and apparel for various sports, as well as casual wear. Li-Ning Malaysia has collaborated with high-profile athletes and sports teams globally, and has gained popularity among athletes and fashion-conscious individuals in the country.

name: Li-Ning Badminton
description: Li-Ning Malaysia is a leading sportswear brand known for its innovative products and stylish designs. The brand offers a wide range of athletic footwear and apparel for various sports, as well as casual wear. Li-Ning Malaysia has collaborated with high-profile athletes and sports teams globally, and has gained popularity among athletes and fashion-conscious individuals in the country.

name: LiHO TEA
description:
LiHO TEA has signified a proud No.1 Singapore Bubble Tea Beverage Brand. With a very simple vision to bring the joy of drinking tea to everyone through affordable and quality tea beverage creations. We hope to bring people from all walks of life together.
We have also started offering Stevia Sweetener options to our customers to encourage them to consume less sugar. Stevia, unlike regular sugar, is a natural sweetener with no negative side effects.
Download LiHO TEA App to earn points every time you spend at LiHO TEA & get rewarded, order through our App for a quick pick-me-up and skip the queue, Register Now and enjoy all the "LiHO perks" 😆
At LiHO TEA, we are not just selling a drink. We are providing you with an experience.

name: Linkway Café
description:
Enjoy a cup of freshly brewed coffee or bottle juices, and a selection of meals and snacks, from hot and cold breakfasts to light daytime bites and fulfilling evening meals.
Adjacent to Sunway Resort Hotel Lobby, it is open daily for dine-in and takeaway from
8:00am - 8:00pm

name: Liverpool FC
description: LFC’s official merchandise Al-Ikhsan as LFC’s “Brand Licensee” also provides a affordable collection specially designed for the club’s supporters. The collection includes jerseys, polo T-Shirts, jackets, T-Shirts, umbrellas, sling bags, soccer ball replica and various interesting items that will be sold at a price range as low as RM9.00 up to RM1,399.00 for the jerseys specially signed by the club’s players.

name: Lizzie Café & Bakery
description: Good Food Made Fast. Come to LIZZIE for a quick boost of joy with our coffee, bakes, and delicious meals. Colourful and nutrient-dense, enjoy high quality ingredients and beautiful flavours from our quick Grab & Go selections. Everything is made this morning and absolutely delicious!

name: Lockers
description:
Storage for things you do not want to carry around while shopping. Locate the lockers behind Poh Kong @LG2 Blue Concourse. Terms & conditions apply.
Locker Sizes:
SMALL LOCKER : RM 10* per use
MEDIUM LOCKER Height : RM 20* per use
LARGE LOCKER Height : RM40* per use
HOW TO USE THE LOCKER?
Deposit:
1) Press [NEW LOCKER] and select your locker.
2) Set PIN & re-enter PIN.
3) Choose and remember the colour.
4) Pay with Debit/Credit card or eWallet.
5) Deposit belongings & close the door.
Retrieve:
1) Press [OPEN LOCKER]
2) Enter PIN & press on the pre-selected colour
3) Retrieve your belongings & close the door

name: Lollipop Pink
description:
Want to look good and chic? Make heads turn when you walk by, confidence brimming as you feel good that what you wear reflects who you are? Look no further, come right down to Asian Avenue, first floor and look for Lot number 7 and voila! You will reach Lollipop Pink in Sunway Pyramid, a place where you can shop till you drop. Here’s the catch, pick any two items from the shop, yes, and we mean any two items for just RM 99.90!
Lollipop Pink’s motto: “Fashion is like eating, you shouldn’t stick to the same menu”. Staying true to our motto and belief, we strive to bring you a variety of fashionable clothing and accessories, which ranges from women to men’s attire, addressing different age group’s needs, and providing you the flexibility to mix and match any item in the store for RM 99.90. Simply said, we present you the access to chic and appealing everyday wear and accessories, without burning a hole in your pockets.
Lollipop Pink grew its roots over ten years ago, with a humble beginning retailing in babies and children’s clothing. From then on, Lollipop Pink ventures into women’s clothing as her vision and passion grew to encompass fashion of the young adults. With this passion growing ever stronger, Lollipop Pink has now made her way to Sunway Pyramid, bringing an even broader range of fashion and accessories targeted at both the young and the mature. We are also proud to bring you an interesting and attractive range of muslimah fashion; a touch of feminine poise and elegance.
If you’re looking for a change, for something different, a flair of fun and sparkle, or dash of class and maturity, you are in for a ride! If you’re not sure what fits you, not to worry, swing by and we would love to assist you. So, come right over, we’ll be waiting for you!

name: Loong Kee
description: Loong Kee Dried Meat - Try It, You'll Love It! Freshly made and healthy!

name: Love & Co
description: Reputable as one of the leading creators of bespoke jewellery, Love & Co. has been uniting unparalleled craftsmanship with modern interpretations of the perfect ring – a symbol of an everlasting union. Love & Co. in Sunway Pyramid presents an extensive collection of wedding bands and diamond solitaires to delicately entwine the hearts of lovely couples for eternity. Whether you’re looking for a pair of timeless wedding bands, or you’re selecting that perfect diamond engagement ring for the love of your life, the brand’s romantic jewellery is crafted with precision and dedication to last you forever. Their selection of Diamond jewellery consists of their Lovemarque and LVC Precieux collections. Love & Co promises that each of their Lovemarque diamond is responsibly sourced and delicately crafted, achieving the “Ultimate” grade of light performance in all four parameters: Brilliance (the intense bright light that shines from the diamond), Sparkle (dramatic flashes that occurs with movement of the diamond), Fire (vivid rainbow-like colours that are emitter from the diamond) and Light Symmetry (equal distribution of light reflected from the diamond). Under their LVC Precieux, you’ll find exquisite lab grown diamonds that are chemically, physically and optically identical to naturally-mined diamonds. The only difference is that it is created by state-of-the-art technology to replicate the diamond growing process. These diamonds variate in colour and clarity, and are graded on the exact same criteria as natural diamonds. Cut to perfection, less expensive than natural diamonds, are more environmentally-friendly, these labs grown diamonds are still as pure as the top 2% of the world’s mined diamonds. Offering a range of exclusive wedding band collections, - LVC Aqueen, LVC Classique, LVC Desirio, LVC Eterno, LVC Noeud, LVC Poesie, LVC Promise, LVC Purete and LVC Soleiil – Love & Co. is always here to help you and your loved one make a romantic declaration of your love through a style that best fits you. They also offer an alluring treasury of jewellery that can be gifted for special occasions in their LVC Charmes collection: Love Story locket pendants, Petit Bear pendants, Love Note pendants, Mini Ring pendants, and Ribbon pendants.

name: Lovely Lil Things
description: Retailing of fashion accessories.

name: Lovisa
description: Taking the fashion accessories world by storm since 2010, Lovisa is a brand that has grown to be synonymous with the latest trending jewellery that’s uber stylish yet affordable. Lovisa in Sunway Pyramid prides itself in being a fashion-forward company that satisfies every woman’s style needs. Originating from Singapore, the brand was created due to the need for trendy fashion jewellery at ready-to-wear prices. Drawing inspiration from couture runways to street style, the brand has expanded to having stores in over 15 countries, and delivers around 150 new styles to their stores on a weekly basis. With so many new styles brought in constantly, there’ll always be something you want to buy once you step into their store! Shop through their range of earrings, wrist-wear, rings, necklaces, hair accessories, body jewellery, and even kids’ accessories! For earrings, try on different styles such as hoops, studs, drop earrings, clip ons, ear cuffs, statement earrings, flatbacks and barbells. Opt for various colours such as gold, silver, rose gold, black, red, or multi-coloured, and choose from different types of plating too (sterling silver, gold, rose gold, surgical steel). If you don’t have your ears pierced yet, not to worry, you can even get your ear piercings done right at their store! A selection of necklaces is available in the form of long necklaces, layered necklaces, and chokers. Match this with one of their stylish bracelets, bangles, watches and cuffs. How else can you beautify your delicate fingers besides a perfect manicure? With gorgeous rings! They have sterling silver rings, engagement rings, and band rings for you to choose from. Draw attention to your luscious locks with their hair accessory range, comprising of hair clips, scrunchies, headbands, hair scarves, flower crowns, hair vines and bridal hair accessories. For slightly less conventional yet amazingly stylish, try their range of body jewellery, such as anklets, nose rings, belly piercings, faux piercings or cartilage piercings. Mommies, bring your little princess here and have a fun time together choosing pretty jewellery and adorable hair accessories designed just for them!

name: Lulu Money
description: Western Union the fast and safe way to send and receive money worldwide

name: Luna Jewellery
description:
"Hey Girlfriend! Like you, we love accessorizing and offer a wide range of fashionable and trending jewelleries from bold statement pieces to delicate minimalist pieces.
At Luna, our jewellery pieces allow you to express yourself in every way possible. Personalisable and easy to mix and match, you can create and switch your looks in an instant.
Here, it’s YOLO and You-Do-You, we don’t judge. We believe in promoting body positivity, inclusivity, and diversity by empowering women to express themselves in their own style, without breaking the bank.
"

name: Lung Ngen Claypot Coffee
description: Lung Ngen Coffee, a journey through exotic aroma & ingredients. Let's unlock the intricate flavors for a truly immersive tasting experience!

name: Lush Fresh Handmade Cosmetics
description: Lush Fresh Handmade Cosmetics is the inventor of the bath bomb and the home of bath art. We're here to create a cosmetics revolution and leave the world lusher than we found it. We make our products fresh by hand using little or no preservative or packaging, using only vegetarian ingredients, and tell you when they were made. We believe in buying ingredients only from companies that do not commission tests on animals.

name: L’OCCITANE en Provence
description:
Loved for its high quality natural products, L’OCCITANE en Provence offers an extensive range of head-to-toe beauty care that awakens the senses. Inspired by nature’s beauty, all ingredients are sourced sustainably to bring the best of nature to many homes all across the world, while respecting biodiversity. From the classic Shea Butter hand care to the iconic Immortelle skincare collections, L’OCCITANE has the perfect gifts of nature for everyone’s beauty needs.

name: Medifeet
description:
We take care your feet from inside out!
Medifeet creates super-cushioning, conforming, and comfortable shoes with varying medical, therapeutic, corrective, protective, user-friendly, and supportive features built-in or inserted-in to fix all foot problems. Medifeet started-out humbly with only dealers and no retail shops but in just over 5 years they have grown to 34 branches throughout Malaysia, including in Sunway Pyramid.

It’s what’s on the inside that counts MEDIFEET as a high technology designed to feel like clouds—soft, ultralite, swaddling your feet like baby and it all begins right beneath your feet.
Our footbeds and shoe designs are carefully engineered using the finest materials like high-grade memory padding, contoured orthotic systems to create a cushion that molds to your feet and absorbs the shock of all those steps you’re taking. They’re anatomically shaped to help spread weight evenly for a comfortable stride, and in many cases, our footbeds are even removable specially made for diabetics. Just replace with a new one or a custom orthotic to kick up the walkability of your MEDIFEET in seconds.
Taking care of your feet is our priority, as we know FEET IS OUR SECOND HEART!
Medifeet emphasizes on building-in health and comfort components into health shoes while maintaining the beauty aspect. Upon working closely with their podiatrist, Medifeet has their very own creation, the innovative Orthotic System, which when used with our readymade range helps make the semi-custom-made range possible.
The Orthotic System comprises insole support built-ins according to individual needs such as their built-in with arch support for solving flat feet problems. Their Spine Guard using Japanese technology and 3-point support built-in inside shoes are examples of their other 6-7 technologies.
Competitors claim their products are similar to Medifeet but really can’t match its technological innovation, creativity, and quality.

name: Meiko
description:
MEIKO is a leading brand name by Goldlife Marketing Sdn Bhd, a budding Malaysian company that specializes in healthcare products since 2007. Over the years, MEIKO had received numerous prestigious awards and recognition such as the 2018 Malaysia Health & Wellness Brand Awards, the 2014 International Corporate Award International Brand, the 2015 SME 100 Awards - Fast Moving Companies, and others for their continuous effort and innovation to ensure Meiko consistently deliver the best quality product and service to their consumers.
Our golden years can be more than just survival where we deserve to live our life confidently and flexibly. The tagline “Moving life” portrays that Meiko helps people to continue moving actively to anywhere and do anything at any time they wish, enabling them to create new memories and enjoy meaningful lives even in their old age, rather than fear of disability during old age.
As a Joint Care specialist brand in the healthcare industry, Meiko launched the 4 Treasures of Joints product series ambassador by Malaysian DJ, Chan Fong, to help the community prevent and release joint pain issues. Besides, Meiko also has Detoxing, Rejuvenation, and Restoration supplements that complement the community’s needs to maintain their general health. Meiko’s product is carefully created with Japanese technology and expertise to strengthen people’s bodies and sharpen their minds so they can spend the rest of their years with flexibility, energy, and joy.
Meiko emphasizes “Trial Before Purchase with Expert Consultation” in its customer purchase experience. Thus, nutritionists will only recommend suitable products based on the health report.
Your Health, Family Wealth. Thus, book your health check appointment with Meiko’s healthcare specialist now @ LG 2-130

name: Michael Kors
description: Michael Kors is a world-renowned, award-winning designer of luxury accessories and ready-to-wear. His namesake company, established in 1981, currently produces a range of products under Michael Kors Collection, MICHAEL Michael Kors and Michael Kors Mens, including accessories, ready-to-wear, footwear, wearable technology, watches and a full line of fragrance products. Michael Kors stores are operated in the most prestigious cities in the world. In addition, Michael Kors operates digital flagships across North America, Europe and Asia, offering customers a seamless omni-channel experience. Michael Kors Holdings Limited is publicly listed on the New York Stock Exchange with the ticker KORS.

name: Mission-Q
description:
Mission-Q (Real Escape Game Room in Malaysia) brings you 5 unique adventurous escape rooms, each with its own theme. The objective is to physically escape from the room within an hour by collecting items, identifying clues, and solving puzzles and riddles. This game requires observation, teamwork, creativity, communication, and courage.
Mission Q provides entertainment with difficulty levels ranging from 3 to 5 stars, players can choose to enjoy the expedition while overcoming moderately set challenges or put their wits to the test. Nevertheless, the kid-friendly and safe environment promises a family-oriented experience traversing a multitude of scenarios.
Worried about getting stuck? Fret not for a "help" bell can be easily located in each room to contact the Game Master for assistance whereby hints will be given to aid the player.

name: Mixue
description: Mixue is a tea-based beverage and ice cream brand that has over 26,000 outlets worldwide. The products are made of high-quality raw materials around the world and selling at a affordable price.

name: Monki
description:
Monki is a storytelling brand that offers great fashion at competitive prices, aiming to be kind to the world and the people in it. stand up for themselves — and others.
Bringing its unique blend of Scandi-cool and Asian street style, Monki’s design team has stayed on the pulse of interesting trends and personal inspiration since 2006. At the core stands the Swedish fashion brand’s aim to empower young women everywhere to express and feel great about themselves. The brand mixes Scandinavian cool with creative street style and is all about being brave, friendly and fun while empowering young women to stand up for themselves — and others.
Monki has always been inspired by its creative community of fans who show their personal style, using the global hashtag #monkistyle. The brand is now available in Sunway Pyramid!
With 115 stores in thirteen markets across Europe and Asia and an online store that delivers to 19 European countries, Monki has grown consistently since it was founded in 2006.

name: Monobo
description:
If you’re a fan of jelly shoes, here’s a brand to check out! Monobo, with its foamy PVC-EVA heel and girly, glittery designs, is another alternative to other brands of jelly shoes in the market.
Jelly shoes are shoes made of PVC plastic. Its name refers to the semi-transparent materials with a jelly-like sheen. The shoes became a fad in the mid-1980s. Like many other fashion trends from the 1980s, jelly shoes have been revived a number of times since the late 1990s, because they are so wearable and stylish. In fact, jelly shoes are so comfortable and versatile that celebrities with vastly different styles like Katy Perry, Anne Hathaway, Rihanna and even the First Lady Michelle Obama have been seen sporting them in their downtime!
Whether you’re into flats, wedge heels, or even loafers, Monobo offers comfy options that can be easily paired with a flare dress or capri pants for a weekend jaunt into town, or a blouse and pencil skirt combo for a dressier, pulled together look. The shoes come in a rainbow of on-trend colours such as sweet lilac, hipster mustard-yellow, electric blue and show-stopping red, so you’ll always have a pair to suit your mood!

name: Murad Skin Care
description:
Murad Skin Care in Sunway Pyramid believes that your skin deserves a one-of-a-kind facial. Howard Murad, M.D., FAAD, is recognized around the world as a leading visionary for his unmatched scientific innovations. A board-certified dermatologist, trained pharmacist and Associate Clinical Professor of Medicine at the Geffen School of Medicine, UCLA, Dr. Murad has personally treated over 50,000 patients.
For more than 30 years, Murad has been committed to developing clinically proven, cruelty-free products that meet the meticulous standards for safety, efficacy and care you’d expect from a doctor. Plus, they’re supported by Dr. Murad’s industry-first research for the most advanced formulas that don’t just consider a symptom or concern, but rather address total skin health.
Now available in Sunway Pyramid, Murad offers clinically proven Professional Facial Treatments and skincare product range to addresses skin concerns such as blemish/acne breakouts, dull and tires skin, dark spots & pigmentation and fine lines & wrinkles.
Murad Method Facial System is a uniquely designed personalised facial that will engage and create a personal bond between the therapist and client for a truly personalised facial journey. Not all skin types are similar, the personalisation allows our therapist to identify client’s specific skin health needs and adapts flexible protocols to treat 2 skin concerns at once for a complete skincare treatment that leads to outstanding results for a healthier looking skin.
“Skincare is not superficial because it is healthcare. When you have beautiful skin it is a sign that you have a healthy body and mind.” Dr Howard Murad M.D

name: Myfeet
description:
In 2006, Mr. Wong discovered trend and rising demand of comfortable insoles in Hong Kong. Curious about why would anyone purchase insoles, he began to journey to understand more on shoes and leg pain problems. During abroad, he obtained the principle of bio-dynamics, helping him to further understand insoles and their purpose. He began trying different insoles on himself.
After 6 months, he realized that his own knee problems have improved. Since then, he decided to venture into the making of insole business – MyFeet. He imported digital scanning machines from Korea to analyse customers feet problems and custom made insoles that solve their feet problems. After many years of analysing, feet problems can be categorized into a flat arch, high arch, bowleg, knock knee, overpronation, and supination. These problems will lead to an imbalance of body biodynamics, causing stress on the rest of the body such as foot pain, knee pain, and back pain.
Mr. Wong created MyFeet to help more people to solve pains caused by the feet. The sandals in MyFeet Sunway Pyramid are carefully engineered using the finest materials like high-grade memory foam, shaped and moulded to fit each wearer feet condition. All our sandals are shaped to help spread weight evenly for a comfortable walk and bring back balance to the body biodynamics.

name: NANYANG CAFE
description:
NANYANG CAFE is a Malaysia-based fusion gastronomic culinary brand which bases its culinary essence on the exquisite amalgamation of the unique palate of Nanyang cuisine and the rich-in-heritage Malaysian Chinese cuisine and it is NOW available in Sunway Pyramid!
Gourmet noodles and freshly baked bakeries are the 2 core differentiating products of NANYANG CAFE. A tasty serving of noodles requires the collective elements of a well-qualified chef coupled with the freshest and highest quality of ingredients. NANYANG CAFE also offers Hong Kong-originated gourmet tempting bakery & pastries product as a perfect choice for HiTea or snacks for the day.
NANYANG CAFE offers an all-day dining experience in casual and relax ambience with a touch of natural sunlight to delight your day! Signature favourites include Hong Kong Style Wanton Noodles, Freshly Baked Polo Bun, NANYANG Coffee & Milk Tea and Pork Chop with Curry Rice.

At Naelofar, we create beautiful headscarves that you choose and love to wear. Our brand promise is the essence of Naelofar. description:
南香六十五年，乘持烹任至精、服务至诚、品味至尚的理念，一路创新发展，赢得了海内外顾容的青睐、成为了怡保老字号，大马知名特色餐饮企业
With 60 years of remarkable history, Nam Heong Ipoh emerged to be the top among its peers by preserving the nostalgic tastes of Ipoh's heritage dishes while delivering top notch service. name: Nars
description: Nars Cosmetics is a cosmetics and skin care company founded by make-up artist and photographer François Nars in 1994. The cosmetics line began with twelve lipsticks sold at Barneys New York. Since then, NARS has created various multi-use beauty products and now is a subsidiary of Shiseido. After the falling out in the contract with YSL, Shiseido's investment upon merging with NARS in research and development led to the wide range or products for both Females and Males. The company's aim is to create products that suit all genders without discrimination. Evident in the recent collections of palettes, the main darker shades centered around Blue, Gray etc represent the compatibility with males. After taking on YouTuber Jeffree Star's comments on unity in strength amongst all genders, NARS Cosmetics decided to expand their horizon in various designs and color schemes to accommodate all people of color, shapes and sizes who are expressing themselves through makeup. Nars is no longer a cruelty free brand. In 2017 NARS announced that, despite being against animal testing, it was a requirement for selling products in the China market. In a public statement the company said: "We have decided to make NARS available in China because we feel it is important to bring our vision of beauty and artistry to fans in the region. NARS does not test on animals or ask others to do so on our behalf, except where required by law." The statement elicited a number of critical responses, some suggesting a boycott of its products.

name: Nespresso
description:
Welcome to the world of Nespresso. Discover our promise to the finest and freshest coffee in the world that preserves the best of our world. We do this by selecting the rarest beans, crafting them with care and creativity to elevate a daily routine into a unique experience.
 
We believe that quality and sustainability are closely interlinked. We created our AAA Sustainable Quality™ Program to safeguard the supply of high-quality coffee, while protecting the environment and enhancing farmer livelihoods. We use aluminium for our capsules as it protects the quality of our coffee and it’s infinitely recyclable. We are committed to improving our recycling rates, reducing packaging and accelerating the use of recycled material.
 
At the touch of a button on Nespresso coffee machines, you get to enjoy fresh, high-quality, sustainably produced coffee, consistently cup after cup. You can easily craft a fresh cup of espresso or with fresh milk, just like a barista at home, made with high-quality beans and savour the precise roast and the generous crema as you sip your coffee.
 
There is a Nespresso coffee for every taste and occasion, from rich ristretto, bold espresso to easily recreated fresh milk recipes, Nespresso has a variety of permanent coffee, with addition of our seasonal blends and Limited Edition coffee. Come for a complementary coffee tasting in our boutique located at Level LG1.33B, Lower Ground Floor One and begin your journey with us.

name: Neubodi
description:
NEUBODI. THE LEADING BRA SPECIALIST
Neubodi is a lingerie brand that represents an effortless body transformation through providing the right fit of beauty and confidence for every modern day women. We are the authentic specialist as we make most of our products ourselves by hand, effectively mastering the capacity of combining art and science to make sensual products that shape women confidently.
NEUBODI BELIEVES EVERY WOMAN SHOULD:
Get the right fit with the right bra-fitting guide
Discover the best styles that accentuate body curves and assets
Create a lingerie wardrobe that carries a perfect wear suitable for any occasion
Dress to impress - Learn what to wear for any occasion

name: New Balance
description:
New Balance began as a Boston-based arch support company in the early 1900's, developed into a specialized shoe manufacturer in the 1970's, and has grown to become a leading global athletic products company. Today New Balance is a family of brands including New Balance, Dunham, PF Fleyers, Aravon, Warrior and Brine.
Since the days of selling arch supports to police officers and waiters, New Balance has been brand concerned with meeting the needs of the everyday athlete. Part of producing superior footwear and athletic apparel is manufacturing it to fit all widths and sizes, because a better fit produces better perfomanace.
To ensure the best fitting, best performing shoes and apparel, we focuss on improving our tehnology and production methods. A big part of that is maintaining five manufacturing facilities here in the United States where we continue to produce shoes and apparel that meet the standards we've employed for more than 100 years. We have also remained commited to a core set of values that include integrity, teamwork and total customer satisfaction.

name: New Era
description:
Since 1920, New Era has been handcrafting the finest headwear in the world. Today, with apparel and accessories lines featuring popular American sports leagues teams from the MLB, NBA and NFL, the brand is a market leader rooted in sports and an influencer of street and lifestyle culture around the globe.
With over 500 licenses in its portfolio, New Era is the brand of choice in the worlds of sport, fashion, music and entertainment.

name: Nike
description:
NIKE, named for the Greek goddess of victory, is the world's #1 shoe and apparel company. It designs, develops, and sells a variety of products to help in playing basketball and soccer (football), as well as in running, men's and women's training, and other action sports. Under its namesake brand, NIKE also markets sports-inspired products for children and various competitive and recreational activities; it also sells sportswear under the Converse and Hurley brands.
NIKE’s vision statement uses the word “remain,” which indicates that the company already considers its brand as the most authentic, connected, and distinctive in the global market for sporting goods and related products. The “authentic” component of the corporate vision statement shows that the company aims to make its products deliver high performance to consumers. On the other hand, the “connected” component is about ensuring consumers’ personal connection with the brand.

name: Nursing Scarf
description:
Nurse your baby with ease, comfort and style. Loan a nursing scarf for your convenience at any Concierge!
*T&C Apply.
• RM50 refundable deposit will be collected.
• 4 hours of usage.
• Keep space for the baby to breathe to avoid suffocating.

name: O.W.L
description:
O.W.L is an eyewear brand that designed frames to satisfy the demands of young adults and fashioners who required comfort, protection and optimum vision.
O.W.L Glasses are not only a fashion statement but a symbol of authenticity. Being one of the most sought after brands. Each individual frame from the OWL Glasses range is crated like an art piece to satisfy the need of consumers.
If O.W.L were a person, we would be the friendly neighbour, the easy-going friend - always sincere and approachable, candid and democratic

name: OBJET
description:
HOME… where memories are made and laughter is shared.
The ultimate experience is to relax in the luxuries of a home. At Objet, that becomes a reality. Objet stocks a variety of merchandise and products designed to furnish every living space of a home, from kitchen to dining room, living to bedroom and bathroom to every imaginable nook and cranny. Intricate or simple, lavish or cozy, opulent or post-modern minimalism – Objet has something that suits different moods, styles and tastes for any and every occasion with family and friends.
Objet Sunway Pyramid is our very first store. The aisles of Objet are stocked with functional items that accentuate beautiful moments, with a wide range of products that fulfill homely desires. Home-owners will be spoilt for choice with an array of competitively-priced products that range from classic to stylish and from decorative to functional. There is something for every home at Objet.

name: Obermain
description:
An icon of comfortable dress shoes, Obermain which has made its mark among competitor brands, is now back in Sunway Pyramid!
1888 was the year Obermain began creating quality shoes and boots in Burgkunstadt, a town on the Upper Main River whose leather goods were sought by elite professionals in turn of the century Germany. Burgkunstadt’s legacy of craftsmanship and material excellence lives on today – in shoes, bags, and accessories designed by Obermain to continue our proud tradition.
Obermain invites men and women to step into a new kind of comfort, the kind that overcomes outdated compromises that pit form versus function, wearability versus appeal, and tradition versus modernity. Where quality workmanship and materials assure durability. Where special comfort features make every step – leisurely on brisk, on carpet or concrete – lighter, softer, more flexible, and more secure. Where style means a contemporary touch and updated details that set you at ease weekdays and weekends. The perfect union of quality, comfort, and style. Obermain is made for striding with confidence through every walk of life.
We design our products to be loved and used for a long time. We may apply classic silhouettes or re-interpret them with a twist. If we do this, we must keep the shoe silhouette recognizable. We are not slaves to fashion, yet we may adapt trends as touches of modernity—subtly and tastefully.
“OBERMAIN = PROFESSIONALS”………..…..Who value quality, expecting total comfort from their daily attire. They are the reason and the inspiration for everything Obermain stands for Elegant | Refined | Confident | Smart | Urban I Sophisticated | Intelligent | Charming

name: Oga Tea & Dining
description: OGA, a Japanese Premium Tea-Centric Brand. We invites you to a world where contemporary living and authentic Japanese tea culture harmonize.

name: Ogawa
description: World-class massage chairs and wellness technologies.

name: Ogival
description:
Ogival has been outfitting pool-lovers and beach-goers for the last 20 years. The swim collection includes bikinis, tankinis, one-pieces, briefs, trunks, burqinis and wetsuits. The collection also features a stylish range of cover-ups, beach dresses, and swim accessories like goggles, swimming caps, swim boards and floats.
The brand has been the active-wear range that caters to gym-goers, yoga enthusiasts and cycling fans. Featuring trendy designs that appeal to those who require comfort while indulging in sports, this collection incorporates yoga-wear, gym-wear and cycling and exercise shorts.

name: Ohneul Studio
description: First Korean style self-photo studio where you can take awesome pictures with provided props such as adorable headbands and ribbons!

name: Old Nanyang Coffee
description: Nanyang is the old name for Southeast Asia. Since the end of the Ming Dynasty, due to the war and poverty, Fujian and Guangdong, mainly people, have drifted across the sea to the south for their livelihood. Malaysia is one of the important destinations for Chinese migration. Its cuisine is generally seasoned with curry, SAMBAL, ASAM and winter spices, with sour and spicy flavours and bright and rich colours. Most of the ingredients are cattle, sheep, chickens, ducks, fish and shrimps. The arrival of the Chinese had added a new demeanour to Malay cuisine, Cantonese morning tea, Cantonese pastries, Wenchang Hainan Chicken Rice… With food as the coordinates, it has witnessed the change of history and culture, creating a special memory of the times. We want to add innovative flavours to the traditional food and Malaysian-friendly styles in the old Nanyang Ocean, which will bring the public a brand-new visual and taste buff food experience and satisfaction. Old Nanyang Coffee is now available in Asian Avenue, Sunway Pyramid.

name: Ole-Ole Bali
description:

Being the dealer in a variety of international brands, Optical 88 offers a broad and diverse choice of product types and styles. Thanks to their modern and chic design, as well as reliable quality, our products have proved to be extremely popular in all the markets we operate in.

Oriental Sun brings you the best of modern Cantonese cuisine. Aspire to excel in dim sum and a great selection of the group's signature dishes and house specialties by combining the freshest ingredients with the precision and skill of our experienced chefs.
Four private dining rooms are available for corporate gatherings and family celebrations accommodating intimate groups of 10 or up to 24 pax.

name: PRISM+
description:
Singapore-based consumer electronics company, PRISM+, is now available at Sunway Pyramid! Having launched its ecommerce business in Singapore in 2017, the brand was known for its premium value gaming monitors that offered the best performance at wallet-friendly prices. Following its success in the gaming space, the brand then launched its own brand of Android TVs, which it is best known for today.

In 2021, PRISM+ brought its brand of direct-to-consumer ecommerce business model to Malaysia to great reception. The brand’s introduction of its 86” Android TV, the Q86 PRO-QE, shook the market for large screen TVs at never-before-seen prices. – and quickly became the top-selling Android TV and Monitor brands in e-commerce. Since then, the brand has moved from strength-to-strength and is now looking to venture beyond its ecommerce origins with its very first experiential store at Sunway Pyramid. Its store in Sunway Pyramid is the first of its kind outside of Singapore, which launched its first physical stores in August 2022, and sees the brand name Malaysia as a key market for its growth. Not forgetting its gaming roots, PRISM+ has also partnered with Logitech to offer gaming peripherals at its offline store, as part of its commitment in offering customers a holistic experience. The brand will continue to expand its offerings in Malaysia, with the Sunway Pyramid store serving as a physical touchpoint for its fans to experience its latest product launches. As the first physical store in Malaysia, PRISM+ at Sunway Pyramid is a signal of ambition from the fast-growing consumer electronics brand as it gears towards its next big move. In Singapore, the brand recently announced its first smart home appliance, the PRISM+ Zero, and has teased that it will move in the same direction in Malaysia – while continuing to offer the best deals for Android TVs, productivity, and gaming monitors and more. Don’t believe us? Come and check it out for yourselves!

name: PRO MEDIC
description:
Operating Hour:
Weekdays : 8.00am - 9.00pm
Saturday/Sunday/ Public Holiday : 8:00am - 5:00pm
Healthcare, the most important aspect of our life and is also often the most neglected. Our dedicated team of professionals from Pro Medic would like to remind you to take care of your health with our innovative and modern health solutions. By having a clear insight and awareness on health, we provide conventional and alternative solutions for communities to stay fit & healthy.
Here in Sunway Pyramid Mall, we would like to provide a convenient access to healthcare and keep you safe while you enjoy a Unique Lifestyle Adventure!
Our Doctors:
1. Dr Tang Meau Cheng
Dr Tang is a Family Physician in Pro Medic Clinic. She graduated from University Malaysia Sarawak (UNIMAS) in 2012. She did postgraduate studies and obtained Graduate Certificate in Family Medicine Programme in Year 2021. She has more than 10 years experiences in treating acute and chronic illnesses, mental health, preventive care, child health, women and maternal health services. She is a very understanding and trusted doctor who provides personalized care to her patients.

2. Dr Cheong Wi-Liam
Dr Cheong is a Physician and Co-founder of Pro Medic. He graduated from Melaka-Manipal Medical College(MBBS) in 2010. Having experiences serving as an assistant to Orthopaedic Surgeon and Cardiothoracic Surgeon, he developed a passion and a strong sense of devotion to preventive medicine. He believes that the best way to provide medical care is by educating, promoting and creating health awareness to communities to maintain health and well-being, which enable effective prevention of disease, disability and death.
Medical Service Available:
1. Medical Examination
2. Laboratory Test
3. Resting E.C.G.
4. Ultrasonography(Abdomen & Pelvis, Gynaecology Ultrasound)
5. First Aid & Emergency Care
6. Immunizations/Vaccination
7. Minor Surgeries
8. Wound care
9. Physiotherapy
10. Influenza, Dengue, COVID-19 Diagnostic and Rapid Screening tests
11. Chest & Soft Tissue X-rays
12. Pap Smear
13. Health & Nutrition Advice
14. Medicine and Supplements
15. Family Planning & Contraception (Hormonal, Implanon, IUCD, etc.)
Health Screening Programs
1. Wellness and Health Screening Programs
2. Insurance & Medical Examination
3. Panel Clinic
4. Pre-employment Health Screening
5. Student Health Screening
6. Travel Health
7. Foreigners / Malaysia My 2nd Home
8. Mobile Health Screening
9. Genetic Screening

name: Padini Concept Store
description:
Over the years, PADINI Sunway Pyramid has solidified a reputation as a retail provider with durable and trustworthy products that are fashionable and current. In line with our vision 'to be the best fashion company ever', we work to bring you up to the minute fashion items to suit your changing lifestyle and taste.
While fast and efficient service is the base of what we do, we also believe that it is possible to look stylish without breaking the bank.
As you explore our store, you will find attractive collection of apparels, footwear, bags and accessories for consumers of both genders and all ages through our widely popular brands from Padini Concept Store: Padini, Seed, Padini Authentics, PDI, P&Co, Miki, Vincci and Vincci Accessories.

description: Enjoy a unique taste of Korea at Palsaik Korean BBQ, home to the renowned Palsaik (Eight Colours) Samgyupsal pork belly. The rainbow of colours come from flavourful marinades such as Ginseng, Wine, Pine Needles, Garlic, Herbs, Deonjang, Curry and Gochujang. Each all-natural marinade entices your tastebuds and enhances the flavour of the barbecued pork. Once you taste the juicy, tender meat, you will want to enjoy this experience over and over again!

name: Paris Baguette

Born from the love of bread and passion for quality, Paris Baguette embraces the spirit of 'Sangmidang', which is to not leave a single piece of bread unchecked – signifying utmost quality in its products and services.

PAZZION produces quintessential quality available at retail, weaving modern and trendy designs, using only premium material for all products. name: Pet Lovers Centre
description:
Require necessities from a trusted pet store for your beloved pet? Sunway Pyramid has just the right outlet with all that you need including shampoos, pet food, accessories, cat litter, hamster beddings, treats and toys to ensure your pet receives the care and love they deserve from their owner. The store also has cute dog clothes with a select few custom-taylored for festive events. Pet Lovers Centre at Sunway Pyramid also has a few small live animals for sale such as bunnies and hamsters.
Being a multiple award winning pet retail and service chain, The firm launched its own brand of pet accessories called Trustie in 1980, and in 1996, launched its food brand called Burp! PLC became a franchise-able brand in 2008. The chain boasts a state of-the-art management system and endears its customers with the widest and freshest range of products and prompt and warm service. PLC has received numerous awards over the years in recognition of its achievements. PLC is known for its ability to offer the widest and freshest range for pets, coupled with vet-trained pet care consultants stationed in their stores to provide professional advice on pet care.
Pet Lovers Centre also values its customers with membership privileges such as exclusive member pricing for regular priced items and services with minimum spend of RM20 in a single receipt or Special Birthday Offer. Members can collect loyalty points and redeem cash vouchers

name: Playmade
description: PlayMade is a bubble tea brand known for its handcrafted drinks and freshly made pearls, which are handmade daily. As the first in Asia to offer flavoured boba, PlayMade features unique options like pink cactus, black sesame, and burnt caramel. With high-quality ingredients and vibrant, playful drinks, PlayMade is a popular choice for bubble tea enthusiasts.

name: Poh Kong
description:
Recognized as Malaysia's largest jewellery retail chain, Poh Kong is renowned for its impeccable craftsmanship in curating stunning pieces from gold, diamonds, jade, and colored gems. Catering to various preferences and budgets, the collection offers something for everyone with its personalized creations and wide appeal.
Among the brand lineup, Tranz stands for self-expression and modern style, while Happy Love features oriental gold jewellery symbolizing destined love's journey, the Auspicious incorporates 'Fengshui' elements, and Anggun showcases cultural beauty. Disney and Ms. Petite collections cater to the young.
Turning to diamonds, Hemera boasts the most brilliant diamonds with 101 facets, and D'first offers affordable luxury and the joy of a first diamond.

name: Polo Haus
description:
Indulge in a great shopping experience at Polo Haus's new store which is located at Sunway Pyramid now! Polo Haus started out as a small fashion retail store that sold footwear exclusively for men in the 1980s. A gradual transformation took place in the 1990s where the brand introduced casual men ready to wear attire. After mastering the art of dressing men, Polo Haus extended and embraced the creation of its Polo Haus Women and Kids line in the late 2000s. At present, the entire family can be dressed by the well-loved brand of Polo Haus.
Throughout the years, Polo Haus had and shall continue to strive for excellence in the quality of our products in particular, the materials that we use as well as keeping up to date of the latest fashion trend. We take upmost pride in dressing our customers for all occasions, be it a casual outing or daily business and office attire.
Our extensive range of clothing is conveniently available at our boutique stores as well as outlets located within major departmental stores throughout the country. To keep abreast with the ever changing market and to ensure continued easy accessibility to our customers, Polo Haus is also readily available through our website and various on-line shopping applications.
Here at Polo Haus, we strive to exceed our customer’s expectation everyday to ensure that every visit would be pleasantly unforgettable. For this purpose, our well trained retail assistants are ready and happy to ensure that our customer’s every attire need is met with the highest level of customer satisfaction so that they would continue to look great in a Polo Haus. As a token of appreciation, we had also initiated a customer loyalty program that offers better deals for our regular customers. Till date, we have 17 outlets & 70 consignment counters in Malaysia, and we continue to expand our service.

name: Polo Ralph Lauren
description:
In 1967, Ralph Lauren launched the Polo Ralph Lauren brand, which quickly became a symbol of American luxury and sophistication. From its humble beginnings, Polo Ralph Lauren expanded into a well-known lifestyle brand, offering a diverse range of products that encompass fashion, coffee, home furnishings, and more.
Ralph Lauren’s distinctive brand image has been consistently developed across an expanding number of products, price tiers, and markets.
Ralph Lauren aims to create the highest quality products with minimal harm to the environment. At the heart of the brand’s offerings are its exquisite men’s fashion items. The iconic Polo Shirts, available in a wide range of colours, are a true wardrobe staple. The brand’s menswear line extends beyond their Polo Shirts. The store offers suits, knitwear and stylish outerwear that exude prestige and unmatched quality.
Moreover, Polo Ralph Lauren’s range of exquisite accessories complements any ensemble. Renowned for its exceptional craftsmanship, the brand offers products from leather belts and handcrafted leather shoes, these accessories add perfectly to a man’s outfit.
The new store opening of Polo Ralph Lauren Men at Sunway Pyramid Mall aligns seamlessly with the brand’s vision. Situated in the vibrant city of Kuala Lumpur, Subang Jaya Selangor, Sunway Pyramid Mall boasts a perfect blend of tradition and modernity – much like Polo Ralph Lauren’s approach of timeless elegance.
Malysia’s diverse and fashion forward trends has accelerated the opening of multiple Polo Ralph Lauren and Ralph Lauren stores all around the country. Its rich culture offers the brand a platform to showcase its appeal of high-quality products. Ralph Lauren has created a name for itself through its expansion within Southeast Asia.
Visit us to enjoy the allure of Men Polo Ralph Lauren store at Unit G1.08, Ground Floor, Sunway Pyramid Mall, No. 3, Jalan PJS 11/15, Sunway City, 47500 Selangor, Malaysia.

name: Pull & Bear
description:
Pull&Bear started up in 1991 with a clear international mission and with the intention of dressing young people who are engaged with their environment, who live in the community and relate to each other. Young people who have a casual dress sense, who shun stereotypes and who want to feel good in whatever they are wearing. To meet their needs, Pull&Bear takes the latest international trends, mixing them with the influences that are seen on the street and in the most fashionable clubs, and reworks them according to their style thus turning them into comfortable and easy to wear garments.
Pull&Bear Sunway Pyramid evolves at the same pace as its customer, always watching out for new technologies, social movements and the latest artistic or musical trends. All of this can be seen reflected not only in its designs but also in stores. Inspired by the legendary Californian city of Palm Springs, the product lines are constantly being updated. All stores worldwide receive new merchandise twice a week

name: REEF & HYDRO FLASK
description:
Whatever adventure you’re planning, we’re in. From cross-country skiing to stories by the campfire. From morning meetings to sunsets in the park.
We’ll bring fuel worthy of the moment: wickedly hot coffee, just-out-of-the-cooler cold beverages or water that stays icy cold for hours.
Every hour of engineering that goes into each Hydro Flask product we make— it’s all for one thing: to be part of the moments that make life more fulfilling.
That’s how we design each product in our line today—always premium, always better than anything else we’ve ever used, and never lukewarm. From our original 18 ounce bottles to our award-winning soft coolers, we want you to love every Hydro Flask product you ever own just as much as we loved perfecting it. Because for us it has never been just about making something, it has always been about making something awesome.
Today is wide open. And we’re up for anything.Founded in 2009 in Bend, Oregon, Hydro Flask is the award-winning leader in high-performance insulated drinkware products. Inspiring an active and joyful life on the go, Hydro Flask innovations showcase TempShield double-wall vacuum insulation to lock in temperature, 18/8 stainless steel ensuring pure taste and durable, ergonomic design for the ultimate trusted sidekick.
While the brand is best known for its stainless-steel water bottles, Hydro Flask has evolved over the years and now produces an extensive line of items, such as wine tumblers, food jars, tote bags, and cooler bags.
‘Reef since 1984’ is more than just a date on a timeline.
It’s a symbol of our passion that compels us to bring people the absolute best footwear products in the world. What drives us to reimagine, redefine and redesign everything we know about sandals, and do that again, and again, and again.
It’s the pride we have in ourselves and what we’ve stood for since day 1 – delivering the freedom of surf life through expertly crafted experiences.
It’s having long lasting trust in our partners to bring our brand to life in the most authentic way possible and working together through whatever the world throws our way.
‘Reef since 1984’ is more than just a number. It’s who we are.
In 1984, two entrepreneurial brothers from South America named Fernando and Santiago Aguerre founded REEF out of a love for the beach and surfing.Their idea was to create high-quality, super comfortable products that fit the lifestyle they loved.
Fernando and Santi walked everywhere, so they created sandals that could take them to the beach, into town and wherever they wanted to go – in comfort.
The brothers redefined, redesigned and reengineered every component of the sandal. That attention to detail and an uncompromising standard of quality made Reef the most comfortable sandals anybody had ever worn.
The innovations that started in 1984 have evolved into the Reef sandals we love today, becoming a symbol of a free, comfortable and happy lifestyle.

name: ROOKIE
description: Rookie is a kids-only, multi-branded premium online retail destination. Focused on kids 0-16 years old ranging from apparel to accessories and footwear. The iconic brands Converse, Nike, Jordan, Hurley and Levi's providing a complete head-to-toe kid's experience.

name: ROYCE'
description: ROYCE’ is a Japanese chocolate maker and confectioner based in Hokkaido, a utopia of mountains, sparkling water, fresh air - undoubtedly, home to only the finest of ingredients. ROYCE’ crafts confectioneries brimming with flavour and bursting with originality, using keenly selected ingredients from Japan and all around the world.

name: Rakuzen
description: Rakuzen is committed to providing genuine Japanese food at affordable prices, in cosy ambience, such that patrons of all levels and ages can enjoy dining with us in a warm, friendly, welcoming & homely environment. Our menu provides a wide selection of sushi, sashimi and range from seasonal dishes to exclusive personalized omakase sets, to give our patrons a very unique Rakuzen dining experience.

name: Ramen Bankara
description:
The word “Bankara” is a colloquial term that was once used in Japan to best describe an individual’s outstanding and unique style amidst the swarm of conformist society. Bankara’s brand values and product offerings are unmistakably Japanese, yet differentiated from the market competitors in tantalizing the customers dining experience, namely the palette and sensory immersion.
Embracing the philosophy “Cooking by Heart”’ the Bankara brand is the result of Mr. Kusano’s desire to constantly innovate and improve the taste of Japanese ramen. Drawing upon his family’s expertise handed down through the generations, Mr. Kusano embarked on a request in selecting the finest of ingredients and cooking techniques, to develop a new ramen soup recipe.
In 1998, the “Impact” taste so broadly associated with the brand, heralded the arrival of the Bankara Signature Ramen. The journey to tantalise our customer’s five senses; taste, smell, sight, sound and touch, begin here.
(Taste & Smell) “Cooking by Heart”, Bankara Ramen Malaysia serves four authentic Japanese ramen styles namely Bankara Signature, Tonkotsu ramen, Miso ramen and Tsukemen. Each ramen style is clearly defined by the soup and accompanying noodles of varying thickness and texture. We are proud to serve the same quality and flavour in every bowl of ramen, as one would come to expect if one was dining in Japan. Selected ingredients imported from Japan, attention to details and preparation ensures we serve the most authentic “Impact” taste ramen that you will truly savour and crave for.
(Sight, Sound & Touch) True to the brand values, Bankara Malaysia’s stores draws its design inspiration from various traditional Japanese architectures, art and design elements.

name: Red's Revenge
description:
Red’s Revenge is a women's accessories boutique that references the fable of Red Riding Hood with a twist where she avenges her grandmother’s death, defines the boutique and its essence of being different with an attitude.
Our selections and exclusive personal buyers ensure that our customers have access to the most stylish and unique fashion accessories.
We sell hand-picked and hand-made jewelry and other accessories including necklaces, bracelets, earrings, rings, brooches, totes, dinner bags, sunglasses and dresses, all to provide a customer with original looks and to ascertain one's personality and character.
Red’s Revenge carries prêt-à-porter classic, casual and contemporary accessories for women.
Red’s Revenge is more than a fashion jewellery retailer, it is a brand that will take the leading edge in fashion and style, at an affordable price.

name: Rocku Yakiniku
description:
ROCKU Yakiniku is a casual, upbeat and edgy Yakiniku restaurant serves Japanese cuisine with various live performances.
ROCKU Yakiniku, a casual, upbeat and edgy Yakiniku restaurant. Delivering a fresh concept to traditional Yakiniku joints, ROCKU Yakiniku defies convention by melding a traditional style of Japanese dining with modern entertainment, perfectly characterizing Japanese pop culture.
Guest can savor their food hot throughout the entire meal, and there’s no better way to enjoy the tantalizing cuts of meat, ranging from beef to pork and chicken. ROCKU also entertains and enthralls its guests with modern music of Korean, Japanese and Mandarin Pop-Rock variety.

name: Rollti
description: Rollti® is a modern quick-service restaurant that reinvents Malaysia’s classic, Roti Canai, with a creative and contemporary twist. Designed with Malaysians in mind, our menu is a celebration of authentic local flavors, offering a diverse range of options — from savory meats and seafood to delightful vegetarian selections. For those with a sweet tooth, Rollti® also provides a variety of irresistible sweet treats, ensuring there's something for everyone to enjoy.

name: Room 8008
description:
ROOM8008 was established since 2008, and the name of room was given by the owner as a memory of her college study group.
ROOM8008 has rapidly grown to become one of the largest brands in Malaysia, well-known for self-manufactured items for girls with various styles and sizes! Discover dreamy, princess-y dresses, colourful flared skirts and whimsical tops, all available at ROOM8008's outlet in Sunway Pyramid!

name: Royal County of Berkshire Polo Club
description:
THe ROYAL COUNTY OF BERKSHIRE POLO CLUB(RCBPC) is the most exclusive Polo Club in England. It started in Royal County of Berkshire and brings together not only the lovers of this aristocratic sport but also the most prestigious strata of english society.
In 1985, the legendary Bryan Morrison wanted to create a club that combined talent and natural British sportsmanship with elegant surroundings and ambience. With the same vision with which he produced music for Pink Floyd, Wham! or the Bee Gees, Morrison set up an Icon of Englishness which he devoted himself to immediately.
So resonant was the success of the Berkshireas it is affectionately knowri.The Prince of Wales soon became an honoured lifetime member. Always a lover of prestige and distinction and a professional designer in his youth, the club that Morrison envisioned was also to be leading light in fashion.
Again his vision returned to set a trend.
Since then, RCBPC has become a premier international brand, chosen by those who demand unmistakable class and style also wanting the best things in life.
Today, that label is finally available across the world.

name: Royal Selangor
description: Royal Selangor pewter, other giftware and collections.

name: SEGWAY-NINEBOT
description:
Segway is the worldwide leader in personal transportation. Founded in 1999, Segway has always strived to provide high-quality, safe, and reliable products for its customers. Segway-Ninebot is a global enterprise in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future. With chronic traffic congestions in Southeast Asia, particularly in Thailand, Indonesia and Malaysia where a ballooning numbers of internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicles are introduced each year, these markets were identified by Segway-Ninebot as a crucial area where its products can solve the congestions in these countries. With Sunway Pyramid being at the heart of Klang Valley, a densely populated area with an ever increasing number of vehicles crowding the roads, the introduction of Segway-Ninebot micro-mobility vehicles could solve the various issues arising from traffic congestions.
Need a last-kilometre transportation solution to your nearest public transit station? Segway-Ninebot eKickscooters can zoom you to your destination effortlessly. Worried that it’s too bulky to bring along with you into your train? Rapid KL has got you covered with Bike & Ride stations, or just bring it along with you when you ride! Foldable scooters are allowed on all Rapid KL trains. With various safety features built-in, Segway-Ninebot strives to provide you with a quality, safe ride thanks to the Battery Management System. With dual safety systems built-in into the eScooter’s charging adapter, control boards and battery systems, rest assured of its charging and operating safety. All these are backed by a standard TWO (2) years manufacturer warranty.
Extra features include:
1. Powerful Motors (Nominally powered up to 250W and 350W respectively on D18W and D38U models, or boost up to 900W Max Power on the Max G2 model)
2. Smart & Durable Battery with Battery Management System
3. Anti-skid 10 inch pneumatic tyres
4. High-Toughness Carbon Steel Structure, rated to carry up to 120kg.

Japanese Shabu-shabu, we also provide

our customers to customize their flavors according to their preferences.

name: SHISEIDO
description:
"Shiseido has defined the concept of beauty and spread its knowledge and power onto the world for 145 years.Shiseido Company, Limited is a Japanese multinational personal care company, that is a skin care, hair care, cosmetics and fragrance producer. It is one of the oldest cosmetics companies in the world. Founded in 1872, it celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012.Shiseido has always been about doing things a little differently.Shiseido continues to thoughtfully fuse Eastern and Western philosophies and innovations together to serve as a beacon of beauty inspiration especially the Japanese sense of spiritual beauty for women all over the globe.Beauty is a shared feeling; it is diverse, and it is unifying. When we feel beautiful and confident, we can’t help but feel inspired to go out into the world and make a positive difference to other people’s lives. By inspiring empathy, beauty is the ultimate force of goodness that makes us feel truly alive.
"

name: SHOPLOOOH
description:
SHOPLOOOH is now available at Sunway Pyramid!
SHOPLOOOH was founded by Garrick and Audrey from Batu Pahat, Johor in the year of 2013. The LOOOH in SHOPLOOOH comes from the Malaysian slang, loh! SHOPLOOOH means, let’s shop!
SHOPLOOOH aims to bring quality casual wear that is simple yet fashionable for every lady, expressing the classic of beauty from true soul, enjoying lifestyle with personal taste.
In addition to selling clothing, Audrey and Garrick hopes that they can bring the ‘love’ and ‘persistence’ that has supported them through these years to the public by using their story and their brand inﬂuence online as they believe in using their own power to spread love and positivity to everyone in reach. Wishing everyone can look beautiful on the outside while having a heart full of love on the inside.

name: SK Jewellery
description:
Staying true to the brand’s belief that everyone deserves to shine, each piece of jewellery is meaningfully conceptualised and beautifully crafted.
Established in 2003, SK Jewellery was created with the belief that the beauty, luxury and allure of high-quality jewellery should be attainable to all modern women. Putting great emphasis on innovation and design excellence, SK Jewellery quickly became known as the contemporary jewellery famed for its high quality and exquisitely beautiful diamond jewellery.
SK Jewellery is relentlessly dedicated to innovation and design excellence, and famed for our high quality and exquisite jewellery. Each and every product is thoughtfully created, and is set to revolutionise the way customers perceive how contemporary jewellery marries art and tradition.

name: SKIN RENEW AESTHETIC
description:
An established company since 1995, with more than 28 years of professional clinical and wellness experience in the field of beauty nationwide. With the branding of “Power of Science Revive Beauty”, we provide guaranteed satisfaction for each therapeutic session while preserving our principle.
SKIN RENEW is a unique Aesthetic & Wellness Beauty Centre in Malaysia that provides One-Stop Session, Quality, Comprehensive Beauty and Slimming Services and US Formulated Skin Care Products. Skin Renew values the importance of each and every therapeutic treatment and stresses on internal and external regulation for full elimination of skin problems faced by clients. Our patented formulas allow us to perform a perfect fusion of Science Technology and Luxury Beauty, let your skin survive at the apex of beauty.

description:
Sports Direct is the UK’s largest sporting goods retailer operates a diversified portfolio of sports, fitness, fashion and lifestyle fascia’s & brands.
Sports Direct Malaysia offers over 70 of the leading global sports brands with unmatched variety and value.
Sports Direct Flagship Superstore and New Sports Lifestyle retail facia called USC, both retail store will be opened in early 2021.

name: STUFF’D
description: Serving Mexican & Turkish cuisine, our Kebabs, Burritos, Quesadillas, Daily Bowls and Tacos are made daily from scratch, because we believe food tastes better when it’s made fresh. Through Stuff’d, we aim to define what real food should be: freshly cooked, nutrient-dense, ethically sourced, minimally processed and delicious. Let’s indulge in daily dose of goodness by building your own scrumptious meal with your choice of main protein, salad base, sauces and toppings!

description: SUB is a leading fashion brand offering the latest collection of urban styles with high-quality clothing for men and women at affordable prices.

name: SWATCH
description:
An iconic provocative timepiece that saved the Swiss watch industry, thanks to its visionary founder Nicolas Hayek. Colorful, happy, loud, shrill and forever re[1]interpreted in different ways. Swiss Made and, thanks to industrial production and only 51 parts, available at a democratic price.
In a very short space of time Swatch has become one of the most famous brands in the world – and all the while remaining true to itself. On average, a new Swatch design is created once every one-and-a-half days, keeping time as part of a monthly release or as a Special Collection.

name: Sacoor One
description:
Sacoor Brothers was founded in 1989 at number 127, Rua Pascoal de Melo, Lisbon. Sacoor began by selling articles for men and women, on its single selling point.
In 2015, Sacoor Brother launched Sacoor One, a new brand that promotes a more casual style as an alternative to the traditional style. It is created for a slightly younger target and presents a more casual, practical look while maintaining the expected quality and refinement of Sacoor Brothers.

name: Sakae Sushi
description:
Welcome to Sakae Sushi – Fresh & Innovative, that’s the Sakae way!
Step into the world of Japanese flavors as Sakae Sushi promises an exquisite dining experience that celebrates the art and essence of Japan's culinary heritage. Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of tastes, textures, and traditions that define our diverse menu.
Embark on a delightful journey through our menu that showcases an array of sushi, sashimi, tempura, bento, and much more. Each dish is meticulously prepared with the utmost care, using only the freshest ingredients to ensure a symphony of flavors on your palate.
Our skilled chefs masterfully craft sushi with finesse and creativity, delivering hand-rolled delicacies that reflect the epitome of Japanese gastronomy.
Taste the ocean's bounty in its purest form with our premium sashimi, served with an artisan's touch for an unparalleled sashimi sensation.
Savor the delightfully crisp and succulent tempura, capturing the essence of Japanese culinary craftsmanship in every bite.
Experience the harmonious blend of flavors in our thoughtfully curated bento boxes, presenting a balanced and satisfying meal that reflects Japan's cherished lunch tradition.
Elevating your dining experience, our tablet ordering system allows you to effortlessly customize your meal and conveniently manage your selections.
Relish your dining journey amidst the inviting ambiance of our newly revamped outlet, creating the perfect backdrop for intimate gatherings and joyous celebrations.
At Sakae Sushi, we take pride in upholding the essence of Japanese culinary heritage and providing our patrons with an unmatched dining experience. Join us at Sunway Pyramid and allow your taste buds to explore the timeless flavors of Japan.

name: Salomon
description: Salomon is the modern mountain sports lifestyle brand creating innovative, premium and authentic footwear, apparel and winter sports equipment in the French Alps since 1947.
