description: Founded in 1910, Samsonite is the world’s leading luggage brand with an extensive legacy in trendsetting travel solutions. Renowned for breakthrough research, development and its commitment to innovation, Samsonite has since its inception excelled in a number of industry firsts, including the exclusive use of the revolutionary Curv material in luggage arena. Samsonite offers an extensive range of travel, business, kids, casual and personal accessory products to help travellers journey further, with ever lighter and stronger products.

It has since evolved to become one of the fastest growing lifestyle cakes and café chain in the region with over 380 café outlets to date. Secret Recipe Cakes & Café’s concept can be found in prime urban locations and shopping malls in major cities in the region including Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, Brunei, Maldives and Bangladesh.
Secret Recipe Cakes & Café offers a friendly and personalised full-service dining experience for customers and incorporates a modern contemporary and vibrant interior concept with comfort ambience, and great food. It provides a great respite for customers to enjoy good food and quality time with friends, family or associates, after a long day at work.

name: Seen
description:
Seen (also known as Proeyes Studio) is a high-end optical retailer for the upscale market that offers customer not only the most exceptional and fashionable eyewear collection but also with outstanding customer service and distinctive image.
Shop for the latest eyewear looks and hop on the hottest trends with Seen's quality collections, made and handles with Seen (also known as Proeyes Studio) is a high-end optical retailer for the upscale market that offers customer not only the most exceptional and fashionable eyewear collection but also with outstanding customer service and distinctive image.
Shop for the latest eyewear looks and hop on the hottest trends with Seen's quality collections, made and handles with care. Experience personalised fittings by Seen experts, and see the world in a whole new light! Besides glasses, choose from a variety of contact lens brands including Acuvue, Alcon, Bausch + Lomb, Blincon, Clearlab, Cooper Vision and Freshkon. Feel free, uninhabited and at ease with these comfortable lenses and contact lens care!
For frames, accentuate your best features with your choice of square frames, round frames, aviator frames, oval frames and more, all available in various materials like titanium, metal, plastic and more. Consider various lens material in terms of clarity, weight, scratch and shatter resistance and lens colours based on how and when you use your glasses. Prescription sunglasses or polarized eyewear that removes UV and eliminates glare are great to protect the eyes of those who drive for long hours in the sun! For those who spend long hours in front of the computer, consider blue light glasses to shield your eyes from prolonged screen exposure.

name: Sephora
description: Sephora operates over 2,600 stores in 34 countries worldwide, with an expanding base of over 460 stores across the Americas. Sephora opened its first U.S. store in New York’s Soho neighborhood in 1998, its first Canadian store in Toronto in 2004, first Mexico store in Mexico City in 2011, and first Brazil store in São Paolo in 2012. The Sephora Americas headquarters are located in San Francisco, with corporate offices in New York, Mexico City, Montreal, Toronto and São Paolo.Sephora features a variety of beauty products from more than 300 brands, including NARS Cosmetics, Make Up For Ever, Too Faced Cosmetics, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Urban Decay, Benefit Cosmetics, Amazing Cosmetics, First Aid Beauty, Lancôme Cosmetics, Sunday Riley Skincare, philosophy, Jo Malone London, Atelier Cologne, YSL Beauty by Yves Saint Laurent, Tatcha,Huda Beauty, Kat Von D, and Bobbi Brown Cosmetics. Sephora also features its own make-up, skincare, beauty tools and accessories. Packaging for the line features the company's elongated flame logo in standard black print.Sephora has grown quite a bit over the last three decades. The company has forged ahead into several countries, making a name and a brand for itself. The cosmetics industry continues to grow, and it's very likely that Sephora will expand and grow right along with it.

description:
踏入士林的世界 – Step into the World of Shihlin
Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks® is everybody’s favourite Taiwanese food chain featuring popular snacks from the alleys of Taiwan’s night markets.
Prepared the way they do over in Taiwan, the menu features authentic favorites such as XXL Crispy Chicken, Crispy Floss Egg Crepe, Handmade Oyster Mee Sua and Seafood Tempura.
Come and enjoy a taste of Taiwan today!

name: Shiino Pieces
description: Offering Japanese and Korean inspired outfits, Chiino Pieces is a fashion retailer you can't miss when you're in Asian Avenue at Sunway Pyramid. You totally need to get your outfit for the next big occasion here, as you'll fall in love with their to-die-for evening dresses. You’ll be spoilt for choice here with their various styles of cocktail dresses and evening gowns. From minis to maxis, you can opt for different necklines such as off-shoulders, togas, cold shoulders, halter neck, strapless and more. Their gorgeous dresses are available in varying materials like velvet, satin, chiffon, lace, and silk, and come in both neutral and vibrant colours. With so many options you can create your own style whether it’s elegant, class, sexy, alluring, or sweet! No need to worry about wearing off shoulder dresses or backless dresses, they sell silicon nude bras and silicon pad inserts in normal and push-up variations that can be easily worn with your dress. An extra advantage of getting these handy accessories is that they can even be inserted into your lingerie or bikinis for that added boost. Did we mention? Chiino Pieces also offers a selection of swimwear, talk about having all your wardrobe needs covered! Pick up a cute and playful bikini here that’s ideal for your next beach vacation or pool party with your friends. The shop also brings in beautiful dresses that are slightly more festive when Chinese New Year and X-Mas is around the corner, so you can drop by when looking for a modern cheongsam for that CNY gathering here. If you’re looking for something more casual and comfortable yet fashionable, you can browse through their range of t-shirts, rompers, blouses, denim skirts, corset tops, ruffle tubes and more. Not only are the clothes here a treat for your eyes and are super comfortable, but everything here is priced with an affordable price tag too.

name: Skechers
description:
A renowned leader in the performance and lifestyle footwear industry, Skechers designs, develops and markets more than 3,000 styles for men, women and children. Skechers' success stems from its employees, high-quality, varied product offering, diversified domestic and international distribution channels, and targeted multi-channel marketing.
Skechers offers two distinct footwear categories: a lifestyle division and performance footwear. Through licensing agreements, the company also offers branded apparel, accessories, eyewear, bags, socks, caps, hats and more.
Celebrity product endorsees for Skechers' lifestyle collections include multi-platinum recording artist Camila Cabello and athletic legends like David Ortiz, Tony Romo, Sugar Ray Leonard and Howie Long. The Skechers Performance Division's roster of elite athletes features marathon champion and Boston Marathon winner Meb Keflezighi, elite runner Ed Cheserek, and pro golfers Matt Kuchar, Brooke Henderson, Russell Knox, Wesley Bryan, Billy Andrade and Colin Montgomerie.
Skechers sells its footwear in department, specialty and independent stores. From sports, casual, walk, wide-fit, work shoes to relaxed fit, arch fit, stretch fit and all sorts of kids’ shoes, Skechers offers loads of options for all occasions. Slip on a pair for a leisurely stroll, a game of golf, a workout, training in the gym or a weekend out with family.

name: Smart Master
description: SmartMaster was founded in 1999. A brand that is equipped with the latest in ready-made men’s wear while providing the same unique cutting of suits developed through the years of tailoring experience. A store that brings out the latest in tailoring and modern fashion while maintaining a sense of tradition, timeless quality and loyalty to its customers.

name: Smiggle
description:
"Where a smile meets a giggle!"
Smiggle was founded in 2003, aiming to be the ultimate creators of colourful, fun, fashion-forward stationery. From humble beginnings where the first Smiggle store opened in Melbourne, Australia, word spread fast about the bright pens, notebooks and gadgets that filled a tiny, but very special place.
The colorful concept took off and Smiggle soon hit 20 stores nationwide, where it caught the eye of Just Group - Australia's most exciting fashion & apparel retailer. Smiggle joined the Just Group in August 2007 and has not looked back since!
In 2008, Smiggle jumped overseas and opened its first international store in New Zealand. By 2011 Smiggle has expanded into Singapore, and in 2014 Smiggle opened its doors in the United Kingdom. In 2016 Smiggle said hello to Malaysia, Hong Kong & Ireland! It's all part of the grand plan to be the world's most exciting and famous stationery brand.
Smiggle’s product range is exclusively designed in Melbourne, Australia, and the range is now bigger and better than ever, with the team at the Smiggle Design Lab drawing inspiration from all over the globe! Look out for special designs all throughout the year, with seasonal goodies and festive surprises! Our ultimate goal is to inspire and develop the creative spirits of our customers, by delivering original, fun and affordable stationery.
Smiggle products are all about great design and innovation, bold colors, quirky graphics, great value and most of all - giving our fans the tools they need to have fun!
So come on in, experiment, explore, poke, prod and play, because a visit to our stores is just like a hug from your best friend. Where a smile meets a giggle, it's the world's greatest place.

name: Snowflake
description:
Snowflake is the perfect place to indulge in shaved ice desserts inspired by traditional Taiwanese treats. Whether you're craving something refreshingly fruity or delectably creamy, we offer a wide selection of options for you to enjoy.
We also have our seasonal specials for those adventurous or curious ones or stick with our crowd favorites like mango or our signature grass jelly.

name: Sorella
description:
Sorella believes in treasuring and celebrating every womans innate femininity.
We aim to highlight and enhance your natural beauty and sexy curves with our high quality lingerie, which provide unparalleled support, superior shaping, desired toning and overall flawlessness.
Cherish yourself with Sorella Sunway Pyramid and unveil your true feminine allure. Discover, indulge in your body and love yourself entirely through our premium lingerie.
Sorella believes in bringing out the very best in every woman by highlighting your individual uniqueness and strengths. Our focus is on creating empowering lingerie that enhances and contours, supporting and expressing your inherent femininity and boosting your self-confidence. As such, every Sorella woman is sophisticated, delicate, confident and always at her fullest potential.
Our products are the result of detailed research and consistent communication with women to determine their needs and desires, in order for us to better tailor ourselves to your figure and lifestyle. Sorella also aims to share with women the importance of as well as how to achieve the perfect fit and increase your understanding of breast health and physical well-being.

name: Sox World
description:
SOXWORLD is a Malaysia born brand dated back in the 80's. Starting with only socks, we are now the leading retailer of socks, hosiery, undergarments, winter accessories, sleepwear, and caps.
SOXWORLD is a brand for everyone! Starting from newborn till senior, we have something for you in each stage. Allow us to walk beside you along this fabulous journey.
From various lengths of socks – invisible, calf, low cut, sleeve, sports and even toe socks, SOXWORLD has got you covered! Choose from comfortable socks available in both men, women and kids ranges, in colours like neon colours, solid colours, nude, white, black, grey, yellow, blue and more. Besides socks, shop for caps in various designs such as prints, colours, characters and more.
Be it a casual, formal, school or sports, there’s socks fit for all occasions to keep you warm, comfortable and protected!

name: Spenco
description:
Finally Spenco is available at Sunway Pyramid. Spenco is a medical healthy footwear from Texas, USA since year 1967. It has received the Prestigious Seal of Acceptance Award from the American Podiatric Medical Association. Its special features on footbed is rarely seen in others footwear in the market. It is based on the design of highly successful insoles and incorporates with Cushioned Heel, Deep Heel Cupping, Orthotic Arch Support, Metatarsal Dome, Lateral Arch Support, Forefoot Lifting, Non-Slip, Impact Absorbing, Lightweight, Ultra-Fresh Antimicrobial, Water Proof Material.
Combination of these features with TOTAL SUPPORT Technology, Spenco created “The Shape That Feels Great” which is suitable for everyone and able to ease the symptoms of most common foot ailments such as Flat Foot, Supination, Pronation, Plantar Fasciitis, Metatarsalgia, Shin Splints, Achilles Tendonitis, Knee, Heel, Ankle, Arch and Lower Back Pain & etc.
Spenco offers both Total Support Footwear and Insoles. Quality products and customer service are what Spenco focusing on. We are 100% committed to exceeding your expectations in products and service as you find solutions for your health and foot care needs.
Generally speaking, we hope you feel fortunate to be part of our Spenco Family. We strive to honour the diverse needs of all in our daily actions and we look forward to expanding our relationship with you at Sunway Pyramid.

name: Stellar
description:
Stellar is Number one Ear Piercing in Singapore, is now in Sunway Pyramid!
Ear piercing is an important milestone for all young girls and we want to be the one to witness and celebrate this milestone. Every piercing done with us with be given a ‘Piercing Certificate’ to commemorate this special occasion.
Through our vast retail experience in jewellery industry, we identify the importance of providing products that are "reliable", "safe" and "sterile".
Stellar is committed in providing a wide range of fashionable hypo-allergenic jewellery that is suitable for all skin types. Our diverse range of jewellery selection across all stores will surely suit your personal preference for all age groups.
We provide a safe and sterile piercing service that is desirable for sensitive skin. Using the most advanced technology from USA and highest quality jewellery, we create a memorable piercing milestone for both parents and their kids. Our piercing studs presents high grade material, ranging from medical grade titanium, 14 karat and 18 karat gold. With our enhanced aftercare solution, our team goes the extra mile to ensure customers understand the importance and how-to care for the newly pierced ears. Stellar provides 2 complimentary aftercare consultations service within 2 months to monitor your piercing's healing process. Aftercare is an important step to ensure that your piercing is healing well to achieve that beautiful look. Our technicians are here to help you in every step of your piercing journey from choosing of design to the healing aftercare process.
STELLAR RECORDS MORE THAN 10,000 PIERCINGS ANNUALLY! Our experienced technicians are able to provide you with the best advice on the most suitable ear piercing studs and ear piercing positions regardless of shapes and sizes of your earlobes.
Let us introduce our yearly ‘Stellar Girl’ campaign!
‘Piercing with confidence at Stellar’
Started in 2018, to encourage children to feel more confident to pierce. Each year has a creative theme in order to make it a fun and fulfilling experience for the kids. The winner will also be the face of the brand for the entire year.
With service excellence, we create trustworthy relationship with customers and henceforth being recognised as the most preferred piercing in Singapore. We look towards continuous improvement to enhance every customer experience and satisfaction!

name: Strip
description:
STRIP is the undisputed king in hair removal services and is widely known for its top-notch service that’ll help you conquer the body foliage and achieve that baby-smooth skin factor. Besides waxing, they also offer Advanced Fluorescence Technology (AFT) hair removal, Rosebud Vajuvenation, and Thermal Shape treatment.
With their pioneering ‘No Double Dipping’ commandment, you can be assured that your waxing experience here will be a hygienic and comfortable one with your own STRIP Hygiene Pack and the usage of the best in-house formulated waxes. They also carry a range of specially formulated pre and post-care products namely TWO L(I)PS to ensure that you will be well taken care of at all times. Having pruned a staggering 4 million bushes (and counting) to date, STRIP’s expertise in Brazilian and Boyzilian waxes is unquestionable. The next time you’re looking to get rid of those pesky body hair, give STRIP a go!

name: Subway
description:
In 1965, Subway® Restaurants was founded by 17 year-old high school graduate Fred DeLuca, along with family friend Dr. Peter Buck. The first restaurant opened in Bridgeport, Connecticut, USA in 1965 and was called Pete’s Super Submarines. The first franchised Subway® unit opened in Wallingford, Connecticut.
Today, the SUBWAY brand is the world's largest submarine sandwich chain with more than 44,000 locations around the world. We've become the leading choice for people seeking quick, nutritious meals that the whole family can enjoy. From the beginning, Fred has had a clear vision for the future of the SUBWAY brand. As we continue to grow, we are guided by his passion for delighting customers by serving delicious, made-to-order sandwiches.
