name: Sunway Lagoon
description:
With more and more attractions being added since its inception, Sunway Lagoon is a bountiful wonderland of entertainment just waiting for you to explore! Divided into several sections, highlights of the Sunway Lagoon include:
• Sunway Lagoon Extreme Park
It is the best place to get your adrenaline pumping! Feel the rush with aerial attractions like bungee jumping, flying fox, riding a Go Kart or an ATV, wall climbing and so much more!
• Sunway Lagoon Water Park
The Sunway Lagoon Water Park is a great stop to beat the Malaysian heat. From daring water spins in the African Pythons loop ride, to the Congo Challenge, Vuvuzela and Waterplexx 5D, be ready for a grand, wet day out in the sun! For those looking for a more relaxing pace, drop by the Surf Beach, which is said to be the world's largest man-made surf beach (arrive early to grab a curtained gazebo for that extra tropical feeling).
Of course proper swimming attire is required for this section of the park, changing rooms and lockers are provided.
• Sunway Lagoon Amusement Park
Do not want to get wet? You can explore the amusement park and walk on the bridge in Sunway lagoon theme park which is known as Malaysia’s longest pedestrian.
• Nickelodeon Lost Lagoon
This is Asia's first Nickelodeon themed park and includes exciting water rides and attractions. Enjoy your day in the company of memorable Nickelodeon characters from Spongebob Squarepants, Dora The Explorer and even the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as you explore around with the kids (souvenirs are aplenty too).
• Wildlife Park
Wildlife Park is a great little zoo specializing in cute, cuddly, friendly animals and a few not-so-cuddly ones like eagles, pythons and tigers. The petting enclosure is a major attraction with families, where you can enjoy hand-feeding the rabbits, tortoises, guinea pigs and petting the ponies too!
• Scream Park
Finally, there is the Scream Park, a modern take on the old house of horrors. With special effects and great actors, let your fears come alive!

name: Sunway Lagoon Hotel
description:
“Relax with Perfection”
Located in the heart of scenic Sunway City, the 4-star Sunway Clio Hotel is conveniently linked to the west precinct of the Sunway Pyramid Mall and is also within walking distance from the main entrance of the Sunway Lagoon theme park. Sunway Clio Hotel forms part of the cluster of hotels in Sunway City, where the 26-storey hotel feature 401 guestrooms, each including convenient touches such as complimentary Wi-Fi and wired broadband internet access, USB charger outlets, 42” LED Smart TV with satellite news, sports and movie channels, flexible workspaces, high pressure walk-in rain showers, ample closet space, in-room electronic safe boxes and beverage making facilities.
Beyond just hotel rooms, the Sunway Clio Hotel provides the right balance between work and play with 5 fully-equipped function rooms with a seating capacity of 20 to 160 persons and a host of other additional facilities to further enhance your time with us.
Some other key features of Sunway Clio include:
• Located just 35 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) and 25 minutes to Kuala Lumpur city centre.
• Sunway Clio Hotel has 401 Deluxe Plus guestrooms with a vast selection of rooms with unimpeded views of Sunway Lagoon theme park or the city’s skyline (subject to availability).
• For a more luxurious experience, enjoy your stay in our Deluxe Plus Executive Rooms, which boast wider space and exemplary creature comforts.
• Additional facilities you can revel in here include an all-day dining restaurant, meeting rooms, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre.
• Over 170+ restaurants and outlets to cater to every craving imaginable, all within a stone’s throw away in Sunway Pyramid Mall and the surrounding shop lots.

name: Sunway Mega Lanes
description:
Experience is Everything! Sunway Megalanes is a world-class bowling center equipped with 48 professional bowling lanes with the latest Brunswick lane and scoring system, upgrading your bowling experience to the next level! Head over to Sunway Megalanes and experience the fun bonding and chilling sessions with your family and friends with a thrilling game of bowling!
Our Megalanes Proshop offers the latest Brunswick and Storm bowling equipment with expert drilling services to satisfy your bowling needs! Don't forget to check the signature local dishes at our very own Megalanes Cafe!
Sunway Megalanes! The Future of Bowling!

name: Sunway Multicare Pharmacy
description: Sunway Pharmacy was first opened in 2016 at a Caltex petrol station with the aim to enhance the pharmacist profession in the community setting. Now, there are more than 10 outlets in the Klang Valley region and is rapidly expanding to give customers the very best medical advice and services. In Sunway Pharmacy, you can get a wide range of products such as personal care, baby care, skin care, feminine care, exclusive beauty care products, vitamins and supplements, medical equipment, mobility aids and many more! Visit us today at Lower Ground floor to get your health in check!

name: Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre (SPCC)
description:
Offering 7,157 sqm of unobstructed function space, the Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre (SPCC) forms an integral part of the vibrant, integrated Sunway City as an event venue. Capable of accommodating large exhibitions, conferences, trade shows and even gala dinners, SPCC has been the venue of choice for many high-profiled events. With 24/7 security and well-equipped facilities such as storage areas/rooms, prayer and changing rooms as well as the flexibility in customizable options of layouts, SPCC boasts ample and varied spaces to explore new possibilities and exceeds expectations in showcasing ideas and events of all magnitudes.
Located just within the premises of the Sunway Pyramid Mall, which itself is located just 35 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) and 25 minutes from Kuala Lumpur’s city centre, SPCC is directly accessible via a network of major highways and expressways, providing ease for delegates and attendees driving in. A purpose-built flyover leads directly into the convention centre’s parking facility that is built for up to 10,000 vehicles across the inter-connected parking of the Sunway City.
The convention centre also comprises eight function rooms complemented by 60 conference and event venues in the adjacent Sunway Resort Hotel & Spa, Sunway Pyramid Hotel and Sunway Clio Hotel. Being a part of Sunway Pyramid mall that is also interlinked to the hotels, delegates and event goers can enjoy the convenience of having accommodation options within walking distance as well as the various entertainment, food and beverage outlets there.
From intimate business meetings and social gatherings, to large conventions, trade shows and weddings, no matter the size, all you need is the right venue and Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre is what you’ve been looking for!

name: Sunway Pyramid Hotel
description:
“Crafting unforgettable family memories”
As part of the cluster of hotels in Sunway City, the 4-star Sunway Pyramid Hotel is located in the heart of the scenic Sunway City. Taking cues from its name, the hotel is linked to the infamous Sunway Pyramid Mall and is also conveniently close by to the Sunway Lagoon theme park’s Surf Beach entrance.
Tired of finding rooms that are just too small, or lacking in the right set of facilities for your family? Come stay in our purpose-built Family Room or Family Suite, which has been specially designed with the comforts of a travelling family in mind. Showcasing a collection of 564 Deluxe guestrooms and the afore-mentioned Family Rooms and Suites to cater to the needs of a new generation of travellers, each guestroom reflects bold patterns and vibrant colors and complemented by enhanced in-room facilities and technology upgrades for a most memorable stay.
Some other key features of the Sunway Pyramid Hotel include:
• Located just 35 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) and 25 minutes to Kuala Lumpur city centre.
• Sunway Pyramid Hotel features a collection of 564 Deluxe guestrooms, family room and suites; with options of rooms with unimpeded views of Sunway Lagoon theme park or the city’s skyline (subject to availability).
• Additional facilities you can revel in here include an all-day dining restaurant, meeting rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, and even access to the Balinese spa at the Sunway Resort Hotel & Spa.
• Over 170+ restaurants and outlets to cater to every craving imaginable, all within a stone’s throw away in Sunway Pyramid Mall and the surrounding shop lots.
• With over 10,000 parking bays within the entirety of Sunway City, the ample parking spaces welcomes all visitors, and parking is complimentary for all in-house guests.
Be it an exciting chain of adventures with your kids, or a relaxing vacation with your loved ones, let your family experience the best of times with the best of stays with us.

name: Sunway Pyramid Ice
description:
Sunway Pyramid Ice is a popular recreational destination in Malaysia which attracts approximately 15,000 skaters each month. Being the first world class ice sports entertainment in Malaysia where you can enjoy a day of ice-skating to escape the heat of Kuala Lumpur, Sunway Pyramid Ice has played host to numerous international sports competitions and musicals since 1997. With a rink size spanning 39m x 22.5m, shoppers can have a breathtaking view of this ice-skating rink's sleek-modern design from above thanks to glass panels surrounding each level. On and off, you can catch a sight of experienced skaters practising their routines and perfecting their stunts, as Sunway Pyramid Ice is part of ISIAsia (Ice Skating Institute Asia), which trains professional figure-skaters in Malaysia.
Spend only a total of RM20 on weekdays, RM25 on weekends and RM28 during school and public holidays to enjoy the ice-skating rink as much as you like. Although it is a prerequisite to wear gloves and socks when ice-skating, these items are readily available at the ticketing counter for RM6 and RM9 respectively.
It is the birth place where many local skating talents are born and trained by Sunway Pyramid Ice very own coaches through its Skating Academy. Beginners without skating knowledge may opt to take up 30 minute lessons with rates starting at RM70 on weekdays and RM75 on weekends. As you get better in your ice-skating skills, advance lessons may then be an option. This could be a good opportunity for children and young teens to pick up a new skill during school holidays with packages and interesting discounts for classes. Due to its close proximity to Petaling Jaya’s many five-star hotels, universities and colleges, as well as the Sunway Lagoon Theme Park, Sunway Pyramid Ice can get very crowded during the weekends, so it is highly recommended for customers to arrive early to avoid the long queue.

name: Sunway Resort Hotel
description:
SUNWAY RESORT HOTEL KUALA LUMPUR’S MOST ICONIC HOTEL
Step into a spectacular world of business, leisure and culinary wonders at Sunway Resort Hotel. This luxury 5-star hotel is located in the heart of Sunway City Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia’s premier entertainment and hospitality destination.
Sunway Resort Hotel presents 477 smart, environmentally-friendly and intuitively designed rooms and suites fitted with state-of-the-art technology, including speciality suites that are perfectly tailored for different types of guests; from business travellers and families to wellness and luxury seekers. Discover exclusive lounges and family zones like the Aquaventure Playland and Wonderland Kids Club, and have an extraordinary dining experience, from world-class cuisine at Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill to the vibrant market-style buffet at The Resort Café and laid-back poolside dining at Fuzion. Being inter-connected to the Sunway Pyramid shopping mall and Sunway Lagoon theme park, guests will be able to hop from elegant boutiques to exhilarating rides within minutes.
Asia’s most outstanding events are also created in Sunway City. With our comprehensive meeting and events facilities featuring world-class spaces and the latest state-of-the-art technology, you'll be able to organise an event or a gathering to your exact requirements. From international conferences and exhibitions at the convention centre, brainstorming sessions and meetings in the fully-equipped meeting rooms, intensive team teambuilding at Sunway Lagoon, to spectacular wedding celebrations in the Grand Ballroom and exclusive corporate dinners at the Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill, we've got what it takes to create exceptional experiences for you and your guests.
The options are simply endless at Sunway Resort Hotel!
Some of the key highlighted features of Sunway Resort Hotel:
• 477 specially designed room and suites fitted with state-of-the-art technology, perfectly tailored for different types of guests, including speciality suites.
• Family Zones such as Aquaventure Playland, Wonderland Kids Club, The Leisure Club and dedicated kids buffet corner during breakfast.
• Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill in Sunway Resort, the multi-Michelin starred chef and TV star’s first flagship restaurant in Malaysia.
For more information, visit https://www.sunwayhotels.com/sunway-resort/

name: Sunway Super App
description:
Enjoy Rewards for All & redeem points at over 1,000 merchants at Sunway Malls, Sunway Theme Parks, Sunway Medical, Sunway Education, Sunway Property, and other Sunway businesses with Sunway Super App!
Sunway Super App Counter is here to help you with your Sunway Super App-related info! We have all the various Sunway Super App services that you may need, from:
• Member Registration
• Member Inquiries
• Membership Servicing
• Any other Sunway Pals related enquiries
Drop by to explore ongoing promotions, get the latest updates in any new events from Sunway Sunway Super App here: https://sunwaypals.com.my/

name: Supamala Hotpot
description: SUPAMALA hotpot - Hot Pot for Everyone. Mala has found fans among Malaysians, especially those who love a strong sensation to their foods. At SUPAMALA, we aim to serve customers of every kind with our distinctively unique pork-free hotpot cuisine. Now, everyone can dine worry-free at SUPAMALA with friends and families.

name: Superdry
description:
At Superdry, our clear brand positioning is centered on creating amazing clothes, through an obsession with design, quality and fit and is underpinned by relentless innovation and commitment to operational excellence in everything we do.
Our customers are loyal and global and are defined by attitude, not age. Core to the brand DNA is the combination of market-leading quality and design detail delivered at astonishing value for money. Superdry has democratic appeal, offering affordable, premium-quality clothing, accessories and footwear complemented by newer lifestyle categories such as Sport and Snow.
Our mission: build a creative and product led brand to inspire and engage the contemporary style obsessed consumer - always. Don Superdry’s jackets to stay warm in air-conditioned environments, available in loads of styles such as hydrotech waterproof, jet jackets, coach jackets, flight bomber jackets, track jackets, windcheater, puffer jackets and many more. Known for style and quality, Superdry’s iconic T-Shirts are available with an embroidered or emblazoned logo, in various colours from white to black, orange, pink, tri colours, green, blue and many more styles.
Besides outerwear and shirts, try Superdry’s Polo shirts, swimwear, knits, shorts, sweats, tops, underwear & sleepwear, bags, hats, belts, flip flops, pants, wallets, pencil cases, pouches and more.

name: Surau
description:
Assalamualaikum semua.
Surau akan dibuka setiap hari pada pukul 1:00pm -10:00pm (Isnin - Ahad).
Lokasi Surau:
* Lower Ground 1 di Orange Zone, behind Clarks
* Lower Ground 2 di Orange Zone, behind Polo Haus

name: Sushi Jiro
description: Sushi Jiro is a conveyor-belt restaurant that offer fast and freshest sushi at RM2.88 per plate. Meet Jiro boy to enjoy the goodness of bite-sized Japanese food today.

name: Sushi King
description: Sushi King is the largest Halal Japanese chain of restaurants that serves quality sushi and other Japanese cuisine at affordable prices in a warm and friendly environment. What sets Sushi King apart is the personal touch of serving freshly made sushi on the kaiten for customers to pick up and enjoy.

name: Sushi Zanmai
description: Sushi Zanmai is the genuine sushi restaurant that provides more than 100 assortments of sushi and large varieties of cooked food that are authentically Japanese. Come and enjoy this well-loved sushi restaurant by families and young professionals.

name: Swarovski
description: Delivering a wonderlab of meticulously crafted jewellery & accessories, Swarovski brings artistry & elegance into the everyday lifestyle. Celebrate individuality & break the rules of style where innovation meets imagination.

name: Swich Café
description: Cake and Gelato Salon.

name: Switch
description: Apple’s largest official partner in Malaysia, Switch was established based on a vision of a handful of friends, to get people to “switch” from PC to Mac in 1995. The founders saw the good in Apple that they have decided to bring their vision to life in 1997, by setting up their first store in Penang. With a huge growing number of outlets all over Malaysia, Switch extends to Small and Medium Business owners alongside college and university students with attractive discounts and exciting workshops.

name: T&L KOREA ACCESSORIES
description: Retailing of unisex accessories, soft toys and other decorative accessories.

name: T&T Kidzpark
description: Enjoy a funfair-like mini amusement park in the comfort and air-conditioned environment of Sunway Pyramid Mall. T&T Kidzpark has a variety of rides for your kids to enjoy including bumper cars, carousel, a flying-go-round and a mini train ride as well as other kiddy rides at a cheap rate. With the colourful and well-maintained equipment, the kids will have a good time in this wonderland of fun.

name: TACOBELL
description:
Founded by Glen Bell in 1962, Taco Bell opened its first store serving Crunchy Tacos to satisfy hungry mouths of Southern California. With a dream to share Tacos, Burritos, Quesadillas, and much more with the world, we opened our first location here in Malaysia in April, 2021. Now, in 2022, we are pleased to be bringing Taco Bell to Sunway Pyramid!

Taco Bell is known for Mexican inspired foods with bold flavors like our Taco Supreme TM, Grilled Stuft Burrito TM, and Crunchwrap Supreme TM. Our menu is crafted to please everyone, whether it be eating out with friends, a meal for the family, or a lunch for the office. With customizable protein options like Seasoned Ground Beef, Ground Chicken, Grilled Chicken, and Black Beans, we can accommodate any cravings.

name: TAIWAN SPICY NOODLE HOUSE
description: Retailing of Taiwan food and beverages

name: TANYU 探鱼
description: TANYU is a grilled fish brand originating from Shenzhen, China, having over 300 outlets across the Asia-Pacific region. Well known for its signature flavor Grilled Fish with Fresh Green Pepper, TANYU made its debut in Malaysia in 2023, providing incredible dining experience to everyone. Catering to the diverse tastes of local Malaysians, TANYU makes use of a variety of cooking methods and offers 8 kinds of grilled fish flavors ranging from mala, savoury, to garlicky and more. Come and have a delightful fish feast at TANYU located at Oasis Zone (Blue Atrium)

name: TAPAS FASHION
description:
Retailing of ladies fashion, lifestyle apparels and related accessories & products.
Origin : Malaysia

name: TGI Fridays™
description:
IN HERE IT'S ALWAYS FRIDAY.
Famous for fresh food and mouthwatering American classics, from appetizers perfect for sharing, to memorable burgers and delicious desserts.

name: TGV Cinemas
description:
With Sunway Pyramid housing the largest branch of TGV cinemas since its advent in 1994, countless moviegoers have came and left with memories of a special day out. From blockbuster movies that keep you at the edge of your seat to intimate romance-comedies that make your heart flutter, TGV’s diverse range of entertainment means there’s something for everyone.
Come for a regular movie screening or dive into the more immersive IMAX experience where the theatre is custom-designed to deliver the ultimate audio and visual experience. The unique design of the screen which spans wall-to-wall and floor-to ceiling is also curved in a way that it brings the audience closer while placing them in the center of the action regardless of where you are seated. What's more, the surround sound system with strategically placed speakers around the hall changes the way the sound travels throughout the room. With every loudspeaker laser-aligned to accurately channel soundwaves to the audience, nothing could beat this ultimate audio experience. Looking for a more comfortable seat for your viewing pleasure? TGV Beanie offers comfortable two-seater bean bag sofas with adjustable seating positions so you can get as cozy as possible while you enjoy the movie. One more reason to visit TGV at Sunway Pyramid is to try out the TGV Luxe with plush red velvet seats that gives the viewer an elevated position. Adding to the comfort are the extra wide armrests and custom-made individual tables where you can place your food and drinks.

name: THE ONE ACCESSORIES
description: Retailing of earrings, hair accessories, ring, necklace & bracelet only.

name: THE OWLS CAFE
description:
The Owls Cafe landing at Sunway Pyramid!
The Owls Cafe started as a cozy neighbourhood cafe in Bukit Jalil, and thanks to the support from our owlsome customers, word spreads fast around Klang Valley. Our much loved Owlsome Waffles - fruity ‘Rebecca’ and nutty ‘David’ are perfectly that fit everyone’s taste. Waffle batter are made from scratch with our very own secret recipe. After toasted to crisp, the waffles are topped off with freshest fruits and hand crafted ice-cream by our local brand, Forty licks, which gives all our waffles their distinctive and unforgettable yumminess.
Beside the Owlsome Waffles, The Owls Cafe also serves great variety of brunch, pasta and specialty coffee. We strive to provide fusion meals that interlard Malaysian flavour with western style.
Experience our owlsomeness now at Sunway Pyramid!

name: TISSOT
description: In 1853, Charles-Félicien Tissot and his son Charles-Émile had set up Tissot in the small town of Le Locle, Switzerland. Since then, the beauty and reliability of Tissot timepieces had received numerous awards. The brand had continuously strived for innovation in both design and technology, and also staying true to its slogan “Innovators by tradition”. Do you know that back in the days, Tissot had sponsored several famous car racing brands such as Renault Alpine, Porsche and Lotus? Tissot had collaborated with racing teams in Formula 1 and many famous racers had owned limited timepiece as well. Apart from that, Tissot had a break-through in the fashion industry as it caught the eyes of famous celebrities. For instance, French actress Sarah Bernhardt and world-proclaimed opera singer Carmen Miranda. The wristwatch and pocket watches are the IT thing that all people wants. Fast forward to today, Tissot’s ambassadors are not foreign to us such as famous Chinese actress and singer Liu Yi Fei, NBA player Klay Thompson, MotoGP World Champion Marc Márquez, and the latest NBA rising player Trae Young. There are several Tissot collections that are unique to each of our own preferences and styles. The T-SPORT collection is an inspiration from the numerous partnerships in the world of sports such as the NBA, MOTOGP™ and Tour De France. Besides that, the T-CLASSIC collection focus on the fine craftsmanship that strives to provide accuracy and quality at every level. Tissot also had a dedicated range for the ladies, namely T-LADY collection, which were designed to reflect the current trends with their colour, material and style. For those who prefer classic watches, the T-POCKET collection is not a miss! Since its foundation in 1853, Tissot has been creating pocket watches to this day. Pocket-watches are exceptional accessories and gift as it will stand out from all others. Do check out Tissot at Ground floor (blue zone) for more Tissot collections.

name: TIT TAR MAN
description: Tit Tar Man is Malaysia's leading bone setting specialist that combines Chinese Medicine Arts and Modernized Western methods for relief of bone, joints, and muscle pains. Founder Sifu Derrick Siew has over 24 years of experience in treatment and bone setting and aims to help patients gear towards a healthy lifestyle.

name: TM Kiosk
description: TM Authorised Reseller providing service registration for UNIFI home, mobile and bill payment.

name: TMT Megastore by Thunder Match
description: The Largest Tech Retailer in Malaysia. Discover amazing deals on the latest tech from leading brands in computers, smartphones, smart home, and more!

name: TOM FORD (POP UP)
description: Tom Ford Beauty is a covetable collection of cosmetics and fragrances, shaped with Tom Ford’s singular vision of modern glamour and crafted with the ultimate in quality and luxury.

name: TOMAZ SHOE
description: Retailing of shoes, men's apparels and related accessories.

name: TONKATSU BY MA MAISON
description: Originating from Nagoya, Japan, Tonkatsu by Ma Maison exclusively serves up a variety of tonkatsu or deep-fried golden brown pork cutlet - one of Japan’s most loved dishes. Founded by restaurateur and chef Akinori Terazawa, Ma Maison is an indulgent celebration of traditional Japanese cuisine with more than 30 restaurants in Japan, Singapore and Malaysia. Proudly rated as “Top 10 Tonkatsu Restaurant in Tokyo”, we serve up a variety of tonkatsu or deep-fried pork cutlet using only the highest-grade ingredients prepared meticulously by our chefs.

name: Tai Er
description:
TAI ER was launched in 2015 Guangzhou, is a unique chain restaurant that featuring Suancai & Fish and aims to introduce classic Sichuan Cuisine to the world. Currently have 560+ branches in most of the cities in China, such as Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen. First oversea branch is located in Singapore. TAI ER are spreading their wings to more new market at Singapore, Malaysia, Canada, Thailand, Korea and United States in the coming future, hoping the world enjoys this unique and flavorful Sichuan taste.
太二于2015年在中国广州成立，是一家传承中国川菜美味、主打川菜经典菜品酸菜鱼的创新互联网餐饮品牌。门店辐射中国大部分城市，主要集中在北京、上海、广州、深圳等一线城市。并于2019年拓展海外市场，首店选址新加坡，自开业以来，深受新加坡食客喜爱。未来将布局加拿大、新马泰、韩国、美国等地区，为世界带来川菜的酸爽滋味

name: Tapas
description: Retailing of fashion accessories.

name: Tea Garden
description: At Tea Garden, we aim to serve the country's best-known gastronomical icons as Malaysia is a proudly multicultural country and our food is a clear reflection of that. Most of our recipes are homemade because there is no shortcut to serving authentic, wholesome flavours. It's definitely worth the effort simply because you deserve the best from us.

name: Tealive Plus
description: Retailing in bubble tea and related products.

name: Texas Chicken
description: Founded in San Antonio, Texas, USA in 1952, Texas Chicken is a highly recognized brand name in the Quick Service Restaurant sector and is one of the largest quick service chicken concepts in the world. Texas Chicken serves up freshly prepared, high quality, authentic American Southern-styled fare, to provide customers with value-for-money, complete meal options. The Texas Chicken menu includes flavorful chicken both Original and Spicy, crispy tenders strips, burgers and wraps, classic side dishes and hand-made from scratch honey-butter biscuits.

name: Thai Odyssey
description: Thai Odyssey invites you to experience the tranquillity of Thai ambience and embrace our warm hospitality in a calm and peaceful sanctuary, offering a curated range of treatments for your wellness and pampering needs. As Malaysia's largest and award-winning Thai massage and spa chain with over 40 outlets conveniently located nationwide, our dedicated pool of seasoned therapists, overseen by our team of certified trainers, is committed to providing massages that uplift physical and mental well-being, enhance relaxation, and boost immunity.

name: Thai Thai
description:
Retailing of Thai food and beverages.
Business Hours: Sun-Fri (10am-9.45pm) , Sat (10am-10.45pm)

name: The Body Shop
description:
The Body Shop launched a new store concept – the first of its kind in Malaysia, at Sunway Pyramid recently. The Body Shop Activist Makers’ Workshop is an interactive ‘activist workshop’ that encourages people to explore products and discover how – together – we can fight for a fairer and more beautiful world.
The Body Shop’s new Activist Makers’ Workshop store is a place for play and discovery, where shoppers can get stuck in and get inspired by the brand’s legendary beauty products and ethical purpose.
Customers of the new store will experience new features at this The Body Shop store, one of the most sustainable in Malaysia:
Refill station: The Body Shop is on a mission to use as little plastic as possible with aluminium refill bottles that can be cleaned and brought back to the store to be refilled from 12 of the brand’s best-loved shower gel, shampoo, conditioner and hand wash.
Sustainable store fixtures: The store has been outfitted with sustainable fixtures made from reclaimed wood and recycled plastics to help minimise its environmental footprint. Examples include a metal facade constructed in aluminium, which requires less energy production than other materials and is infinitely recyclable. The store also boasts worktop surfaces that are manufactured from 100% recycled material otherwise destined for the landfill.
The Body Butter Tower: One the most beloved The Body Shop products, The Body Shop body butters are displayed in full glory in a towering rack. With an attached sink, customers can test out different hand wash and shower gels before slathering on their favourite body butter or body lotion at this testing station.
The ACT Wall/Station: This is where brand campaigns and values are shared to customers to create positive engagement with them. From our environmental causes to women empowerment, this wall will be a place to advocate our values.
#BeautyTreats

name: The Boring Coco
description: The Boring Coco wants to bring people together to enjoy life, just like how we relax on the beach enjoying ourselves with a refreshing coconut juice. You may be wondering why we call it BORING? Life has it's ups and downs and can be boring; BUT with great companion and a refreshing drink; we can definitely have a wonderful life.

name: The Chicken Rice Shop
description: With traditionally prepared Steamed, Roast, Soy Sauce or Honey BBQ chicken served with fluffy chicken flavoured rice and a host of other local delights, there's something for everyone in the family at this truly Malaysian family restaurant.

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
description: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf® is a premium global coffeehouse that has been crafting the finest coffees and teas since 1963. Stand by our commitment to quality, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf® sources only from the top 1% of Arabica beans and the finest hand-picked tea leaves from across the world, delivering a distinctive flavour in every cup. Our cafes provide a welcoming, community-driven space where every cup connects people over exceptional taste, making it a beloved destination for coffee and tea enthusiasts alike.

name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
description: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf offers premium handcrafted coffee, tea, gourmet food & cakes for one's pure indulgence.

name: The Elixir Kombucha
description:
The Elixir Kombucha is a proudly Malaysian brand specializing in premium kombucha and the first to open an in-mall retail outlet in Malaysia. Our drinks are a refreshing, health-conscious choice for today’s active lifestyles.
Brewed with natural ingredients, low in sugar, and packed with probiotics, our kombucha supports gut health and overall well-being. Featuring eight tea-based flavours blending tropical fruits, florals, and spices, we also proudly offer Malaysia’s first truly coffee-based kombucha, brewed directly from coffee beans for a bold, innovative twist.
Founded by brothers Darren and Jarrel, The Elixir Kombucha has grown from pop-up stalls to Malaysia’s first kombucha outlet at Sunway Pyramid, championing eco-friendly initiatives and vibrant flavours for all.

name: The Face Shop
description: As Korea's pioneer beauty company committed to nature, THE FACE SHOP creates products from approximately 600 natural ingredients such as flowers, grains, plants, fruits, mineral water, and oriental medicine to nourish and revitalize the skin. THE FACE SHOP introduced its new brand identity, a circular emblem depicting Demeter, the goddess of beauty and the brand logo around her describing THE FACE SHOP heritage. The elegant new symbol centres around nature’s timeless beauty and willingness to deliver endless beauty to customers. Launched in 2003 as Korea's pioneer beauty brand committed to nature and with a global presence of 3,000 stores in 35 countries including USA, Canada and Middle East, THE FACE SHOP is the most commercially successful and recognizable Korean brand with its famous tagline 'Natural Story'. THE FACE SHOP arrived in Malaysia in 2006 and grew under the direction of branding and retail specialist LG HOUSEHOLD & HEALTH CARE MALAYSIA SDN. BHD. THE FACE SHOP has more than 50 stores across Malaysia up till 2017. THE FACE SHOP products are made with natural ingredients. THE FACE SHOP is inspired by nature and believes that there is natural beauty to everyone. THE FACE SHOP provides high quality products at affordable prices. THE FACE SHOP is committed to making a wide variety of products that customers want. The Face Shop products range from makeup, skin care, body and hair products; such as Hydro Splash BB Cream, Extreme Volume Mascara-Lash Stretch, Gel Eyeliner, and Natural Sun SPF 45. Original from Korea, The Face Shop is now available at Sunway Pyramid.

name: The Parenthood
description:
NOTE: The Parenthood Pre School operating 8.30pm - 5.30pm from Monday to Friday only during MCO period.
With the establishment of the first London Street Family Park in Malaysia, The Parenthood is a place for the whole family to play and learn together, all under one roof. The flagship outlet is located in Sunway Pyramid and has Indoor Playlands uniquely designed for a fun-filled playtime in a safe yet engaging environment. Emphasising the theme of London Street are familiar architectures such as Big Ben , the red London bus, British flags and red post boxes. Parenthood strives to make your journey enjoyable as it answers to all your children and parental needs with this one-stop edutainment centre.
As of 2019, the Enrichment Hub was introduced which offers a variety of learning programmes, activities, and workshops for children and even parents to have an enjoyable and wonderful time together such as Kids Kick Boxing, Kids Dance Class, Kids Gym, Art & Craft, Robotics and language classes. On top of that, structured classes are also offered here from academic to sports and personal hobbies, all conducted in a safe and positive environment so your children can play and learn while building their self-confidence.
Besides being a playland, The Parenthood also has The Parenthood Preschool located only at the Sunway Pyramid outlet which unlocks your child’s potential beyond education by developing skills in literacy, mathematics, understanding of the world, and expressive Arts & Design.
Parents can also shop for baby care essentials, toys, clothes, stationery and gifts from the wide selection of products by a mix of tenants and baby brands around the park. There is also a restaurant tucked at the corner of the family park where families can indulge in a hearty meal.

name: The Under Shop
description:
THE UNDER SHOP was started in 1999 to serve a very specific purpose. A straightforward, no-frills store selling men’s undergarment to cater to the needs of customers who wish to find a range of different brands, cuts, colours and designs, all under one roof. As the materials, packaging and designs of our products evolved, so did THE UNDER SHOP. Being the leader in this segment means that we have to be the trendsetter, pioneering the way under garment retailing needs to adapt to the changing needs of consumers.
Today, THE UNDER SHOP Sunway Pyramid has evolved to feature multiple brands catering to men and women. Some of the well-known brands include BUM Equipment, Alain Delon, Body Glove, Diesel, Hummer, Renoma, Joe Boxer, RCB Club and more.
For men, choose from various underwear cuts – such as trunks, boxers, full briefs, minis, shorties or even thongs. Shop for all essential undergarments like undershirts, muscle tees, singlets and V-Necks to keep you warm and comfy all day long in all conditions. THE UNDER SHOP also sells socks of assorted sizes, lengths and designs, depending on your needs. For women, THE UNDER SHOP offers various types of underwear such as minis, hipster panties and socks of various designs at affordable prices.
Head on over to THE UNDER SHOP to get all your undergarment needs taken care of!

name: The Walking Hotpot
description:
The Walking Hotpot now serves more variety of soups including Chong Qing mala spicy soup, Sour Radish and Tomato soup which is non spicy.
Our signature Mala soup is made of spicy and numbing seasoning of Chong Qing peppercorn and Chili. Mala has become one of the most popular ingredients in Chinese cuisine, spawning many regional variants.
Our vision and mission is to provide consumers to custom made his/her own favourite ingredient including vegetables and meats in their hotpot bowl.
Once try, I promise you will never forget the sensation of The Walking Hotpot. So, what are you waiting for? Come to First Floor Asian Avenue now!

name: Timberland
description:
Hard work, innovation, and a love of the great outdoors are all big parts of the Timberland story. They have been since the very beginning. Stepping outside in any kind of weather was a problem Timberland was born to solve. In 1973 our original waterproof boots called the “Timberland” were invented. They were rugged, well-crafted, and—thanks to an innovative injection moulding technique which was new to the footwear industry—they withstood the elements.
These premium “yellow” boots set new standards for waterproof performance in the footwear industry. They became equally popular with outdoor enthusiasts who needed protection in all conditions, professional trade workers who needed rugged dependable gear, and many others who just wanted a great looking pair of boots. These boots defined our brand. They were so groundbreaking that in 1978 Timberland renamed the entire company.
Today, Timberland Sunway Pyramid is the go-to place for heavy-duty boots and footwear, fit for all harsh elements and weather conditions. Their signature boots are made with durable premium leather consisting of billions of recycled bottles and plastic, an anti-slip rubber lug outsole and anti-fatigue technology with moulded foam footbed to absorb shock and energy while delivering stability and support. For wet and cold environments, Timberland’s waterproof, water-repellent and insulation technology used in their leather and inner footwear membrane will keep you dry, warm and insulated.
Timberland has also developed numerous technologies for all footwear needs – from lightweight soles for long-lasting cushioning in everyday wear to revolutionary grip stick rubber soles for enhanced traction on different tracks and trails. To keep you dry, protected and warm/cool depending on the weather, Timberland’s all-season apparel packs a punch with their specially designed and tailored fabrics such as water-resistant windbreakers, waterproof parkas, cotton linen shirts, packable hoodies for easy storage, organic cotton shorts and tees, stylish polo tees, print tees, stylish construction jackets and much more. Their ranges are available for both men and women, and adaptable for outdoor and indoor.

name: Time Culture
description: Step into Time Culture, where watches transcend timekeeping, reflecting diverse styles and cultures. Expert guidance and vast collections offer an immersive experience, turning your watch selection into a meaningful expression of your personal style.

name: Timekeeper Smart
description: Retailing of smart watches and normal watches.

name: Toddler Cart
description:
Shopping can be a tiring activity! Let your children have a break with baby strollers, tandem, child wheelchair, or toddler cart.
All are available for rent at any Concierge!
*T&C Apply.
• The child using the toddler cart must be below 3 years old or weigh up to 12 kg.
• RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
• 4 hours of usage.
• Do not leave the child unattended.
• Use the lift to access different floors.

name: Toilet
description: For your convenience, search to locate your nearest toilet.

name: Tomei
description: Established since 1968, Tomei is one of Malaysia's leading experts in the jewelry industry. With over half a decade of proven success in its expertise, Tomei is known for creating the finest gold and diamond jewellery cater to different market niches and seasons throughout the year. Every piece of Tomei jewelry tells a story, spanning from glorious inspiration to perfect sparkles that lasts a lifetime.

name: Tommy Hilfiger
description: TOMMY HILFIGER is one of the world’s most recognized premium lifestyle brands, uplifting and inspiring consumers since 1985. The brand creates iconic style, which comes alive at the intersection of the classic and the new, co-created with people who are shaping culture around the world. TOMMY HILFIGER celebrates the essence of classic American style with a modern twist. Tommy Hilfiger offers premium quality and value to consumers worldwide under the TOMMY HILFIGER and TOMMY JEANS lifestyles, with a breadth of collections including men’s, women’s and kids’ sportswear, denim, accessories, and footwear. Tommy Hilfiger has an unwavering commitment to sustainability and inclusivity.

name: Top Secret Studio
description: Retailing of hair care, hair accessories and toiletries #BeautyTreats

name: Torii Teppanyaki
description: A Japanese restaurant known for its grilled menu such as Teppanyaki and Okonomiyaki, Torii Teppanyaki also serves signature items such as hot stone Volcano Ramen (a must try) and Sizzling Rice. Torii Teppanyaki takes pride in serving sizzling hot and grilled food using fresh Halal-butchered meat and vegetables.

name: Toys 'R' us
description: Toys Retailer

name: Trim N Shave Barber Salon
description: Retailing of hair cut shaving and head massage under Trim Shave Barber Shop

name: Triumph
description:
It all began in a barn: The transformation of Triumph International from a tiny Southern German corset factory back in 1886 into one of the world’s leading manufacturers of lingerie and underwear. Triumph develops, produces and sells underwear, lingerie, sleepwear and swimwear, fusing excelling quality in workmanship, unrivalled fit and the latest in fashionable design.
At Triumph you will find bras in a number of cuts, colours and sizes that are able to suit every female figure. Whether you are looking for a practical bra, a sexy push-up bra or a T-shirt bra for everyday use − you will find the perfect bra to suit you here at Triumph. For a sexier look, Triumph’s iconic Aqua range has been giving women the perfect push-up. Made using specialist Aqua padding, the Aqua range offers high impact push up for every occasion. Choose from styles including the plunging Deep V neckline for the ultimate seductive look or the balcony bra for everyday wear. "
With Triumph’s innovative new Magic Wire, you will forget you are wearing a bra! The range features a new flexible silicone support 'wire' enclosed inside the bra. Made with smart memory cushions, Triumph’s Sexy Cushion range moulds perfectly to your body contours. It’s soft and comfortable, yet offers the snuggest support, the most natural lift and a stunning cleavage.
The comfortable, super-soft Everyday bras from Triumph will leave you with the ultimate feeling of freedom. Designed for everyday wear these lightweight bras come in a variety of designs and colours including non-wired and push up. Smooth cups make them perfect to be worn underneath T-shirts or blouses. The large selection of shapewear products from Triumph ensures that every area of your body is toned and firmed. Get familiar with Triumph’s range of body toning, high-waist panties and shaping bodysuits to shape your breast perfectly for any occasion. The subtle colour palette in this range is sensuous and sexy, enabling you to playfully mix and match any Triumph shapewear you own.
At Triumph, discover the perfect sports bra, whatever your needs. From lightweight bras for low impact exercise like yoga to high-impact bras designed for running, your every sports need has been considered. Triaction bras have special designed features including sweat wicking fibres and in-built extra supportive padding.

name: Typo
description:
Born in 2009, Typo is all about inspiring the disruptive generation. From homewares to tech gear, gifts to craft supplies, desk essentials to boredom busters, we’ve got the merch to help vibe check your entire life. We create unexpected products and experiences that bring joy to everyday life. We are disruptive, creative, inclusive, authentic, people first, and very fun. We encourage our community to express their individuality and are obsessed with doing good – we want to create a movement that empowers people around the world.
We are Anything But Ordinary.

name: U Mobile
description: Retailing of u mobile services, phone and accessories

name: USC
description:
USC playing a casual fashion game and their incredible range of brands is now available here through the USC by Sports Direct.
Jack Wills, CP Company , Asics, Champion, Converse, Levi’s, Fila, New Era, New Balance, Puma Vans are available at USC by Sports Direct.
Those brands and many more provide on-trend clothing, footwear and accessories for men & women, allowing everyone to elevate their wardrobe and show off their big-brand style.
USC by Sports Direct Pop Up store can be found at Orange Atrium, Sunway Pyramid now.

name: Under Armour
description:
Under Armour started with a simple plan to make a superior T-shirt; a shirt that provided compression and wicked perspiration off your skin rather than absorb it; a shirt that worked with your body to regulate temperature and enhance performance. Founded in 1996 by former University of Maryland football player Kevin Plank, Under Armour is the originator of performance apparel and gear engineered to keep athletes cool, dry and light throughout the course of a game, practice or workout.
Under Armour's mission is TO MAKE ALL ATHLETES BETTER THROUGH PASSION, DESIGN AND THE RELENTLESS PURSUIT OF INNOVATION.
The technology behind Under Armour's diverse product assortment for men, women and youth is complex, but the program for reaping the benefits is simple: wear HeatGear to stay cool, dry & light, ColdGear to stay warm, dry & light, and AllSeasonGear to stay dry, light & comfortable.
Stroll through Under Armour Sunway Pyramid to explore the latest in sporting technology and gear for Men and Women. Shop according to individual sporting needs – training, running, golf, basketball, military, soccer or sports lifestyle. From essentials such as training shorts, joggers, T-shirts, leggings, sports bras to jackets, hoodies, backpacks, gym bags, socks and headwear, Under Armour’s got you covered.
Famed for their footwear technology engineered for performance, efficiency and comfort, Under Armour’s shoes are a must-try. Slip into their UA HOVR signature range and experience the bounce, fit and cushioning, all made with durable, solid material. Dash across the court with Under Armour’s CURRY 7 basketball shoes, designed with a breathable, lightweight knit upper that provides a sock-like fit & feel, UA HOVR technology and Micro G Cushioning for explosive energy return. Step onto the golf course with Under Armour’s SPIETH golf shoes with an anti-microbial sockliner for unmatched underfoot comfort and breathability, UA Rotational Resistance outsole for lightweight lockdown tracking and UA HOVR placement to support the biomechanics of the golf swing with soft yet responsive underfoot cushioning.

name: Uniqlo
description:
Apparel that comes from the Japanese values of simplicity, quality and longevity. Designed to be of the time and for the time, UNIQLO LifeWear is made with such modern elegance that it becomes the building blocks of each individual’s style. LifeWear is clothing that is constantly being innovated, bringing more warmth, more lightness, better design, and better comfort to people’s lives.
For more info, please visit: http://www.uniqlo

name: Universal Traveller
description:
From humble beginnings in the 1970s on a street in Singapore, Universal Traveller (UT) has grown from a winter wear retailer to a leading winter wear brand in Southeast Asia.

Universal Traveller Sunway Pyramid constantly reinvents itself, exploring innovative designs to cater to the changing habits of the modern traveller. We believe travel can be light, functional and stylish. We are relentlessly sourcing and trying new material in our winter wear to guarantee the optimal functionality. UT’s design team is always looking to design the next perfect winter piece suited for different occasions, whether for leisure or work.
Planning for a trip abroad can be stressful, and here’s where Universal Traveller’s complete range of travel wear comes in handy for even the harshest weather. For trips to places where the temperature falls below 0 degrees, don a thick, insulated down jacket made with feathers, water and wind resistant fabric and a hood to protect your head. Browse for jackets and travel wear for temperatures above 0 degrees such as coats, trench coats, jackets, wind jackets, pullovers, sweaters, hoodies and many more, all available for Men, Women and Children/Kids.
Thermal wear is available in various fibres such as bamboo fibre which has natural anti-bacterial, anti-odour and anti-fungal properties for long wear and comfort. Universal Traveller also offers HEATPLUS+ performance thermal wear and long johns, made with inner brushed fleece for warmth and spandex for stretch and functionality, retains heat extremely well and has moisture wicking, quick-dry and breathable properties.
Store all your essentials in one of Universal Traveller’s variety of luggage bags and backpacks, available in all shapes and sizes to fit your needs. From outdoor backpacks for trekking and backpacking, to secure aluminium hard cases and roller bags, there is something for everyone. Urbanlite, Jean Francois, Guess, Ricardo Beverly Hills, Heys, Titan, Travelpro and Travel Gear Backpack are among the brands on sale at Universal Traveller.

name: Up's
description: Retailing of cocktail dresses, party and dinner wears.

name: Urban Revivo
description: Fast Luxury Fashion

name: VANZO
description:
New Generation Healthy Premium Air Fresheners, VANZO is functional air freshener brand that produces exclusive sterilizing healthy air fresheners in Malaysia, dedicated to protecting consumers from the harmful car and interior fragrances. VANZO works closely with 2 Japanese fragrance experts, OGAWA & TAIYO, to produce high-quality products. With the implementation of exclusive Odour Emulsion Filtration (OEF) technology, it can infiltrate unpleasant odours first & then emanate fragrance effectively.
Products of VANZO are certified by SGS & SIRIM Malaysia for non-toxic inhalation, have no alcohol, formaldehyde & heavy metals, do not contain harmful chemical ingredients, and have a practical sterilizing function. VANZO is Malaysia's first International SGS & SIRIM Malaysia certified New Generation Healthy Premium air freshener brand that is safe to enjoy.

name: VIVO
description: Retailing of smartphone, laptop, related accessories and handphone repair services

name: VTMT
description: VTMT an Indepedent streetwear fashion label since 2013 that focuses on using natural and plain aspect as their elements. VTMT’s minimal and simplicity design creation is able to easily match with any kind of outfit.

name: Valet/Jockey Parking
description:
Valet and jockey services are available at the main entrance.
Monday - Thursday = RM25 per entry
Friday - Sunday & Public Holiday - RM30 per entry

name: Veesee Collections
description: Veesee Collections is now bringing their Chic Dazzling Earrings to you at Sunway Pyramid!! Veesee Collections started out, since 3 Years as Exhibitionists in Roadshows and Mall Expo, and established their first Outlet at Sunway Velocity Mall in 2020. People were intrigued by their Chic Dazzling Earrings at Unbelievable Affordability that suit Your Whims and Fancies which matches Your Every Moods and Outfits!!!!! People just Can't Believe the Chic Dazzling Earrings at such Affordable Prices by Veesee Collections.

name: Velife Snack Bar
description: Retailing of Freeze Dry Fruits, VF Vegetables & Nuts, Freeze Dry Strawberry with Chocolate and Fish Skin only.

name: Victoria's Secret
description: Victoria’s Secret is the world’s largest specialty intimates retailer offering a wide assortment of modern, fashion-inspired collections including signature bras, panties, lingerie, casual sleepwear and athleisure, as well as award-winning prestige fragrances and body care. With nearly 1,400 retail stores worldwide and a predominately female workforce of more than 25,000, Victoria’s Secret boasts the largest team of specialty trained bra fit experts worldwide. Victoria’s Secret is committed to inspiring women around the world with products and experiences that uplift and champion them and their journey while creating lifelong relationships and advocating for positive change.

name: Vinstella
description: Modern and fashionable jewellery crafted by Vinstella craftsmen.

name: Vivid Concepts
description: At Vivid Concepts, we're passionate about tech innovation. Our curated selection of cutting-edge gadgets, along with our expert team's guidance, ensures you stay at the forefront of technology trends. Discover the future of gadgets with us today.

name: WOK HEY
description: A modern, fast-casual, convenient take-out concept. We offer tasty, nutritious, value-for-money, customisable fry-to-order rice and noodle wok dishes.

name: Wacoal
description:
Wacoal was founded in Japan in 1949 by Koichi Tsukamoto. His goal was to bring beautiful intimate apparel that would offer a higher level of quality and innovation than was currently available in the market to women across the globe. By building teams of like-minded designers, researchers, merchants, and others he created a brand with global reach and countless loyal customers. In 1985, Wacoal launched its brand in America with the goal of using high-quality materials to create intimate apparel that was beautiful and comfortable too.
Helping women look and feel beautiful has always been Wacoal’s mission. We understand that wearing a bra that fits comfortably and provides the right support can be a life-changing experience. That’s why we offer bras in a wide range of styles and sizes from A to I cup as well as on-trend lingerie that’s sexy without compromising on quality or comfort from our brand b.tempt’d. All of our lingerie features beautiful materials, comfortable fit, and relevant designs. The impeccable quality of our bras, panties, and coordinating lingerie has earned us many loyal customers, which has made Wacoal a leading brand in department and specialty stores around the country.
Discover a seamless perfection and renewed confidence with Wacoal’s Fineliner T-Shirt Bras, or move with a synchronized ability with the Synchro collection with sewn-in synchro sheets in their wireless bras. Opt for full-coverage with the Gococi collection and maintain your active, healthy lifestyle with their double-layer Sports Bras. To enhance your curves, Wacoal’s Magic X Shapewear hugs and tucks you in all the right places, while their girdles and i-Shaper helps you achieve your ideal body shape. Pick from their cotton, seamless, sanitary or super fine panties for all-day comfort.

name: Wagyu More
description:
At Wagyu More, we serve a wide offering of high-quality meats alongside vegetables, hot dishes, meatballs, sushi, drinks and desserts. We also have Premium Buffet options with top-quality meat slices, including Japanese A5 Wagyu Beef, Australian Wagyu Beef, Spanish Iberico Pork, and Black Angus Beef. All meats are freshly sliced upon order to ensure the best quality and taste upon order.
We also serve a variety of 13 soups: Pork Bone, Chicken Collagen, Sukiyaki, Spicy Pork Bone, Tomato, Miso, Kombu and Kimchi with Mala, Herbal, Black Garlic Oil Hokkaido Tonkatsu, Collagen Miso and Collagen Tomato as premium add-ons!

name: Wah Chan
description:
Started in 1955 in Pekan, Wah Chan has grown along with its customers, evolving into a diamonds, gems and white gold specialist along the way. Among the largest jewellers in Malaysia, Wah Chan has more than 50 boutiques in the key urban centres of Pahang, Selangor, Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Perak, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan and Johor.
Wah Chan Sunway Pyramid is staffed by experienced jewellery professionals of engravers, polishers, stone setters, bench jewellers, gemologists, designers, and model makers, many whom have been with Wah Chan for years, dedicated to their craft. Wah Chan is also known for their ability to source top quality diamonds and gemstones, aided by its sheer and volume of the business. By making customer feedback and service a priority, we have excelled in one-in-one jewellery design services and consultation, helping customers with their jewellery needs.
Stop by Wah Chan to discover a huge range of jewellery collections, from gold, rose gold, diamonds, pearls, jade, gemstones, fine jewellery, gold bars, charms and GIA. Wah Chan offers personalized consultations according to your gifting needs or specific occasions, such as diamond engagement rings, 18K wedding bands, bridal jewellery, Valentine’s Day, gold charms for kids and babies, parents, mum and dad, corporate gifts such as good luck charms and pendants or rose gold jewellery as anniversary gifts.
Explore their selection of necklaces, bracelets, rings, pendants, charms, bangles, earrings to surprise your loved ones on a special day! For a unique twist, gift them with precious stones such as ruby, sapphires, south sea pearls, jade and more.

name: Wanderlust + Co
description:
Wanderlust + Co has officially opened its doors at Sunway Pyramid. An independent jewellery label celebrating 12 years of meaningful designs and jewellery kind to your skin and the planet, the brand’s goal has always been to create trendy, affordable jewelry inspired by intuition and individuality, which serve as positive daily reminders to their community, fondly known as the #WCOgirlgang.
Launched in 2010, Wanderlust + Co’s jewels have reached over 150 countries globally with styles seen on some of the world’s most influential women such as Bella Hadid and Jessica Alba, and many others across different age groups and communities.
Each Wanderlust + Co jewel is made from recycled brass, stainless steel, or sterling silver, coated in 14K gold or rhodium and finished with e-coating for extra luster and durability. In short, hypoallergenic and lasting in wear – jewels you can live in.
As a brand, Wanderlust + Co only works with factories that are SA 8000 and ISO 14001 certified – complying with global ethical standards, ensuring a safe working environment, fair wages and working hours. Their promise to their customers, makers and the planet is to continuously improve their manufacturing process in a sustainable manner.
The brand’s new store in Sunway Pyramid gives the perfect opportunity for their #WCOgirlgang to style their pieces in person, as well as get a glimpse of their latest and bestselling designs up-close. The brand is also offering offline exclusive services such as piercing appointments and product personalization.
Inspired by zen minimalism and their iconic celestial and organic silhouettes, you’re invited to visit their latest store and enjoy a truly experiential experience.
Storytelling has always been at the heart of every new Wanderlust + Co launch, design and campaign, and the brand’s vision is to continue to create with care in years to come.
We hope to see you there!

name: Watatime
description:
Since its establishment in 1972, WATATIME has grown to become Malaysia’s leading watch distributor and authorized retailer of luxury watches from the world’s most respected and sought-after brands such as Tudor, TAG Heuer, Breitling, Corum, Bell & Ross, Longines, Tissot, Hamilton, Oris and Ball among others.
At WATATIME, we are not only providing high-quality, full-service distribution and retail of watches but also offering a fully bespoke retail experience to luxury watch enthusiasts and collectors.

name: Watches of Switzerland Repair Centre
description: Presenting a collection of the world's finest watches, here also provides a comprehensive range of services. From replacing a worn out strap to repairing a damaged watch, you'll be amazed at what our in-house watchmakers can take care of. We know how important your watch is to you; Watches of Switzerland and our in-house watchmakers are expert in taking care of servicing and repairs.

name: Watson's
description:
Watsons Malaysia is the leading health and beauty retailer in the country serving the needs of all Malaysians.
Watsons continue to inspire our customers to enjoy life to the fullest and set the standards in the health, wellness, and beauty market, providing personalized advice in health, beauty, and personal care on top of its market-leading product ranges, making customers LOOK GOOD, DO GOOD, FEEL GREAT every day.

name: Wenisem
description: closet

name: Wheel Chair
description:
Wheelchairs are available for rent at our concierges for your convenience.
Reservation is also available via phone call at 03-7494 3100 or 03-7494 3102 OR via online booking on our Sunway Malls Super App. The reservation will be hold within 20 - 30 minutes of the reservation.
*T&C Apply.
• Weight of the patron using the wheelchair must be below 90 kg.
• RM 50 refundable deposit will be collected.
• 4 hours of usage.
• Usage for mobility-impaired persons, elderly and pregnant lady.
• Use a lift to access different floors.
• Do not carry passengers.
• Lock the brakes before getting out or onto the wheelchair.
• Do not leave handbags/valuables unattended.

name: Whisk
description: Specialty Coffee shop with homemade cakes & light bites

name: Whoosh
description: Fast. Fresh. Forward. These words perfectly describe what Whoosh! was created for. Bringing you the latest in eyewear designs, Whoosh! eyewear will satisfy trendsetters who value style, quality, and professional advice on the go. With a wide range of designs in 3 distinctive styles, 4 fixed affordable prices and a great team of professional opticians, a style revolution is coming your way faster than you can say “Whoosh!”.

name: Winter Time
description:
At Winter Time, discover a wide range of quality winter apparel from the leading apparel specialist, with apparel from the likes of fashion premiers like Europe, United Kingdom, USA, Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong & China.
Shopping for winter clothing for the first time? Relax and let Winter Time Sunway Pyramid take care of your needs based on your unique demographics, preferences and desires. Experience moments of warmth as you layer on Winter Time’s vast selection of jackets, coats, sweaters, parkas, down parkas, thermal wear and boots.
Men can opt for darker, distinguished tones of brown, grey, maroon or black. Start with a layer of thermal clothing with Winter Time’s Heatpro technology, available in long pants, crew neck shirts, long-sleeved shirts, V-neck shirts, Long Johns and more. Don a cosy long-sleeved sweater or hoodie over your thermal clothing, followed by a parka or down parka lined with a stylish faux fur hood to keep cold air out from your head and upper body. For slightly warmer or wet temperatures such as the Autumn/Fall seasons, slip on a waterproof and snowproof trench coat. Winter Time’s trench coats are super versatile, with detachable snow skirts and hoods for your convenience, made with breathable yet insulated material for comfort. Don’t forget to slip on thermal socks and protect your feet with classic leather winter boots.
For women, live out your Winter Sonata dream with Winter Time’s choice of cream, white or pink coats, among other shades. Opt for trench coats and hoodies in various designs, patterns or colours to keep you warm in cool temperatures, and layer on down parkas and parks to brave the freezing temperatures and wind. Complete your look with practical yet stylish winter accessories such as pile lined gloves, ski gloves, knitted or fur scarves and hats, all available at Winter Time.
All these winter clothing items are also available for babies and kids from 6months till 12 years old, including footwear and accessories.
Let’s go for a winter vacation!

name: Wong Kok Char Chan Teng
description: Retailing of Hong Kong style F&B only

name: XOX 5G
description:
XOX Mobile, a Malaysia Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO) has introduced its first flagship store called XOX Space at Sunway Pyramid! Located on the first floor of Sunway Pyramid just at the edge of the Asian Avenue, this concept store provides a fun, chill environment for people to hangout and explore the range of XOX offerings available. In fact, the store is also a conducive place to perform minor work tasks, a little escape from the monotony of office spaces, especially with the complimentary WiFi connection available at XOX Space.
Wholly owned and operated by the XOX Mobile crew, XOX Space also serves as a service center for people choosing XOX mobile plans, paying their bills, buying reloads and SIM card replacements, and even purchasing new mobile accessories. With vending machines dispensing both drinks and snacks, visitors are encouraged to stay awhile to pass the time.
According to XOX Berhad Group Chief Executive Officer, Ng Kok Heng, XOX Space is strategically located in one of the Klang Valley’s most popular shopping malls to allow XOX MOBILE to connect readily and easily with its subscribers and potential users, while providing the highest levels of customer satisfaction.
“We want our first ever flagship store to be easily accessible to our loyal customers and to our potential users. XOX Space is our way of extending our reach so that more people can experience our excellent services and customer support in a setting that reflects the XOX spirit or sharing and working together,” said Ng.
XOX Mobile claims to serve 1.65 million subscribers via more than 200 outlets nationwide, including care centers, dealers, and through distribution partners. XOX Space welcomes you to drop by, visit a place away from your usual routine, and take a moment to pace yourself again, ready to take the next step to a new day.

name: YAMAGUCHI FISH MARKET
description:
Business Hours: 11:00am - 10:00pm (open daily)
The culinary landscape in Kuala Lumpur breaks new grounds as the Caffeinees Group of restaurants launches the highly anticipated Yamaguchi Fish Market today, a concept that reimagines the seafood marketplace to serve the freshest catches in town.

Yamaguchi Fish Market is inspired by Karato and Tsukiji Fish Market in Japan where the team sought to bring not only the highest quality and freshest ingredients to seafood lovers but the energetic spirit of the vibrant market as well. The tanks of Yamaguchi Fish Market is filled with fresh catches from seasonal fishes to uni and king crabs that guests can either opt to dine-in and enjoy in a variety of delicious styles or purchase back home at wholesale prices.

Diners will delight in a great variety of fresh-from-the-ocean sashimi and shellfish that the team directly picks up twice a week from the harbour and serve on the extensive and carefully curated menu. Yamaguchi Fish Market’s signature sashimi and grilled seasonal seafood platters is a rich mix of sashimi, shrimps, king crabs, oysters, clams and abalone. For palates of comfort food, the salt baked tai fish, Yamaguchi eel rice and seafood nabemono takes centrestage.
As a marketplace that offers variety in abundance, Yamaguchi Fish Market also takes a local spin onto the ingredients by opening up its menu to offer dishes cooked in local flavors such as salted egg, garlic steam and superior soup.
location: Suite G-01, The Pinnacle Annexe (Ground Floor)

name: YEAST
description:
Yeast at Sunway Pyramid Hotel, located at the lobby of the Sunway Pyramid Hotel is a part of Yeast Group, a combination of bistros and boulangerie, namely Yeast Bistronomy, Yeast TTDI, Yeast at Sunway Pyramid and Yeast Atelier. The bistros serve authentic Parisian style bistro cuisine and the boulangerie produces artisanal French bread and patisserie for wholesale and retail sales at all outlets.
We are known for our lively brunches featuring simple yet classic French bistro meals such as Duck Confit, Steak Frites and arrays of sandwiches and other delicacies to choose from. Our Parisian Hi-Tea and of course, casual and romantic dinners are becoming a tradition to many since 2012. Dine with us, enjoy a complete Parisian dining experience. Simply French, Simply Magnifique!
Business Hour : 8am to 10pm daily
location: Lobby Level, Sunway Pyramid Hotel (Ground Floor)

name: YES
description: Introducing Malaysia’s first 5G telco, Yes - the providers of the fastest and most affordable 5G services. Explore our postpaid, prepaid, broadband, and device plans with uncapped data and speed - all with no Fair Usage Policy (FUP).

description: Zero Sugar Added Frozen Yogurt and Ice Cream

name: YSL
description:
Yves Saint Laurent Beauté is the makeup, fragrance and skincare signature of the most subversive Parisian couture brand. Ever since the first fragrance, Y, of 1964, more than 50 years ago, YSL Beauté has produced true fragrant statements of all time. In 1971, a diverse image appeared of Yves Saint Laurent himself, posing nude for the campaign of the first men's fragrance, L'Homme, by YSL. The brand is now well-known for the most sought-after fragrances such as L'Homme, La Nuit de l'Homme, for men, and Opium, Black Opium, Manifesto and Paris, for women. The makeup products offer the highest technology, under the inspiration of Lloyd Simmonds, Creative Director of Makeup. He has created iconic products such as the Shocking Mascara and the infamous Touche Éclat. The skincare range is all about glamorous, radiant and youthful skin. YSL uses the most cutting-edge technology to create high-end, luxurious skincare products that claim to give a glow to your skin. The products were created purposefully to work well with the beauty products to give you a multitasking hybrid for pre and post-makeup solutions for all complexions.
#BeautyTreats

name: Yakiniku Kuro
description:
A modern twist to your Yakiniku experience!
A brand new smokeless and modern Japanese grilling experience for you with varieties of freshly sliced Angus & Wagyu beef.

name: Yi Poh
description: YI POH is originated from Seremban and we are now available in Sunway Pyramid. It was founded in 1948 by owner Grand Aunt. It main Headquarter is located at Seremban, currently have branches in the Klang Valley area. Our speciality is 'LoCFun'/'Mouse noodles''Laushufen' (老鼠粉) aka. Laksa noodles. We serve traditional YI POH LoCFun, Wantan noodles, Hakka noodles & various types of noodles. We also serve various delicates food such as Wantan soup and Thai Tofu.

name: Yong Kang TCM
description:
Yong Kang TCM is a trusted destination for traditional Chinese medicine, offering a holistic approach to wellness and a harmonious balance between ancient wisdom and modern lifestyles. With a profound understanding of the body's natural healing abilities, we strive to empower individuals on their journey to optimal health.
Founded on the principles of traditional Chinese medicine, Yong Kang TCM combines centuries of knowledge with contemporary practices to provide comprehensive and personalized care. Our team of experienced practitioners, trained in the art of acupuncture, herbal remedies, and other therapeutic techniques, is dedicated to restoring and maintaining the well-being of our valued clients.
At Yong Kang TCM, we prioritize the highest quality standards in all aspects of our practice. We carefully select premium herbs and ingredients, ensuring their authenticity and purity. Our state-of-the-art facilities create a serene and welcoming environment, where clients can relax and immerse themselves in the healing journey.
Yong Kang TCM invites you to embark on a transformative wellness experience. Whether you seek relief from chronic ailments, stress management, or a proactive approach to preventive care, our dedicated team is here to support you on your path to optimal health and well-being. Discover the time-honored traditions of Chinese medicine and unlock the healing potential within you at Yong Kang TCM

name: Young Curves
description:
Young Curves lives by its business concept, ‘best quality at the best price', combining good basics with the fun designs that allows customers to find and experiment with their own style. By offering chic, comfortable and affordable undergarments to females aged 9 – 45, Young Curves at Sunway Pyramid understands how important it is to feel relaxed and at ease all day with the right fit.
Shop for bras of all designs and sizes, available in bold colours such as navy, dark green, purple to express your vibrant style, or dusty lace tones such as rose pink, classic grey or dreamy blue for dressier days. Don a bralettes made with microfiber fabric, removable padding and scoop neck, perfect to wear under a loose dress or crop top. Sizes are available from 75A to 80C at Young Curves Sunway Pyramid.
Junior bra wearers would love Young Curves’ selection of junior panties and training bras in whimsical shades of sky blue, yellow, pink and purple with cute animal motifs. For chill days at home, slip into a pair of Young Curves’ relaxed fit shorts and laze around in utmost comfort without compromising on style. Snooze in style with their sleepwear collection, featuring pajama dresses in all colours and patterns, made with comfy cotton for cool, uninterrupted sleep all night.
Hop into your yoga mat or sports training sessions with Young Curves’ practical sports bra selection, designed to help you stay active and healthy while keeping you supported. Choose from thinner or thicker straps for varied levels of support, and a variety of designs and colours!

name: Young Hearts
description:
The Young Hearts brand is fun-loving, high-spirited, feminine and young.
Young Hearts was created with a passion about living a quality life and hence, we support and encourage this life objective by creating and producing our products with great attention to research, design, detail, variety and quality. Not only do we listen to what our customers’ needs are, we also make sure that we are on trend with the latest in fashion, design and lifestyle.
At Young Hearts Sunway Pyramid, we have a wide selection of daily essential lingerie products to whimsical sleepwear and fun lifestyle products. We hope to inspire everyone who comes into contact with us to love life with passion, confidence and enjoyment!
For those looking for your first stylish yet comfortable training bra, Young Hearts is the place to go as they offer a junior collection made with seamless material for added comfort. Choose from a lightly-lined cropped vest, cami vest or a wireless junior bra for more coverage. Pair your top with fun, printed boxshorts in cute designs and motifs!
Regular bras for young adults in all sorts of designs are also available such as the barely there bralette, multi-way bras which you can wear with straps or without, lightly lined bras, wirefree bras for comfort and push-up bras for a boost of confidence. For training or sport sessions, slip into their sports bra or sports vest for fit, support and breathability. Sizes run from 75A to 80D, and from top medium till top extra large.
A large variety of undergarments are available at Young Hearts, including waterproof, lined sanitary panties for peace of mind during that time of the month. Mini, midi, hipster and boxshort panties are among the other designs, along with adorable animal print panties with ears on the back, made in breathable and comfy material such as a blend of cotton and lace.
A good night’s sleep will make your day (or night), and Young Heart’s sleepwear collection comes in a set or individual pieces. Take your pick from pajama dresses, pajama tops and shorts or regular pajama sets. The airy, comfy material and dreamy designs will get you feeling all snuggly for bedtime!

ZUS Coffee is a cup of clean, consistent & well-handled coffee. With the best quality ingredients, high-level coffee brewing technology and innovative business model,
We are evolving the concept of coffee consumption to make specialty coffee affordable for everyone, everyday.

name: ZUS Signature
