name: Zara
description: A fashionista’s shopping trip would not be complete without a visit to Zara, the famed Spanish fashion brand that has close to 50 years of history in remaining faithful to its core values of beauty, clarity, functionality and sustainability. By nurturing a highly intimate relationship with its customers, Zara’s designers respond instinctively to their changing needs, reacting to the latest trends and constant feedback received across its Woman, Man and Kids collections, to deliver new ideas in the right place and at the right moment

name: Zen House Japanese Vegetarian Restaurant
description:
Zen House specialized in Japanese Vegetarian cuisine with a menu created from the mixture of both vegan and the rich culture of Japan. The brand had redefined vegetarian cuisine by experimenting with original flavour and modern techniques, which is a blend of nature and flavoursome. Japanese cuisine is no stranger in Malaysia due to its distinctive tastes, attractive food presentations, and abundance of health benefits. In particular, the Japanese white rice was one of the key factor in contributing to overall health and longevity among the Japanese. The fact that Japanese rice contains a number of well-balanced of nutritional elements such as vegetable protein, dietary fibre, and low in calories. Thus, Japanese white rice being a staple food and pairing with other vegan dishes could promote overall health.
In Zen House, you must try out the Zen signature dishes curated just for you -Volcano Maki, Sashimi Moriawase, Omakase Moriawase, Cheese Shitake, and Zen House special salad. Besides, Zen House has the most creative Japanese vegan menu you can choose from: Appetizers, Salad, Temaki, Makimono, Hosomaki, Nigiri Sushi, Sushi Moriawase, Sashimi, Yakimono, Tempura, Nabemono, Noodles, Donmono, Teppanyaki, and Bento Sets.
As the brand had influenced by the culture of Japan, various vegan ingredients had been used to create a well-balanced Japanese diet. For example, Soba noodles are made up from buckwheat flour and offers beneficial manganese and gluten-free. On the other hand, Udon noodles are made up from thick wheat flour which promote healthy functioning of body cells and enzymes. Both Soba and Udon noodles are ideal for those opting for calorie-conscious diet. Furthermore, those who prefer crunchy texture should try out the wide choices of Vegetable tempura. It is a traditional Japanese style of cooking by deep-frying vegetables coated with light and eggless batter. Another dish that you shouldn’t miss out trying is the Vegan sashimi. The creative fusion of vegetables and other organic ingredients bring out the actual taste of fresh sashimi. Look no further for a healthy and flavourful meal here at Zen House Japanese Vegetarian in Sunway Pyramid.

name: Zing
description: Retailing of fashion accessories.

name: Zirconia
description:
ZIRCONIA JEWELLERY established since year 2006. Our company specializes in women accessories. Those women accessories are made of different materials , and lots of choices customer can choose from.
Zirconia Jewellery can be found in most Johor Bahru shopping complexes, and now it has expanded to KL , even all across Malaysia in future.
We are doing our best to give customers a great shopping experience and we do offers high quality of sale service, after sale service and great product quality.
Our goal is Every woman is able to pamper themselves with trendy design and quality women accessories with affordable price to make them even confident and gorgeous.

name: adidas Brand Center
description:
The adidas Malaysia Brand Center serves as a central hub for consumers to experience the entire breadth and depth of the brand, showcasing the latest innovation and technology as the world’s leading sports brand.
Taking up 19,974 sqft (four shop lots) in LG1 of Sunway Pyramid, the new adidas Brand Center is the largest adidas store in the country, which makes this massive outlet the ultimate destination to shop and browse for the full adidas range, from sports performance wear to sports lifestyle wear and special releases such as the Yeezy collection.
The design of the outlet is inspired by a stadium design and is the first-of-its-kind retail concept in Malaysia which incorporates local elements, such as iconic local landmarks and cultural hues, all effortlessly integrated into one spacious sports arena.
For those less inclined to sports and fitness, adidas Brand Center offers a wide range of lifestyle collections such as the Classics and adidas Originals collection and the global creators’ collaborations. Other unique aspects of the Brand Center include in-store category specialists to recommend products based on your unique needs and fit.
A ‘Test & Create’ section allows customers to try out footwear such as adidas signature Ultraboost, Pureboost, Pulseboost and more in real-time by running on the treadmills provided, complete with an outdoor running simulation for the full experience.
The store also offers personalized services such as a Print Shop to custom print your name on a purchased jersey on the spot, and an exclusive women-only changing rooms for safety and convenience, equipped with a call-button in each cubicle to request for a change of apparel or bra sizing.
Shop for all your favourite adidas clothing such as jerseys, sports bras, sports tops, long sleeved tops, leggings, joggers, sweatpants, hats, caps, footwear, sneakers, accessories and gym bags for men, women and children, spanning across all different sporting needs such as running, football, basketball, gym training and many many more.

name: anello
description: Established since 2005 in Japan, Anello had created various designs of bags with different shape, size, and material to suit every kind of lifestyle and daily activities. Anello bags were also directly inspired from tiny details such as intricare patterns or prints in order to create their own unique and stand-out designs. Anello strives to fulfil their goal, which is to "design versatile items which are made for everyone and perfect on any occasion".

name: iORA
description:
The heart of the business is well-made apparels at economic pricing for everyone. We are driven to reinvent styles that will inspire and serve as an expression. Expect versatile and timeless designs that see beyond seasons from workwear to smart casual styles, iORA is a one-stop destination for all clothing needs.
With significant demand in the retail scene, iORA sees an opportunity for sister labels to cater to every aspect of a woman’s stage in life. That is when Lalu and Sora came to light. Lalu is a provision for contemporary street style and all about feeling comfortable in one’s skin. Sora is an extension label of accessories to complete your daily look from small goods to footwear.
Comfort and quality are deeply rooted in our DNA, our designs are carefully designed in-house to meet the real considerations of a woman as we want women to feel unreservedly comfortable in their skin and carry themselves with confidence in iORA.
